mahā bhairava vākyam ca paṅkaja āyata locanā

bhairavī uvāca

ādau bālā bhairavīṇām sādhanam ṣaṭkalā ātmakam
paścāt kumārīlalitā sādhanam parama adbhutam

ākāśagaṅgā vividhā kanyakā sādhanam tatas
ulkāvidyā sādhanam ca pañca tārā ādi sādhanam

kālikā sādhanam kaula sādhanam ghana sādhanam

kanaka ābhā kāñcana ābhā vahni ābhā sādhanam tatas

tāriṇī sādhanam paścāt ṣoḍaśī sādhanam smṛtam
chinnā ādi ugra pracaṇḍī ādi sādhanam su manoharam
ulkāmukhī raktamukhī sādhanam vīra sādhanam

kṛtvā devī sādhanam ca kṛtvā ahi sādhanam tatas
nakṣatra vidyā paṭalam kālī paṭalam eva ca
rati krīḍā sādhanam ca sundarī sādhanam tathā
mahāmālā sādhanam ca mahāmāyā ādi sādhanam
bhadrakālī sādhanam ca nīlā sādhanam eva ca
bhuvaneśī sādhanam ca durgā sādhanam eva ca
brahmāṇī sādhanam paścāt haṃsī sādhanam uttamam
māheśvarī sādhanam ca kaumārī sādhanam tathā
muṇḍa mālā sādhanam ca bhṛṅgārī sādhanam tatas
guhyakālī sādhanam ca bagalāmukhī sādhanam
mahābālā sādhanam ca kalāvatī ādi sādhanam
kulajā kalikā kakṣā kukkuṭī sādhanam mahat
ciñcā devī sādhanam ca śāṅkarī gūḍha sādhanam
vāgīśvarī mahāvidyā annapūrṇa ādi sādhanam
vajradaṇḍa āraktamayīm anu ārīsādhanam tathā
hastinī hastikarṇa ādyā mātaṅgī sādhanam tatas
kāmeśvarī mahālajjā jvālinī sādhanam vasoḥ  /
gaurī vetāla kaṅkālī vāsavī sādhanam tathā
kiṅginī pāvanī vidyā avadhūteśvarī iti ca
etāsām siddhavidyānām sādhanāt rudraḥ eva saḥ
aṭṭahāsa aghora nādā mahāmegha ādi sādhanam
vallarī kauraviṇī ādi sādhanam parama adbhutam
mandirā sādhanam kātyāyanī sādhanam eva ca
rajanī rājatī ghonā sādhanam tāla sādhanam
muni nātha īśvarī śānti vallabhā sādhanam tathā
madirā sādhanam vīrabhadrā sādhanam eva hi
praviṣṭa varṇa a laghimā mīna ādi sādhanam mahat
phetkārī sādhanam bhallātakī sādhanam adbhutam
uḍḍīyāna īśvarī pūrṇā girijā sādhanam tathā
saukarī rājavaśinī dīrghajaṅghā ādi sādhanam
jvālāmukhī sādhanam ca kṛṣṇajihvā ādi sādhanam
sādhanam śailavāsinyāḥ akasmāt siddhi vardhanam
mantra yantra sva tantra ādi pūjyamānāḥ parātparāḥ
etāḥ sarvāḥ kali yuge kālikāḥ hara komalāḥ

original: mantrādyā yena siddhayanti satyaṃ satyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ || 1-52 ||
analyzed: mantra ādyāḥ yena satyam satyam na saṃśayaḥ
bhaktānām anurāgeṇa vidyā ratnam punar śṛṇu
ādau vaiṣṇava devasya mantrāṇām nitya sādhanam
tatas te maṅgalam mantra sādhanam parama adbhutam
akasmāt vihitā siddhiḥ yena siddhi ati bhū tale
mahākāla sādhanam ca tathā rāmeśvarasya ca
aghora mūrtte ramaṇā sādhanam śṛṇu yatnatas
girīndra sādhanam paścāt kulanāthasya sādhanam
baṭuka īśa ādi śrīkaṇṭha īśa ādi sādhanam eva ca
mṛtyuñjayasya raudrasya kāla antaka harasya ca
unmattabhairavasya api tathā pañcāsyakasya ca

original: kailāseśasya śambhośca tathā śūlina eva ca || 1-59 ||
analyzed: kailāsa īśasya śambhoḥ ca tathā śūlinaḥ eva ca
bhārgaveśasya sarvasya mahākālasya sādhanam
surāntakasya pūrṇasya tathā devasya śaṅkara  /
haridrā gaṇa nāthasya vara da īśvara mālinaḥ
ūrdhvakeśasya dhūmrasya jaṭilasya api sādhanam
ānandabhairavasya api bāṇanāthasya sādhanam
karīndrasya śubhāṅgasya hillolamardakasya ca
puṣpanātha īśvarasya api vṛṣanāthasya sādhanam
aṣṭamūrtteḥ kāla mūrtteḥ candraśekhara sādhanam
kramukasya api ghorasya kubera ārādhitasya ca
tripurāntaka mantrasya kamala akṣasya sādhanam
ityādi siddha mantrāṇām mantra artham vividham mudā
uditam tat viśeṣeṇa su vistārya śṛṇuṣva tat
indra ādi devatā sarvā yena siddhyanti bhū tale
tad prakāram mahādeva sa avadhānā uvadhāraya
upavidyā sādhanam ca mantrāṇi vividhāni ca
nānā karmāṇi dharmāṇi ṣaṣ karma sādhanāni ca
sarva vidyā sādhanam ca rājajvālā ādi sādhanam
mantra siddhi prakāram ca hanumat sādhana ādikam
viṣa jvālā sādhanam ca pātāla loka sādhanam
bhūta lipi prakāram ca tad tad sādhanam eva ca

original: āsanāni ca aṅgāni sādhanāni bahūni ca |
analyzed: āsanāni ca aṅgāni sādhanāni bahūni ca
kātyāyanī sādhanāni ceṭī sādhanam eva ca
kṛṣṇa mārjāra siddhiḥ ca khaḍga siddhiḥ tatas param
saṃskāra guṭikā siddhiḥ khecarī siddhiḥ eva ca
stambhanam dāruṇam paścāt ākarṣaṇam muneḥ api
nānāvidhāni deveśa auṣadha ādīni yāni ca
nānā rasa samudbhūtam rasa bhasma ādi sādhanam
vṛddhasya taruṇa ākāram sādhanam parama adbhutam
vaijayantī sādhanam ca caritram vāsakasya ca
śivā caritram aśvasya caritram vāyasasya ca

original: kumārīṇāṃ prakāraṃ tu vajrāṇāṃ vāraṇaṃ tathā || 1-77 ||
analyzed: kumārīṇām prakāram tu vajrāṇām vāraṇam tathā
sampatti sādhanam deśa sādhanam kāma sādhanam
guru pūjā vidhānam ca
nija deva ārādhanam ca nija sādhanam eva ca
vāruṇī paiṣṭikī gauḍī kaitakī mādhvi sādhanam
sva deha gamanam svarge martye martyaiḥ ca durlabham
śarīra vardhanam ca eva kṛṣṇa bhāvasya sādhanam
nayana ākarṣaṇam ca eva kālasarpasya darśanam
raṇa kṣobha prakāram ca pañca indriya nivāraṇam
yoga vidyā sādhanañca bhakṣa prastha nirūpaṇam
cāndrāyaṇa vratam ca eva śṛṇu tat yoga siddhaye

original: yāmalāgreṇa śaṃsanti yāni sarvāṇi kāni ca |
analyzed: yāmala agreṇa śaṃsanti yāni sarvāṇi kāni ca

original: brahmāṇḍe yāni vastūni sarvatra durlabhaṃ śivam || 1-83 ||
analyzed: brahmāṇḍe yāni vastūni sarvatra durlabham śivam
mahā tantram bālāt vā mantrataḥ api vā
yāmalam mama vaktra ambhoruha sundara saṃbhavam
ati guhyam mahā guhyam śabda guhyam nirākulam
nānā siddhi samudrāṇām gṛham yoga mayam śubham
śāstra jālasya sāram hi nānā mantra mayam priyam
sarasvatī daivatam yat kālīṣu śikhare vṛtam
mahāmokṣam dvāramokṣam sarva saṃketa śobhitam
aprakāśyam kriyā sāram sahasra stuti rājitam
aṣṭottaraśatam nāma sahasranāmamaṅgalam
nānā dravya sādhana ādi vidhṛta añjana rañjitam
aṣṭādaśa prakāram ca ṣoḍhāyāḥ saukhya muktaye
ye jānanti mahākālam yāmalam kali pāvanam
ā brahmastamba paryantam kare tasya na saṃśayaḥ
tad prakāram aham vakṣye nigama āgama maṅgalam
yasmāt rudraḥ bhavet jñānī nānā tantra artha pāragaḥ
yāminī vihitam karma kula tantra abhisādhanam

original: laṃghanaṃ nāsti me nātha asmin tantre sugopanam || 1-94 ||
analyzed: laṃghanam na asti me nātha asmin tantre su gopanam
tatas yāmalam ākhyātam candraśekhara śaṅkara
manaḥ santoṣa vipulam yāmalam
ruruka ādi bhairavāṇām brāhmī devyāḥ ca sādhanam
jāmbūnada latā koṭi hema dā sādhanam yatas
manasā asādhanam yatra laṅkā alakṣmī prasādhanam
devatānām ca kavacam nānā dhyāna vratam mahat
antaryāga vidhānāni kali kāla phalāni ca
bhāti yatna prabhā ākāram prāyaścitta vimarṣaṇam

original: paṭalaṃ triṃśatā vyāptaṃ ye paṭhanti nirantaram || 1-99 ||
analyzed: paṭalam triṃśatā vyāptam ye paṭhanti nirantaram
avaśyam siddhim āpnoti yat yat icchati bhū tale
karmaṇā manasā vācā mahātantrasya sādhanam
karoti kamalānātha kara padma niṣevitam
jñātvā sarva dharam tantram sampūrṇam loka maṇḍale

original: prāpnoti sādhakaḥ siddhiṃ māsādeva na saṃśayaḥ |
analyzed: prāpnoti sādhakaḥ siddhim māsāt eva na saṃśayaḥ
nānā cakrasya māhātmyam nānā aṅka maṇḍala āvṛtam
taruṇa āditya saṃkāśam vanamālā vibhūṣitam
daivatam paramam haṃsam kālakūṭa āśinam prabhum
ādau dhyātvā pūjayitvā namaskuryāt maheśvaram
prathama aruṇa saṅkāśam ratna alaṅkāra bhūṣitam
vara dam vāruṇī mattam paramahaṃsam namāmi aham
bhairavaḥ uvāca

original: yadi na paṭhyate tantraṃ yāmalaṃ sarvaśaṅkaram |
analyzed: yadi na paṭhyate tantram yāmalam sarva śaṅkaram
tadā kena prakāreṇa sādhakaḥ siddhi bhāj bhavet  /
kecid ca buddhi hīnāḥ ca medhā hīnāḥ ca ye janāḥ
mandabhāgyāḥ ca dhūrtāḥ ca mūḍhāḥ sarva āpad āvṛtāḥ

original: prāpnuvanti kathaṃ siddhiṃ dayā jātā kathaṃ vada |
analyzed: prāpnuvanti katham siddhim dayā jātā katham vada
teṣu mūrkheṣu hīneṣu śāstra artha vajīteṣu ca
jñānam bhavati kena eva nirmalam
tad prakāram vada snehāt lokānām puṇya vṛddhaye
bhairavī uvāca
karma sūtram yaḥ chinatti pratyaham tanu saṃsthitaḥ
sa paśyati jagannātha mama śrī caraṇa ambujam
viśvam āveśa saṃskāra bhinna buddhi kriyā anvitāḥ
atas mām nahi jānanti nānā kārya utkaṭa āvṛtāḥ
teṣām śarīram gṛhṇāti kāla dūtaḥ bhayānakaḥ
yaḥ karoti mahā yogam tyāga sannyāsa dharmavān

original: mandabhāgyaḥ paśoryoniṃ prāpnoti māṃ vihāya saḥ |
analyzed: mandabhāgyaḥ paśoḥ yonim prāpnoti mām vihāya saḥ

original: mayi bhāvaṃ yaḥ karoti durlabho janavallabhaḥ || 1-112 ||
analyzed: mayi bhāvam yaḥ karoti durlabhaḥ jana vallabhaḥ
bhāvena labhyate sarvam bhāvena deva darśanam
bhāvena paramam jñānam tasmāt bhāva avalambanam
bhāvam ca sarva śāstrāṇām gūḍham sarva indriya sthitam
sarveṣām mūla bhūtam ca devī bhāvam yadā labhet
tadā eva sarva siddhiḥ ca tadā dhyāna dṛḍhaḥ bhavet
nitya snāna abhipūjā aṅgaḥ bhāvī bhāvam yadā labhet
kriyā dakṣaḥ mahā śikṣā nipuṇaḥ api jita indriyaḥ
sarva śāstra nigūḍha artha vettā

original: teṣāṃ hastagataṃ bhāvaṃ vada bhāvaṃ yathā tanau || 1-117 ||
analyzed: teṣām hasta gatam bhāvam vada bhāvam yathā tanau
bhāvāt parataram nā asti yena anugrahavān bhavet
bhāvāt anugraha prāptiḥ anugrahāt mahā sukhī
sukhāt puṇya prabhāvaḥ syāt puṇyāt acyuta darśanam
yadā kṛtasya darśana ambhoja darśana maṅgalam
yogī sūkṣma padam yoginām api adarśanam
paśyati eva mahā vidyā pāda ambhoruha pāvanam
gurūṇām paramahaṃsānām vākyam trailokya pāvanam
śrutvā sādhaka siddhi artham yogī yogam avāpnuyāt
pañjare śuka sārī ca patagāḥ pakṣi yonayaḥ
gṛhṇāti sādhakaḥ svargāt mad nāma vimalam mahat

original: yāvat jñānasya sañcāraṃ tāvat kālaṃ kuleśvara |
analyzed: yāvat jñānasya sañcāram tāvat kālam kula īśvara
sādhakānām ca sādhūnām nikaṭa sthaḥ bhavet naraḥ

original: vidyābhyāsī na patati yadi buddhiparo bhavet |
analyzed: vidyā abhyāsī na patati yadi buddhi paraḥ bhavet
nahi ced janma vyākhyā artham nānā śāstra artha bhāṣaṇam
sura jñānam binā kiñcid nahi siddhi ati bhū tale
mantram śrī kāya siddhiḥ ca katham bhavati bhairava
sāṃkhya jñānam veda bhāṣā vidhi jñānam tathā samam

original: śaktiṃ binā yathā śāktaṃ surajñānaṃ binā hi saḥ || 1-126 ||
analyzed: śaktim binā yathā śāktam sura jñānam binā hi saḥ  /
ahita ācāra sampattiḥ daridrasya gṛhe yathā
sādhakasya gṛhe śaktiḥ jñāna ācāra vivecanā
jāyate yadi sāyujya pada nāśāya kevalam
yadi ajñāna viśiṣṭā sā sva śaktiḥ śivakāminī

original: tadā na kuryād grahaṇā śaktisādhanameva ca |
analyzed: tadā na kuryāt grahaṇā śakti sādhanam eva ca
yadi kuryāt asaṃskārāt saṃsargam sādhaka uttamaḥ
a saṃskṛtya ādi doṣeṇa siddhi hāniḥ prajāyate
śakti pradhānam bhāvānām trayāṇām sādhakasya ca
divya vīra paśūnām ca bhāva trayam udāhṛtam
vīra bhāve kriyā siddhiḥ sākṣāt rudraḥ na saṃśayaḥ
divya bhāve vīra bhāve vibhinnam eka bhāvataḥ  /
aṇḍaḥ pūrvaḥ sarva gatam divya bhāvasya lakṣaṇam
divya bhāve devatāyāḥ darśanam parikītītam
vīra bhāve mantra siddhiḥ advaita ācāra lakṣaṇam
ādau bhāvam paśoḥ prāpya rātri karma vivarjayet
divase divase snānam pūjā nitya kriyā anvitaḥ
puraścaraṇa vat kāryam śuci bhāvena siddhi ati

original: paśubhāvaṃ vinā vīraḥ ko vaśī bhavati dhruvam |
analyzed: paśu bhāvam vinā vīraḥ kaḥ vaśī bhavati dhruvam
indriyāṇām ca damanam damanam śamanasya ca
sarva kṣaṇāt abhyasataḥ prabhāta avadhi rātriṣu
sarvakālam ca kartavyaḥ yogaḥ sarva sukha pradaḥ
vāñchā kalpatarum nityam taruṇam pātaka apaham
sādhayet avahitam mantrī paśu bhāva sthitaḥ yadi
yoga bhāṣā vidhi jñānam sarva bhāveṣu durlabham
tathā api paśu bhāvena śīghram siddhi ati niścitam
gurūṇām śrī pada ambhoje yasya bhaktiḥ dṛḍhā bhavet
sa bhavet kāmanā tyāgī bhāva mātra upalakṣaṇam
vīra bhāvaḥ mahā bhāvaḥ na bhāvam duṣṭa cetasām
bhāvam manda gatam sūkṣmam rudra mūrtyāḥ prasiddhi ati
bhraṣṭa ācāram mahā gūḍham trailokya maṅgalam śubham
pañcatattva ādi siddhi artham mahā moha mada udbhavam
sarva pīṭha kula ācāram haṭhāt ānanda sāgaram
kāruṇya vāridhim vīrasādhane bhakti kevalam
paśoḥ bhāve vīra ācāram tatas param

original: vīrācārād bhavedrudro'nyathā naiva ca naiva ca |
analyzed: vīra ācārāt bhavet rudraḥ nyathā nā eva ca nā eva ca
bhāva dvaya sthitaḥ mantrī divya bhāvam vicārayet
sadā śuci dīvya bhāvam ācaret su samāhitaḥ
devatāyāḥ priya artham ca sarva karma kula īśvara
yat yat tat sakalam siddhi ati asmāt dharma udayam śubham
devatā tulya bhāvaḥ ca devatāyāḥ kriyā paraḥ
tat viddhi devatā bhāvam su divya bhāj prakītītam
sarveṣām bhāva vargāṇām śakti mūlam na saṃśayaḥ
bhaktim kena prakāreṇa prāpnoti sādhaka uttamaḥ
deva śarīrasya nija kārya anuśāsanāt
jñānaḥ ca trividham proktam āgama ācāra sambhavam
śabdabrahma mayam tat hi jñāna mārgeṇa paśyati

original: kṛśe vivekamālambya nityaṃ jñānī ca sādhakaḥ || 1-151 ||

yoginī ādi sādhane ca tārācakram mahat phalam
rāśi cakram koṭi phalam nānā ratna pradam śubham
pratyaṅgirā sādhane ca ulkāvidyā ādi sādhane
śiva cakram mahā puṇyam sarva cakra phala pradam
viṣṇucakre koṭi śatam puṇyam prāpnoti mānavaḥ
chinnā ādi śrīvidyāyāḥ kṛtyādevyāḥ ca sādhane
nakṣatra vidyā kāma ākhyā brahmāṇī ādi susādhane
brahmacakram mahā puṇyam sarva vidyā phalam labhet
koṭi jāpyena yat puṇyam grahaṇāt tat phalam labhet
guhya kālī sādhane ca kubjikā mantra sādhane
deva cakram śubham proktam vākya siddhi pradāyakam
ṛṇi dhani mahā cakram vicārya sarva siddhi dam
śrīvidyā bhuvana īśānī bhairavī sādhane tathā
pṛthvī kulāvatī vīṇā sādhane vāmanī manoḥ
ulkā cakram mahā puṇyam rāja tva phala dam śubham
phetkārī mantra jāpye ca uḍḍīyāneśvarī manoḥ
drāviṇī dīrghajaṅghā ādi jvālāmukhī ādi sādhane
nārasiṃhī sādhane ca sūkṣma cakram phala udbhavam

original: vaiṣṇave ca tathā śaive devīmantre ca bhairava || 2-161 ||
analyzed: vaiṣṇave ca tathā śaive devī mantre ca bhairava
akatha ham mahā cakram vicārya yatna pūrvakam

original: yo gṛhṇāti mahāmantraṃ sa śivo nātra saṃśayaḥ || 2-162 ||
analyzed: yaḥ gṛhṇāti mahāmantram sa śivaḥ na atra saṃśayaḥ
iti śrī rudrayāmale uttara tantre mahā yantra uddīpane sarva cakra anuṣṭhāne
paṭalaḥ
atha tṛtīyaḥ paṭalaḥ
bhairavī uvāca
atha cakram pravakṣyāmi kāla akāla vicārakam
yad āśritaḥ mahāvīraḥ dīvyaḥ vā paśu bhāvavān
cakrarājam pravicārya siddha mantram na cālayet
prabalasya pracaṇḍasya prāsādasya mahā manoḥ  /
śakti kūṭa ādi mantrāṇām siddha ādīn na eva śodhayet
varāha arka nṛsiṃhasya tathā pañcākṣarasya ca
mahā mantrasya kālasya candracūḍasya sat manoḥ
napuṃsakasya mantrasya siddha ādīn na eva śodhayet  /
viṃśati arṇa adhikāḥ mantrāḥ mālāmantrāḥ prakītītāḥ
sūrya mantrasya yogasya kṛtyā mantrasya śaṅkara
śaṃbhu bījasya devasya siddha ādīn na eva śodhayet
cakreśvarasya candrasya varuṇasya mahā manoḥ
kālī tārā ādi mantrasya siddha ādīn na eva śodhayet
tathā api śodhayet mantram praśaṃsā param eva tat
yatra praśaṃsā paramam tat kāryam daivatam smṛtam

original: praśaṃsā yatra nāstyeva tatkāryaṃ nāpi kārayet || 3-8 ||
analyzed: praśaṃsā yatra na asti eva tat kāryam na api kārayet
atyanta phala dam mantram gṛhṇīyāt kula rakṣaṇāt

original: dhanimantraṃ na gṛhṇīyād akūlañca tathaiva ca || 3-9 ||
analyzed: dhani mantram na gṛhṇīyāt akūlam ca tathā eva ca
gṛhītvā nidhanam yāti koṭi jāpyena siddhi ati
mananam viśva vijñānam trāṇam saṃsāra bandhanāt
yatas karoti saṃsiddhau mantraḥ iti abhidhīyate

original: praṇavādyaṃ na dātavyaṃ mantraṃ śūdrāya sarvathā || 3-11 ||
analyzed: praṇava ādyam na dātavyam mantram śūdrāya sarvathā
ātma mantram guroḥ mantram mantram ca anapa saṃjñakam
pituḥ mantram tathā mātuḥ mantra siddhi pradam śubham
śūdraḥ nirayam āpnoti brāhmaṇaḥ yāti adhogatim
a dīkṣitāḥ ye kurvanti japa pūjā ādikāḥ kriyāḥ
na bhavanti śriye teṣām śilāyām upta bīja vat
devī dīkṣā vihīnasya na siddhiḥ na ca sat gatiḥ
tasmāt sarva prayatnena guruṇā dīkṣitaḥ bhavet
vicāram cakra sārasya karaṇīyam avaśyakam
a dīkṣitaḥ api maraṇe rauravam narakam vrajet

original: tasmāddīkṣā prayatnena sadā kāryā ca tāntrikāt || 3-16 ||
analyzed: tasmāt dīkṣā prayatnena sadā kāryā ca tāntrikāt
dīkṣā pūrva dine kuryāt su vicāram prayatnataḥ
tad prakāram prayatnena kāryam parvata pūjita
ādau akaḍame siddhiḥ mantram sañcārayet budhaḥ
rekhā dvayam pūrva pare madhye rekhā dvayam likhet
catuṣkoṇe catur rekhā kaḍamam cakra maṇḍalam
bhrāmayitvā mahā vṛttam nirmāya varṇam ālikhet
akāra ādi kṣakāra antān klība hīnān likhet tatas
ekaikam atas lekhyān meṣa ādiṣu vṛṣā mīna antakān
vāma āvartena gaṇayet kramaśas vīra vallabha
tantra mārgeṇa gaṇayet nāma ādi varṇaka ādimān
meṣa ādeḥ api mīna antam kramaśas śāstra paṇḍitaḥ
siddha sādhya susiddha ādīn punar siddha ādayaḥ punar
nava eka pañcame siddhaḥ sādhyaḥ ṣaṣ daśa yugmake
su siddhaḥ tri saptake rudre veda aṣṭa dvādaśe ripuḥ
etat te kathitam nātha akaḍama ādikam uttamam
padma ākāram mahā cakram dala aṣṭaka samanvitam

original: a ā varṇadvayaṃ pūrve dvitīye ca dvitīyakam |
analyzed: a ā varṇa dvayam pūrve dvitīye ca dvitīyakam
tṛtīye karṇa yugman ca caturthe nāsikā dvayam

original: pañcame nayanaṃ proktaṃ ṣaṣṭhe oṣṭhādharaṃ tathā |
analyzed: pañcame nayanam proktam ṣaṣṭhe oṣṭha adharam tathā
saptame danta yugmam ca aṣṭame ṣoḍaśa svaram  /
kavargaṃ ca pūrva dale dvitīye ca cavargaka

original: tṛtīye ca ṭavargañca caturthe ca tavargakam || 3-27 ||
analyzed: tṛtīye ca ṭavargam ca caturthe ca tavargakam
pavargam pañcame proktam yava antam ṣaṣṭha patrake
saptame śa ṣa sān likhya lahakṣam aṣṭamake pade  /

original: sukhaṃ rājyaṃ dhanaṃ vidyāṃ yauvanāyuṣameva ca |
analyzed: sukham rājyam dhanam vidyām yauvana āyuṣam eva ca
vicārya cakram āpnoti sva jīvanam
svīya nāma akṣaram tatra deva nāma akṣaram tathā
eka sthānam yuga sthānam virodham dvividham smṛtam
jīvanam maraṇam tatra akāra ādisu patrake
likhitvā gaṇayet mantrī maraṇam varjayet sadā

original: yatrāsti maraṇaṃ tatra jīvanaṃ nāsti niścitam |
analyzed: yatra asti maraṇam tatra jīvanam nā asti niścitam
paraspara virodhena siddha mantram ca mūla dam

original: jīvane jīvanaṃ grāhyaṃ sarvatra maraṇaṃ tyajet |
analyzed: jīvane jīvanam grāhyam sarvatra maraṇam tyajet
kulākulasya bhedam hi vakṣyāmi mantriṇām iha
vāyu agni bhū jala ākāśāḥ pañcāśat lipayaḥ kramāt
pañca hrasvāḥ pañca dīrghāḥ bindu antāḥ sandhi sambhavāḥ
ka ādayaḥ pañcaśas ṣa kṣaya ādi la saha kṣa antāḥ
sādhakasya akṣaram pūrvam mantrasya api tat akṣaram
yadi eka bhūta daivatyam jānīyāt sa kulam hitam
bhaumasya vāruṇam mitram āgneyasya api mārutam
pāthīvāṇām ca sarveṣām śatruḥ āgneyam ambhasām
ā indra vāruṇayoḥ śatruḥ mārutaḥ parikītītaḥ  /
pāthīve vāruṇam mitram taijasam śatruḥ īritaḥ
nābhasam sarva mitram syāt viruddham na eva śīlayet  /
rekhā aṣṭakam hi pūrva agram rekhā ekādaśa madhyatas
dakṣiṇa uttara bhāgena dakṣiṇa avadhim ālikhet  /
kulākulam ca kathitam tārā cakram punar śṛṇu
dakṣiṇa uttara deśe tu rekhā catuṣṭayam likhet
daśa rekhāḥ paścima agrāḥ kartavyāḥ vīravandita
aśvinī ādi krameṇa eva vilikhet tārakāḥ punar
vakṣyamāṇa krameṇa eva tad madhye varṇakān likhet
yugmam ekam tṛtīyam ca vedam eka eka yugmakam
eka yugmam tathā ekam ca yugalam yugalam yugam

original: ekaṃ yugmaṃ tṛtīyañca candranetraṃ vividhaṃ vidhum || 3-43 ||
analyzed: ekam yugmam tṛtīyam ca candranetram vividham vidhum
candra yugmam candra yugmam rāma vedam gṛhe śubhe
varṇāḥ kramāḥ svarāṇi eva revatī aśvi gatau ubhau
akāra dvayam aśvinyām devatā gaṇa sambhavāḥ
ikāram bharaṇī satyām kṛtsna musvara kṛttikā  /
rākṣasī kṛttikā bhūmau sarva vidhna vināśinī
nāsikā gaṇḍa mantram ca rohiṇī śava rūpiṇī
oṣṭha madhye mṛgaśirāḥ devatā parikītītā
adhara antam ārdrayā ca mānuṣam sarva lakṣaṇam
danta yugmam punarvasu ācchāditam mānuṣam priyam

original: kaḥ puṣyā devatā jñeyā khagāśleṣā ca rākṣasī || 3-48 ||
analyzed: kaḥ puṣyā devatā jñeyā khagāśleṣā ca rākṣasī

original: maghāvakṣe ghaṅāntā ca tathā ca pūrvaphālgunī |
analyzed: ghaṅa antā ca tathā ca pūrva phālgunī
chaja uttarāphalgunī ca manuṣyāḥ parikītītāḥ
jhañahastā devagaṇā ṭaṭhacitrā ca rākṣasī
ḍasvātī devaramaṇī viśākhā ḍhaṇarākṣasī
tathadā anurādhayā ca śobhitā deva nāyikā
jyeṣṭhā rākṣasī jñeyā
bha uttarāṣāḍhayā martyaḥ makāraḥ śravaṇaḥ mataḥ  /
dhaniṣṭhā strīlasthā śatabhiṣā tathā
vaśa pūrvabhādrapadāḥ manujāḥ parikītītāḥ
tathā uttarā bhādrapadā mānuṣī maṅgala udbhavā

original: aṃ aḥ ḷhakṣarevatī ca devakanyāḥ prakītītāḥ || 3-54 ||
analyzed: aṃ aḥ ḷha kṣarevatī ca deva kanyāḥ prakītītāḥ
sva jātau paramā prītiḥ madhyamā bhinna jātiṣu
rakṣaḥ mānuṣayoḥ nāśaḥ vairam dānava devayoḥ
mitram parama mitram ca gaṇayet ca punar punar
varjayet janma nakṣatram tṛtīyam pañca saptakam
ṣaṣ aṣṭa nava bhadrāṇi yugañca yugmakam tathā
yadi iha nija nakṣatram na jānāti dvijottamaḥ
nāma ādi akṣara sambhūtam sva tāram avirodhakam
vinīya gaṇayet mantrī śubha aśubha vicāravān
prādakṣiṇyena gaṇayet sādhaka ādi akṣarāt sudhīḥ
iti etat kathitam nātha mama ātmā puruṣa īśvara
kulākulam ananta ākhyam tārācakram manoḥ guṇa
etad vicāre mahatīm siddhim āpnoti mānavaḥ
rāśi cakram pravakṣyāmi siddhi lakṣaṇam uttamam
krameṇa deyā yugalā rekhā pūrva apara udgamā
tad madhyatas dvayam dadyāt rekhā agni dakṣiṇe tatas
agni nairṛti vāyavīśa krameṇa rekhayet tathā
vilikhet meṣa rāśi ādi mīna antam sarva varṇakān
kanyā gṛha gatān śādi varṇān ālikhya yatnataḥ
gaṇayet sādhakaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ lagna ādyām avyaya antakān
sva rāśi deva koṣṭhānām anukūlān bhajet manūn

original: rāśīnāṃ śuddhatā jñeyā tyajet śatrumṛtiṃ vyayam |
analyzed: rāśīnām śuddha tā jñeyā tyajet śatru mṛtim vyayam
sva rāśeḥ mantra rāśi antam gaṇanīyam vicakṣaṇaiḥ
sādhya ādi akṣara rāśi antam gaṇayet sādhaka akṣarāt

original: ekaṃ vā pañca navamaṃ bāndhavaṃ parikītītam || 3-67 ||
analyzed: ekam vā pañca navamam bāndhavam parikītītam
dvi ṣaṣ daśama saṃsthāḥ ca sevakāḥ parikītītāḥ
rāmarudrāḥ ca munayaḥ poṣakāḥ parikītītāḥ
sūrya aṣṭa veda yuktāḥ tu ghātakāḥ sarva doṣa dāḥ
śakti ādau tu mahādeva kula cūḍāmaṇiḥ yatiḥ
varjayet ṣaṣṭha geham ca aṣṭamam dvādaśam tathā
lagnam dhanam bhrātṛ bandhu putra śatru kalatrakāḥ
maraṇam dharma karma āya vyayāḥ dvādaśa rāśayaḥ
nāma anurūpam eteṣām śubha aśubha phalam diśet

original: vaiṣṇave tu mahāśatroḥ sthāne bandhuḥ prakītītaḥ |
analyzed: vaiṣṇave tu mahā śatroḥ sthāne bandhuḥ prakītītaḥ
kūrma cakram pravakṣyāmi śubha aśubha phala ātmakam
yat jñātvā sarva śāstrāṇi jānāti paṇḍita uttamaḥ
abhedya bhedakam cakram śṛṇuṣva ādara pūrvakam
kūrma ākāram mahā cakram catuṣpāda samāvṛtam
muṇḍe svarāḥ dakṣa pāde kavargam vāma pādake  /
cavargam kīti itam paścāt adhas pāde ṭavargakam
tad adhas tu tavargam syāt udare ca pavargakam  /
yava antam hṛdaye proktam saha antam pṛṣṭha madhyake
lāṅgūle śatru bījam ca kṣakāram liṅga madhyake
likhitvā gaṇayet mantrī cakram kali mala apaham

original: svare lābhaṃ kavarge śrīścavarge ca vivekadam || 3-77 ||
analyzed: svare lābham kavarge śrīḥ cavarge ca viveka dam
ṭavarge rāja padavīm tavarge dhanavān bhavet
udare sarva nāśaḥ syāt hṛdaye bahu duḥkha dam

original: pṛṣṭhe ca sarvasantoṣaṃ lāṅgūle maraṇaṃ dhruvam |
analyzed: pṛṣṭhe ca sarva santoṣam lāṅgūle maraṇam dhruvam
vaibhavam pṛṣṭha liṅga deśe tu duḥkham ca vāma pādake
viruddha dvaya lābhe tu na kuryāt cakra cintanam
viruddha eke dharma nāśaḥ yugma doṣe ca māraṇam
yatra deva akṣaran ca asti tatra ced nija varṇakam
viruddhaḥ ced tyajet śatrum anya mantram vicārayet
pṛthak sthāne yadi bhavet varṇamālā maheśvara

original: yadi tat saukhyabhāvaḥ syāt saukhyaṃ nāpi vivarjayet || 3-82 ||
analyzed: yadi tat saukhya bhāvaḥ syāt saukhyam na api vivarjayet
vibhinna gehe doṣaḥ ced śubha mantram ca santyajet
iti te kathitam devideva dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa phala pradam
yaḥ śodhayet caret varṇam mantramālā mahā īśvaraḥ
yadi śudhyati cakra indram mantra siddhi pradam śubham
śiva cakram pravakṣyāmi mahākāla kula īśvara
avaśyam siddhim āpnoti śivacakra prabhāvataḥ
ṣaṣ koṇa madhya deśe tu catur asram likhet budhaḥ
tad madhye vilikhet cāru catur asram sa varṇakam
mastaka stha trikoṇe tu śiva saṃsthāna mantrakam
dakṣiṇa āvartamānena gaṇayet sarva mantrakam
viṣṇu sthāne sva mantrañca dvitīye ca trikoṇake
trikoṇe ca tṛtīye ca brahma saṃsthāna mantrakam
śakti mantra ādi saṃsthānam trikoṇa adhas mukhe tathā
nāyikā mantra saṃsthānam trikoṇa adhas mukhe tathā
nāyikā mantra saṃsthānam tat vāme durlabham śubham
tad ūdrdhve ca trikoṇe ca bhūta saṃsthāna mantrakam
śiva adhas yakṣa mantrasya saṃsthānam ati durlabham
svara sthānam tathā varṇa sthānam śṛṇu mahā prabho
a ā varṇam dvayam śaive kavargam ca sa bindukam

original: viṣṇau netraṃ cavargañca ṭavargaṃ brahmaṇi śrutam |
analyzed: viṣṇau netram cavargam ca ṭavargam brahmaṇi śrutam
tavargam nāsikā śaktau sarva mantra artha cetanam
nāyikāyām pavargam ca na yugam parikītītam
bhūte yava antam vilikhet oṣṭha adhara samanvitam
praṇavam yakṣa mantre ca śakāram
adhas dantam piśāce ca ṣa yuktam bindu bhūṣitam
śivaḥ bījam devamantre sakāram ca sa bindukam
mahāvidyā ādi saṃsthāne lakṣa varṇam prakītītam

original: iti te kathitaṃ śambho śṛṇu varṇāṅka(ṅga)varṇanam |
analyzed: iti te kathitam śambho śṛṇu
śive ekaviṃśatiḥ ca dvātriṃśat viṣṇukoṇake  /
brahmaṇe ṣoḍaśa ādyam ca śaktikūṭe yuga aṣṭakam
nāyikāyām vahni bāṇam bhūte sapta aṅkam eva ca
yakṣe ca candravedaḥ ca piśāceṣṭavasuḥ smṛtaḥ
sarvadeve bāṇa vedam kṛtyāyām ṣaṣṭha ṣaṣṭhakam
madhye ṣaṣṭhe hutāśan ca mahā vidyā gṛhe śubhe
sādhakasya ca sādhyasya eka aṅkam sādhya mandire
sādhaka aṅkam ūrdhva deśe sādhya aṅkam gaṇayet adhas

original: bhujayugmaṃ śive proktaṃ viṣṇau vāmāṣṭakaṃ tathā || 3-101 ||
analyzed: bhuja yugmam śive proktam viṣṇau vāma aṣṭakam tathā

original: ṛṣicandraṃ vidhau proktaṃ śaktau rāmāṣṭakaṃ tathā |
analyzed: ṛṣi candram vidhau proktam śaktau rāmāṣṭakam tathā
nāyikāyām veda bāṇam bhūta iṣṭa navamam tathā

original: yakṣe yugmaṃ caturthaṃ ca piśāce vajrakāṣṭakam |
analyzed: yakṣe yugmam caturtham ca piśāce vajraka aṣṭakam
śaktau vaśa kṛtau jñeyau kṛtyālayām muni ṣaṣṭhakam

original: yasmin yasmin gṛhasthā ye devatāstu mahāphalāḥ | ka0 |
analyzed: yasmin yasmin gṛhasthāḥ ye devatāḥ tu mahā phalāḥ
a nāma akṣara deha stham akṣaram dviguṇam smṛtam
sādhya aṅkena yojayitvā pūrayet ṣaṣṭha pañcamaiḥ
tad geham grāhayet yatnāt devatā ādi akṣaram yathā
eka śeṣa sthitam varṇam kuryāt na api vivecanam
śuddham tat hi vijānīyāt vicāram anyatas api ca

original: ṣaṣṭhāṅkena ca vedāṅkaṃ tathā ca devavarṇakam || 3-106 ||
analyzed: ṣaṣṭha aṅkena ca veda aṅkam tathā ca deva varṇakam

original: śaśāṅkaṃ miśritaṃ cāṅkaṃ dviguṇaṃ devatārṇakam | ka0 |
analyzed: śaśāṅkam miśritam ca aṅkam dviguṇam devatā arṇakam ka
paścāt kṛtvā tad aṅkam ca haret rāmeṇa vallabha

original: yadi sādhyāṅkaṃ vistīrṇaṃ tadā naiva śubhaṃ bhavet || 3-107 ||
analyzed: yadi sādhya aṅkam vistīrṇam tadā nā eva śubham bhavet  /
sādhaka aṅkam ca vistīrṇam yadi syāt jāyate gṛhe
tadā sarva kula īśaḥ syāt rudra śravaṇa saṃśayaḥ
dviguṇam devatā varṇam sādhaka aṅkena yojayet
varṇa saṃkhyā aṅkam ālikhya gaṇayet sādhaka uttamaḥ
rasa bāṇena sampūrya saṃharet rasa saṃkhyayā
ātma aṅka miśritam paścāt yadi kiñcid na tiṣṭhati
svīya abhidhānaka aṅkasya dviguṇam ca api yojayet
paścāt anala saṃkhyābhiḥ haret
aṅkam bahutaram grāhyam sādhakasya sukha āvaham
na grāhyam sādhya vistīrṇam imati śāstra artha niścayam
vicārāt asya cakrasya rāja tvam labhate dhruvam
samāna aṅkena gṛhṇīyāt guṇya aṅkam varjayet iha
avaśyam cakram evam hi gopanīyam sura asuraiḥ
viṣṇucakram pravakṣyāmi cakra ākāram su gopanam
sarva siddhi pradam śuddham cakram kṛtvā phala pradam
śṛṇu nātha mahā viṣṇoḥ sthānam maṅgala dāyakam
lakṣmī priyam aṅka mayam nava koṇam mahā prabham
tad ūrdhve ca tam ālikhya tad ūdrdhva iṣṭa graham śubham
catuṣkoṇa ākāra geham sandhau śūnya aṣṭakam likhet
tad ūrdhve ca tam ālikhya cakram etat dhaneśvara
pūrve
muniḥ ā makha candra ādyam aṅkam sarva samṛddhi dam
dakṣiṇe vahni bharaṇam rasa vede kha yugmakam
tad adhas rāmacakram ca sapta ṣaṭsu ca rāmakam  /
tad adhas nirṛte svarge yuga aṅka śūnya vedakam
kevala adhas jaleśasya mandiram su manoharam
rāmeṣu śūnya bāṇa āḍhyam tasyām eva āyu mandiram
bhuja hasta khara sāḍhyam cakra idam īśvara ātmakam
nava koṇam madhya deśe pañcāṅga bhāgam ālikhet
tad madhye racayet varṇam pañcakoṇe trikoṇake  /
indra adhas vilikhet dhīraḥ varṇam ādyam ca saptakam
bhāge dakṣiṇa koṇeṣu ṛkārāt aṅkakam likhet  /
kakāra ādi ṭakāra antam tad adhas vilikhet budhaḥ
tad vāme varṇa lakṣaṇa kāraṇam
tad ūdrdhve ya ādi varṇam ca cakram ca gaṇayet tatas
pūrva koṇa patiḥ śakraḥ dvitīya īśau yama analau
nirṛtiḥ varuṇaḥ ca eva tṛtīya mandira īśvaraḥ
caturtha adhipatiḥ vāyuḥ kuberaḥ nāthaḥ iti api
pañcakoṇe pratiṣṭhanti pañcabhūta āśaya sthitāḥ
prāṇe siddhim avāpnoti ca apāne vyādhi pīḍanam
samāne sarva sampattiḥ udāne nirdhanam bhavet
vyāne ca īśvara prāptiḥ etasmin lakṣaṇam śubham
pūrva gehe mahāmantram mantra tyāgam karoti yaḥ
sa tāvat sādhaka śreṣṭhaḥ viṣṇu mārgeṇa śaṅkara
viśeṣam śṛṇu yatnena sa avadhāna avadhāraya
sapta akṣaram tri akṣaram ca daśama akṣaram eva ca
pūrva gehe yadi bhavet ādya akṣara samanvitam
tadā bhavati siddhiḥ ca sarvam evaṃprakārakam
ṣaṣṭha akṣaram veda varṇam viṃśati arṇam mahā manum
āmnāya ādi akṣaram vyāptam sa phalam gaṇayet budhaḥ

original: tathāsmin mama gehe ca mantraṃ saptākṣaraṃ śubham || 3-133 ||
analyzed: tathā asmin mama gehe ca mantram sapta akṣaram śubham
ṣaṣṭha akṣaram ca gaṇayet triṃśat akṣaram eva ca
ādya akṣara samāyuktam sādhya sādhakayoḥ api
ekasya api ca lābhe ca mantra siddhiḥ akhaṇḍitā
mantra akṣara ādi lābham ca avaśyam gaṇayet iha
nairṛte ca jaleśasya dvayakṣaram ca nava akṣaram
śūnyadeva akṣaram nātha gaṇanīyam vicakṣaṇaiḥ  /
tathā atra akṣaram mantram pañca akṣara manam tathā
pañcāśat akṣaram mantram mandire gaṇayet śubham
vāyukoṇe kuberasya mandire gaṇayet tathā
dvāviṃśati akṣaram mantram śūnya ṣaṣṭha manum tathā
pañcākṣaram tārikāyāḥ śive pañcākṣaram tathā
su sapta mantra grahaṇe sa phalam
īśāna pañcakoṇe ca sa phalam ca nava akṣaram

original: aṣṭākṣaraṃ hi vidyāyā gaṇayet sahitaṃ sudhīḥ || 3-140 ||
analyzed: aṣṭa akṣaram hi vidyāyāḥ gaṇayet sahitam sudhīḥ
etat uktam ca gaṇayet viruddham na eva śīlayet
prāṇa mitram samānam ca samānaḥ vyāna bāndhavaḥ

original: etatsthitañca gṛhṇīyād doṣabhāk sa bhavet kvacit |
analyzed: etad sthitam ca gṛhṇīyāt doṣa bhāj sa bhavet kvacid
ekadā eva priye prītiḥ eka gehe tathā priyam
gṛhītvā viṣṇu padavīm prāpnoti mānavaḥ kṣaṇāt

original: yadi cakraṃ na vicārya ripumantraṃ sadā nyaset || 3-143 ||
analyzed: yadi cakram na vicārya ripu mantram sadā nyaset
nija āyuṣam chinatti eva mūkaḥ bhavati niścitam

original: vicārya yadi yatnena sarvacakre priyaṃ hitam || 3-144 ||
analyzed: vicārya yadi yatnena sarva cakre priyam hitam
mahā mantram mahādeva laghu siddhi ati bhū tale
iti śrī rudrayāmale uttara tantre mahā tantra uddīpane sarva cakra anuṣṭhāne
siddha mantra prakaraṇe bhāva nirṇaye bhairava bhairavī saṃvāde tṛtīyaḥ
paṭalaḥ
atha caturthaḥ paṭalaḥ
śrī bhairavī uvāca

original: atha vakṣyāmi cakrānyat śṛṇu bhairava sādaram |
analyzed: atha vakṣyāmi cakra anyat śṛṇu bhairava sādaram

original: yena hīnā na siddhyanti mahāvidyā varapradāḥ || 4-1 ||
analyzed: yena hīnāḥ na mahāvidyāḥ vara pradāḥ
tava cakram brahmaṇā vyaktam brahmacakram udāhṛtam

original: yasya jñānāt svayaṃ brahmā svabalena bhavaṃ sṛjet || 4-2 ||
analyzed: yasya jñānāt svayam brahmā sva balena bhavam sṛjet  /
akāla mṛtyu haraṇam param brahma padam vraje
catuṣkoṇe catuṣkoṇam tad madhye ca catuḥ catuḥ
madhya geham veṣṭayitvā iṣṭam mandiram uttamam
aṣṭakoṇe mahādeva ṣoḍaśa svaram ālikhet  /
likhet
madhya gehe catuṣkoṇe ka ādi kṣa antam ca varṇakam
dakṣiṇa āvartta yogena vilikhet sādhaka uttamaḥ

original: tadūdrdhve svagṛhe cāṅkaṃ vilikhya gaṇayet sudhīḥ || 4-6 ||
analyzed: tad ūdrdhve sva gṛhe ca aṅkam vilikhya gaṇayet sudhīḥ
catur gehasya ūdrdhva deśe yugma gehe kramāt likhet
sādhyasya sādhakasya api meṣa ādi kanyakā antakam
adhas likhet tulā ādi antam iti rāśi ādikam śubham
tatas likhet geha dakṣe yugma gehe maheśvara
tārakān aśvinī tārā ādi antān dakṣiṇatas likhet
ū drdhva adhas kramaśas lekhyam aṅga tāram sureśvara

original: tato hi gaṇayenmantrī yojayitvā krameṇa tu || 4-10 ||
analyzed: tatas hi gaṇayet mantrī yojayitvā krameṇa tu

original: sukhaṃ rājyaṃ dhanaṃ vṛddhiṃ kalahaṃ kāladarśanam |
analyzed: sukham rājyam dhanam vṛddhim kalaham kāla darśanam
siddhim ṛddhim aṣṭakoṇe viditvā ca śubha aśubham
gaṇayet rāśi nakṣatram manu ca aham vivarjayet
sukhe sukham avāpnoti rājye rājyam avāpnuyāt
dhane dhanam avāpnoti vṛddhau vṛddhim avāpnuyāt

original: meṣo vṛṣamithunaśca karkaṭaḥ siṃha eva ca |
analyzed: meṣaḥ vṛṣa mithunaḥ ca karkaṭaḥ siṃhaḥ eva ca

original: kanyakā devatā jñeyā nakṣatrāṇi punaḥ śṛṇu || 4-13 ||
analyzed: kanyakā devatā jñeyā nakṣatrāṇi punar śṛṇu
ūrdhva yugma gṛhasya api dakṣa vāme ca bhāgake

original: nakṣatrāṇi santi yāni tāni śṛṇu mahāprabho || 4-14 ||
analyzed: nakṣatrāṇi santi yāni tāni śṛṇu mahā prabho
aśvinī mṛgaśira āśleṣā hastā anurādhikā tathā
uttara āṣāḍhikā ārdrā vā pūrvabhādrapadā tathā
dakṣa agra hastitāḥ tārāḥ spaṣṭībhūtāḥ ca devatāḥ
etāsām adhipāḥ ete rāśayaḥ graha rūpiṇaḥ
karkaṭakeśarī kanyā devatāḥ
eteṣām ca api varṇānām adhipāḥ ca iti rāśayaḥ
kakārasya ḍha khakārasya ñakārasya ṭakāra paḥ
dakārasya phakārasya yakārasya sakāra paḥ  /
nakārasya api patayaḥ jñeyāḥ ca kramaśas prabho
saṃśṛṇu rohiṇī puṣyā tathā ca uttara phālgunī

original: viśākhā ca tathā jñeyā pūrvāṣāḍhā ca tārakā |
analyzed: viśākhā ca tathā jñeyā pūrvāṣāḍhā ca tārakā
tathā śatabhiṣā tārāḥ vāma mandira parvagāḥ
etāsām adhipāḥ ete rāśayaḥ graha rūpiṇaḥ
meṣaḥ vṛṣaḥ mithunaḥ ca īśvarāḥ parikītītāḥ
etad geha sthitam varṇam ete rakṣanti anityaśas
kakārasya nakārasya ṛkārasya ukāra paḥ
akārasya pakārasya makārasya vakāra paḥ
hakārasya adhipāḥ ete ṛddhi mokṣa phala pradāḥ
dakṣiṇa adhogṛhasya api devatāḥ iti rāśayaḥ
tulā ca vṛścikaḥ ca eva dhanuḥ ca eva graheśvaraḥ
etāsām tārakāṇām ca patayaḥ gaditāḥ mayā
bharaṇī ārdra maghā citrā jyeṣṭhā śravaṇa vallabhāḥ
tathā uttara bhādrapadāḥ vallabhāḥ rāśayaḥ matāḥ

original: atha gehasthitaṃ varṇaṃ śṛṇu nātha bhayāpaha || 4-26 ||
analyzed: atha geha sthitam varṇam śṛṇu nātha bhaya apaha
yakārasya dakārasya ṭakārasya nakāra paḥ
dhakārasya vakārasya cakārasya yakāra paḥ  /
kṣakārapaṇakāḥ ete rāśayaḥ parikītītāḥ
dhana vṛtti pradāḥ nityāḥ nitya sthāna nivāsinaḥ
vāma adhas mandirasya api vallabhāḥ iti rāśayaḥ
makara adhas tu koṣṭheṣu mīnaḥ rāśi phala sthitāḥ
etāni bhāni rakṣanti śūla pāśa asi dhārakāḥ
punarvasuḥ kṛttikā ca tathā ābham pūrva phalgunī

original: svātī mūlā dhaniṣṭhā ca revatī vāmagehagāḥ |
analyzed: svātī mūlā dhaniṣṭhā ca revatī vāma geha gāḥ
etāsām adhipāḥ ete jala sthāḥ graha devatāḥ  /

original: etān varṇān prarakṣanti gṛhasthā nava rāśayaḥ |
analyzed: etān varṇān prarakṣanti gṛhasthāḥ nava rāśayaḥ
dhakārasya jakārasya ṭakārasya takāra paḥ
nakārasya bhakārasya lakārasya takāra paḥ
kalaha ādi mahā doṣa kāla darśana kārakāḥ
rāśayaḥ loka hāḥ nātha tad mantram parivarjayet
yadi eka devatā geham vibhinnam ca su śobhanam
catuḥ sthānam yuga sthānam sarvatra api niṣedhakam
eka geha sthitam mantram bahu saukhya pradāyakam
nāmnaḥ ādi akṣaram nītvā rāśi nakṣatra vismṛtau
sabhāvam sādhaka śreṣṭhaḥ kalahe kalaham bhavet
ripuḥ ced mūla nāśaḥ syāt kalahaḥ api sureśvara

original: netrayugmaṃ svaraṃ pāti siṃho hi kanyakāṃ tathā || 4-37 ||
analyzed: netra yugmam svaram pāti siṃhaḥ hi kanyakām tathā

original: karṇayugmaṃ tulā pāti saṃyugaṃ vṛściko dhanuḥ |
analyzed: karṇa yugmam tulā pāti saṃyugam vṛścikaḥ dhanuḥ

original: cayugaṃ makaraḥ pāti kumbho mīnaśca pāti hi || 4-38 ||
analyzed: cayugam makaraḥ pāti kumbhaḥ mīnaḥ ca pāti hi

original: oṣṭhañca pāti ca tathā adharaṃ meṣa eva ca |
analyzed: oṣṭham ca pāti ca tathā adharam meṣaḥ eva ca
danta yugmam vṛṣaḥ pāti mithunaḥ śeṣa ga ukṣaraḥ

original: yasya ye ye rāśayaḥ syustasya tattacchubhaṃ smṛtam |
analyzed: yasya ye ye rāśayaḥ syuḥ tasya tat tat śubham smṛtam

original: ekarāśiḥ śubhaṃ nityaṃ dadāti ca manoratham || 4-40 ||
analyzed: eka rāśiḥ śubham nityam dadāti ca manoratham

original: anyatra dukhadaṃ proktaṃ sādhakaḥ siddhibhāg bhavet |
analyzed: anyatra dukha dam proktam sādhakaḥ siddhi bhāj bhavet
bhinna rāśau varjanīyam kalaham kāla darśanam
śrūyatām śailajānātha cakram śrī tridaśa ātmakam
pūrva paścima bhedena ṣaḍ ca rekhāḥ samālikhet
vāma ādi dakṣiṇa antam ca rekhāḥ daśa samālikhet
tad madhye racayet akṣam devatā graha saṃyutam
pūraka aṅkam madhya gehe saptaṣī yuktam ālikhet
tad dakṣiṇe tad dakṣeṇa rasam tathā
tat dakṣe aṣṭadaśake tat dakṣe ṣoḍaśa smṛtam
pūraka aṅkam tatas lekhyam indra ādi aṅkāḥ ca dakṣataḥ
indra gehe ca śatakam vidhi vidyā phala pradam
dharma gehe śūnya sapta yugalam vilikhet budhaḥ
ananta mandire nātha śūnya aṣṭa vasuḥ eva ca  /
kālī gṛhe śūnya veda vāma ādya aṅkam vilikhet tatas
dhūmāvatī mandire ca śūnya kheṣu niśāpatim
indra ādyāḥ dakṣatas lekhyāḥ aṅkāḥ candra adhidevatāḥ
śūnya aṣṭa candra yuktam ca sarvatra devatāḥ likhet
tathā aśvinī kumārau ca śūnya anala yuga ayugau
tad paścāt pūrva geham ca sahasra arka samanvitam
tāriṇī mandira stha aṅkam śūnya vedam tathā eva ca
tatas candragṛhasya adhas vāyuḥ geham manoramam
paścāt ekatra hastam ca kha śūnya yugala ātmakam
ṣoḍaśī mandire śūnyam aṣṭa candra samanvitam
mātaṅgī mandire śūnya rudra candra samanvitam
vāyoḥ adhas varuṇasya gṛham sapta śaśi priyam
taruṇī geha madhye ca śūnya aṣṭaka samanvitam
budha geha sthita aṅkam ca śūnya candra yuga ātmakam

original: varuṇādhaḥ kuberasya gṛhasthaṃ ṣaṭ ca yugmakam |
analyzed: varuṇa adhas kuberasya gṛha stham ṣaṣ ca yugmakam
ānantabhairavī gehe daśakam
dharaṇī gṛha madhye ca śūnya yugma indu saṃyutam
rāśi gṛha sthitam
kubera adhas svakam cakra sthita aṅkam sarva siddhi dam
īśvarasya gṛha sthañca sapta śūnya yuga ātmakam
tiraskariṇyāḥ geha stham sahasra aṅka samanvitam
kiṅkiṇī mandiram paścāt aṣṭa candra samanvitam
chinnamastāgṛham paścāt śūnya aṣṭa candra maṇḍalam
vāgīśvarī gṛham paścāt saptamam candra maṇḍalam
mahā phala pradātāram dharmaḥ rakṣati tam punar
īśvarasya adhas gehe baṭukasya gṛham tatas
śūnya aṣṭama ādyam sva gṛham dharma artha kāma mokṣa dam
tad paścāt ḍākinī geham kha śūnya muni saṃyutam

original: hanti sādhakasaukhyaṃ hi kṣaṇādeva na saṃśayaḥ || 4-64 ||
analyzed: hanti sādhaka saukhyam hi kṣaṇāt eva na saṃśayaḥ
sva gṛhe svīya mantrasya phala dam
bhīmā devī gṛham paścāt kha sapta candra maṇḍalam
bhaya dam sarva deśe tu varjayet gṛha antaram
lakṣa varṇam likhet śeṣa gṛhe dve paṇḍita uttamaḥ
indra geha avadhim dhīraḥ vakāra ādika varṇakam
kṣakāra antam likhet tatra gaṇayet sādhakaḥ tatas
pūraka aṅkam ūrdhva deśe hāraka aṅkam adhas likhet
nija nāma akṣaram yatra tat koṣṭha aṅkam maheśvara  /
ca pūjayet vidvān sva sva geha ūrdhva deśa gaiḥ
aṅkaiḥ tatas hareḥ nātha adhas ṅke hārya śeṣakam
vistāram ced devatā aṅgaḥ tad aṅgaḥ śubha daḥ smṛtaḥ
alpa aṅgaḥ śubha daḥ proktaḥ sādhakasya sukha āvahaḥ
eka akṣare mahā saukhyam tatra api gaṇayet vacaḥ
dhīra aṅkaḥ śūnya gāmī ca devatā aṅkaḥ tathā vibho
tadā nā eva śubham vidyāt aśubhāya prakalpyate
eke dhanam avāpnoti dvitīye rāja vallabhaḥ
tṛtīye jāpya siddhiḥ syāt caturthe maraṇam dhruvam

original: pañcame pañcamānaḥ syāt ṣaṣṭhe duḥkhotkaṭāni ca || 4-73 ||
analyzed: pañcame pañca mānaḥ syāt ṣaṣṭhe duḥkha utkaṭāni ca  /
śaivānām śākta varṇānām iti aṅkaḥ parigṛhyate
vaiṣṇavānām niṣedhe ca pañcama aṅkaḥ niṣedhakaḥ

original: yāsāṃ yāsāṃ devatānāṃ hiṃsā tiṣṭhati cetasi |
analyzed: yāsām yāsām devatānām hiṃsā tiṣṭhati cetasi
tad mantra grahaṇāt eva aṣṭa aiśvarya yutaḥ bhavet

original: yaddevasyāśritā ye tu tadgṛhāṅkaṃ haranti te |
analyzed: yat devasya āśritāḥ ye tu tad gṛha aṅkam haranti te
ūdrdhva aṅkena adhas oṅkena haret sadā
ṛṇi dhani mahā cakram vakṣyāmi śṛṇu tattvataḥ
darśanāt eva koṣṭhasya jānāti pūrva janma gam
devam bahutara aṅgeṣu jñātvā siddhi īśvaraḥ bhavet
nija sevyām mahāvidyām gṛhītvā muktim āpnuyāt
koṣṭha śuddham ca mantram ca ye gṛhṇanti dvijottamāḥ
teṣām duḥkhāni naśyanti mama ājñā balavattarā
na hātavyam mahā mantram sat guru priya darśanāt

original: tatra koṣṭhaṃ na vicāryaṃ cejjānāti vicāryakam |
analyzed: tatra koṣṭham na vicāryam ced jānāti vicāryakam
avicāre ca ukta phalam dadāti kāmasundarī
koṣṭhāni ekādaśāni eva devena pūritāni ca
akāra ādi hakāra antam likhet koṣṭheṣu tattva vid
prathamam pañca koṣṭheṣu hrasva dīrgha krameṇa tu

original: dvayaṃ dvayaṃ likhettatra vicāre khalu sādhakaḥ |
analyzed: dvayam dvayam likhet tatra vicāre khalu sādhakaḥ
śeṣeṣu ekaikaśas varṇān kramaśas tu likhet sudhīḥ
dvayasya arddha avadhiḥ tu kramaśas ūṅkakam
ādya mandira madhye tu ṣaṣṭha aṅkam vilikhet budhaḥ

original: dvitīye ṣaṣṭhacinhañca tṛtīye ca gṛhe tathā |
analyzed: dvitīye ṣaṣṭha cinham ca tṛtīye ca gṛhe tathā
caturthe gagana aṅkam ca pañcame cakra trayam tathā
ṣaṣṭha cāpe caturtham ca saptame ca caturthakam
aṣṭame gagana aṅkam ca navame daśamam tathā
śeṣa mandira madhye tu traya aṅkam vilikhet tatas

original: ete nātha sādhyavarṇāḥ kathitāḥ kramaśo dhruvam || 4-88 ||
analyzed: ete nātha sādhya varṇāḥ kathitāḥ kramaśas dhruvam
kathayāmi sādhaka arṇam sakala artha nirūpaṇam
ādya gehe dvitīyam ca dvitīye ca tṛtīyakam
tṛtīye pañcamam proktam gaganam veda pañcake
ṣaṣṭhe yugalam evam hi saptame candra maṇḍalam

original: aṣṭame gaganaṃ proktaṃ navame ca caturthakam |
analyzed: aṣṭame gaganam proktam navame ca caturthakam

original: adhikaṃ ca ṛṇaṃ proktaṃ taccheṣaṃ dhanamucyate || 4-105 ||

athavā anya prakāram ca sakalān sādhaka akṣarān
svara vyañjana bhedena dvi guṇīkṛtya sādhakaḥ
sādhya yuktam tatas kṛtvā svara vyañjana bhedakam
aṣṭābhiḥ saṃharet aṅkam śṛṇu saṃhāra vigraham
pūrva cāra kramam samyak sarvatra api śubha aśubham
asya vicāra mātreṇa siddhiḥ sarva artha sādhikā
pūrva janma ārādhitāyām tām prāpnoti hi devatām
atha anyat sampravakṣyāmi sa avadhāna avadhāraya

skandha deśa avadhiḥ nātha puccha paryantam eva ca
eka akṣara ādi mantra ādi dvādaśānta akṣara ātmakam
vilikhet pṛṣṭha deśe tu śubha aśubha viśuddhaye

original: pucchasthaṃ nāpi gṛhṇīyāt mukhasthañca tathā dhruvam || 4-116 ||
analyzed: puccha stham na api gṛhṇīyāt mukha stham ca tathā dhruvam

original: mastakasthaṃ śubhaṃ proktaṃ mukhavarṇān śṛṇu prabho |
analyzed: mastaka stham śubham proktam mukha varṇān śṛṇu prabho
tricatvāriṃśat arṇa ādi ekapañcāśat antakam  /
mukha stham antam aśubham na gṛhṇīyāt kadācana
pṛṣṭha stham śṛṇu yatnena nirarthaka mahā āśramam
śrama gātrasya pīḍābhiḥ devatā kupyate niśam
dvipañcāśat akṣara ādi ekaṣaṣṭitama antakān  /
varṇān puccha sthitān etān netra sthān śṛṇu vallabha
dviṣaṣṭitama varṇa ādi catuḥṣaṣṭi akṣara antakān
aṅkam locana saṃstham ca tatonyam rasanā sthitam
tat sarvam śubha dam proktam etat anyatamam smṛtam
vaiṣṇavānām ca śaivānām śāktānām mantra jāpane
tatonya deva bhaktānām bhukti mukti pradam nṛṇām
atha vakṣye mahādeva cakra sāram su durlabham
rāmacakram mahāvidyā sarva mandiram eva ca
sarva siddhi pradam mantram nija nāma stham āśrayet
tadā eva siddhim āpnoti satyam satyam maheśvara
tad prakāram śṛṇu krodhabhairava priya vallabha
nava aṅkān pralikhet vidvān vāma dakṣiṇa bhāgataḥ
tad madhye kramaśas dadyāt tathā saptadaśa aṅkakān
dakṣiṇa ādi krameṇa evam ukta vidyāḥ samālikhet
akāra ādi kṣakāra antam sarvasmin mandire likhet
bāla ādi devatāḥ sarvāḥ bhrāmarī antāḥ ca devatāḥ
asya ākāśa vidhe gehe sa anta nityam phala pradam
ādi kṣānta arṇa mandire
vilikhet
kṣakāra ādi anulomena akāra antam likhet tatas
punar tad śeṣa vidyāḥ ca śeṣa gehe likhet sadā

krameṇa śṛṇu tat sarvam sa avadhāna avadhāraya
dakṣiṇa āvarta yogena gaṇayet kramaśas budhaḥ
vasu sapta pañca meṣu vahni veda analaḥ tathā
muni ṣaṣṭha ādya vedāḥ ca sapta iṣu munayaḥ tathā
pañca veda iṣu vasavaḥ vedeṣu vahnayaḥ tathā

ākāśa anantare gehe analam
tat paścāt sarva geheṣu sarva aṅkam dakṣatas śṛṇu
vahni vahni veda vahni veda vahnayaḥ eva ca
śravaṇa akṣi veda bāṇa vedeṣu saptakaḥ tathā
ṣaṣṭha aṣṭa saptamāḥ proktāḥ vahni agnīṣu muniḥ tathā
bāṇa vedāḥ ca muni agni vahnayaḥ tathā
pañca sapta anala agniḥ ca vahni iṣu bāṇa bāṇakāḥ
bāṇa veda kānta veda kānta śruti caturthakāḥ
rāmaṣī muni ṣaṣṭhāḥ ca sapteṣu rāmavedakāḥ

vahni agni veda bāṇāḥ ca vasu aṣṭa anala vedakāḥ
sapta aṣṭamāḥ ca samproktāḥ gṛha aṅkāḥ parikītītāḥ

original: yeṣāṃ manasi yā vidyā sadā tiṣṭhati bhāvane |
analyzed: yeṣām manasi yā vidyā sadā tiṣṭhati bhāvane

haret nija gṛha sthena ca aṅkena sādhaka uttamaḥ

original: ūdrdhvasthamiti varṇaṃ tu śītalasthaṃ śṛṇu prabho |

akāran ca ukāran caḷ ḷsaukāran ca tatas param

ikāraṃ ca ṛkāram ca ekāraṃ ca tatas param
siddha geha sthitam varṇam śṛṇu sarva sukha pradam

āhlādam ca pratyayam ca mukham ca śuddham iti api
etad kula sthān sarva arṇān śubha aśubha phala pradān
kakāram ca ṛkāram ca ṝkāram ca ñakārakam
āhlāda stham iti proktam prāpti mātreṇa siddhi dam
pratyaya stham gakāram ca ghakāram ṭaṭham iti api

mānasikam rājasikam catur geha sthitam tu imam
laukika stham thakāram ca dakāram ca makārakam

śṛṇu bhakāram vanam iti api
tad nāma stham catur geham śṛṇu pañcānana prabho
suptam kṣiptam ca liptam ca duṣṭa mantram prakītītam

ehike siddhim āpnoti pare muktim avāpnuyāt

original: bhūtalipyā puṭīkṛtyā japtvā siddhiṃ tato labhet || 4-165 ||

original: bhitvā tadaṅkān mantrī ca rekhācatuṣṭayaṃ likhet |

ṣaṣṭha adhas yugala aṅkam ca tad paścāt aṣṭamam tathā

original: sādhyaḥ siddho dviguṇakaḥ sādhye sādhyo nirarthakaḥ || 5-14 ||

original: kumārī bhojitā yena trailokyaṃ tena bhojitam |
analyzed: kumārī bhojitā yena trailokyam tena bhojitam

original: tatra bhāvaprakāśaḥ syātsa bhāvaḥ paramo mataḥ |

original: iti śrī rudrayāmale uttaratantre mahātantroddīpane kumāryupacaryāvilāse

original: mama pūjāṃ yaḥ karoti pratyahaṃ śuddhabhaktitaḥ |

original: te tuṣṭāḥ sarvatuṣṭāśca yastu kanyāṃ prapūjayet |

original: pādyamarghyaṃ tathā dhūpaṃ kuṅkumaṃ candanaṃ śubham |

vivāhayet svayam kanyām brahma hatyām vyapohati

original: tatphalaṃ labhate sadyo yastu kanyāṃ vivāhayet |

ānandabhairavaḥ uvāca

original: kavacaṃ ca kumārīṇāṃ vadasva kramaśaḥ priye |

original: māyābījena tannāmnā pādyaṃ dadyāt tathā prabho || 7-59 ||

original: lakṣmībījena cārghyaṃ tu kuryād bījena candanam |

original: śikhāyai ca samuddhṛtya vaṣaṭkāraṃ tato vadet |

rakta varṇa maṇḍitam
virājitam koṭi puṇya ājīta tejasi bhāskare
vāc bhavam ca samuccārya kuleśvarī padam tatas
tatas sādhaka mantrī ca vāma hasta tale tathā
madhyamā tarjanībhyām ca tāla dvayam upācaret

original: pūrvaṃ padaṃ samuccārya vaktrāya nama īritaḥ |

original: kubjike paścimānte ca vaktrāya nama ityapi |

nānā dravyam ca naivedyam sva sva kalpa ukta sādhitam

athavā svīya mūlam ca japtvā siddhīśvaraḥ bhavet

original: aṣṭāṅgādipraṇāmaṃ ca kurvan stotraṃ paṭhan diśet || 7-91 ||

original: tataḥ prāṇātmakaṃ vāyuṃ śodhayitvā punaḥ punaḥ |

sandhyām nitya guṇa udayām dvija gaṇe śreṣṭha udayām sa aruṇām

original: gāyatrīṃ gaṇamātaraṃ dinagatiṃ kṛṣṇāñca vṛddhāṃ bhaje || 8-16 ||
analyzed: gāyatrīm gaṇamātaram dinagatim kṛṣṇām ca vṛddhām bhaje
bālām bālaka pūjitām gaṇa bhṛtām vidyāvatām mokṣa dā
dhātrīm śukla sarasvatīm nava varām vāgvādinīm caṇḍikām
nityam mokṣa hitāya yoga vapuṣā caitanya rūpām bhaje  /
nānā ratna samūha nimīta gṛhe pūjyām sūraiḥ bālikā
vande nandana kānane manasije siddhānta bīja ānane

original: arthaṃ dehi nirarthakāya puruṣe hitvā kumārīṃ kalām |
analyzed: artham dehi nirarthakāya puruṣe hitvā kumārīm kalām

original: satyaṃ pātu kumārike trividhamūrtyā ca tejomayīm || 8-18 ||
analyzed: satyam pātu kumārike trividha mūrtyā ca tejaḥ mayīm
varānane sa kalikām kula patha ullāsa eka bīja udvahā

bālā ūham vaṭuka īśvarasya caraṇa ambhoja āśritā ūham sadā
hitvā bāla kumārike śirasi śukla ambhoruha īśam bhaje

original: tejo'ṅgāṃ bhuvi sūryagāṃ bhayaharāṃ tejomayīṃ bālikām |
analyzed: tejaḥ oṅgām bhuvi sūrya gām bhaya harām tejaḥ mayīm bālikām

original: vande hṛtkamale sadā ravidale vālendravidyāṃ satī |
analyzed: vande hṛd kamale sadā ravi dale vālendra vidyām satī
sākṣāt siddhikarīm kumāri vimalena āsādya rūpa īśvarīm

nānā yoga nivāsinīm su ramaṇīm nityām tapasya anvitām
vedānta artha viśeṣa deśa vasanāḥ bhāṣā viśeṣa sthitām
vande parvatarāja rāja tanayām kālapriyo tvām aham
kaumārīm kula kāminīm ripu gaṇa kṣobha agni sandohinī
rakta ābha ānayanām śubhām parama mārga mukti saṃjñā pradām
bhāryā bhāgavatīm matim bhuvanam āmoda pañca ānanā

ye nityam paripūjayanti sahasā rāja indra cūḍāmaṇi

original: ye ye puṇyadhiyo bhajanti paramānandābdhimadhye mudā
analyzed: ye ye puṇya dhiyaḥ bhajanti parama ānanda abdhi madhye mudā

ānanda eka niketanām hṛdi bhaje sākṣāt alabdhām aham

original: jagadbhayaharāṃ harāṃ harati yā ca yogeśvarī |

kamala madhya sambhāvinīm
śiraḥ daśa śate dala imṛta mahā abdhi dhārādharām

original: bhaktiṃ dhanaṃ jayapadaṃ yadi dehi dāsya|

original: vahniḥ śītalatāṃ yāti jalastambhaṃ sa kārayet |
analyzed: vahniḥ śītala tām yāti jalastambham sa kārayet

analyzed: dhanavān putravān rājā iha kāle bhavet naraḥ  /

analyzed: pare ca yāti vaikuṇṭhe kailāse śiva sannidhau

original: muktireva mahādeva yo nityaṃ sarvadā paṭhet || 8-39 ||
analyzed: muktiḥ eva mahādeva yaḥ nityam sarvadā paṭhet
mahā vidyā pada ambhojam sa hi paśyati niścitam
śṛṇu nātha pravakṣyāmi kumārī tarpaṇa ādikam
yāsām tarpaṇa mātreṇa kula siddhiḥ bhavet dhruvam
kula bālām mūla padma sthitām kāma vihāriṇīm
śatadhā mūlamantreṇa tarpayāmi tava priye
mūlādhāra mahā tejaḥ jaṭā maṇḍala maṇḍitām
sandhyā devīm tarpayāmi kāmabījena me śubhe
mūlapaṅkaja yoga aṅgī kumārīm śrī sarasvatīm

cakre mūlādhāra padme trimūtī bāla nāyikām
sarva kalyāṇa dām devīm tarpayāmi para amṛtaiḥ
svādhiṣṭhāne mahāpadme ṣaṣ dala antar prakāśinīm
śrī bījena tarpayāmi bhoga mokṣāya kevalam
svādhiṣṭhāna ākhya padma sthām mahā tejaḥ mayīm śivām
sūrya gām śīrṣam adhunā tarpayāmi kuleśvarīm
maṇipūra abdhi madhye tu manohara kalevarām
umā devīm tarpayāmi māyā bījena pārvatīm
maṇipūra ambhoja madhye trailokya paripūjitām
mālinīm mala cittasya sat buddhim tarpayāmi aham
maṇipūra sthitām raudrīm parama ānanda vadhīnīm
ākāśa gāminīm devīm kubjikām tarpayāmi aham
tarpayāmi mahādevīm mahā sādhana tatparām
śakti mantra pradām raudrīm lola jihvā samākulām
aparājitām mahā devīm tarpayāmi kuleśvarīm
mahā kaula priyām siddhām rudra loka sukha pradām
rudrāṇīm raudra kiraṇām tarpayāmi vadhū priyām
ṣoḍaśa svara saṃsiddhim mahāraurava nāśinīm
mahā madya pāna cittām bhairavīm tarpayāmi aham
trailokya vara dām devīm śrī bīja mālayā āvṛtām
mahālakṣmīm bhava aiśvarya dāyinīm tarpayāmi aham
lokānām hita kartrīm ca hita ahita jana priyām
tarpayāmi ramā bījām pīṭha ādyām pīṭhanāyikām
jayantīm veda vedāṅga mātaram sūrya mātaram
tarpayāmi sudhābhiḥ ca kṣetrajñām māyayā āvṛtām
tarpayāmi kula ānanda paramām paramānanām
tarpayāmi ambikā devīm māyā alakṣmī hṛdisthitām
sarvāsām caraṇa dvaya ambuja tanum caitanya vidyāvatī
saukhya artham śubha ṣoḍaśa svara yutām śrī ṣoḍaśī saṅkulām
ānanda arṇava padmarāga khacite siṃhāsane śobhite
nityam tat paritarpayāmi sakalam śveta abja madhya āsane
ye nityam prapaṭhanti cāru sa phala stotra arddha santarpaṇa
vidyā dāna nidāna mokṣa paramām māyā mayam yānti te
naśyanti kṣiti maṇḍala īśvara gaṇāḥ sarva a vipad kārakā

original: rājānaṃ vaśayanti yogasakalaṃ nityā bhavanti kṣaṇāt || 8-61 ||
analyzed: rājānam vaśayanti yoga sakalam nityāḥ bhavanti kṣaṇāt

aṣṭa aiśvarya yutaḥ bhūtvā vatsarāt tām prapaśyati
mahā yogī bhavet nātha māsāt abhyāsataḥ prabho
trailokyam kṣobhayet kṣipram vāñchā phalam avāpnuyāt
bhū madhye rājarāja īśaḥ labhate vara maṅgalam
śatru nāśe tathā uccāṭe bandhane vyādhi saṅkaṭe  /

original: cāturaṅge tathā ghore bhaye dūrasya preṣaṇe |
analyzed: cāturaṅge tathā ghore bhaye dūrasya preṣaṇe
mahā yuddhe narendrāṇām paṭhitvā siddhim āpnuyāt
yaḥ paṭhet eka bhāvena santarpaṇa phalam labhet
pūjā sāphalyam āpnoti kumārī stotra pāṭhataḥ

original: sa bhavet pāśavaḥ kalpo mṛtyustasya pade pade || 8-67 ||

iti śrī rudrayāmale uttara tantre mahā tantra uddīpane kumārī upacaryā vilāse

ānandabhairavaḥ uvāca

original: bhaktiṃ muktiṃ tuṣṭiṃ puṣṭiṃ rājalakṣmīṃ susampadām || 9-31 ||

original: yo vaśī divase nityaṃ kumārīṃ pūjayenniśi || 9-33 ||

tad kālam vīra bhāva artham bhāva mātram hi sādhanam
bhāvena labhate siddhim vīrāt anyat na kutracid
rātrau gandha ādi sampūrṇaḥ tāmbūla pūrita ānanaḥ
ekyam citte samādhāya ānanda udreka saṃbhramaḥ

original: yo japet sakalāṃ rātriṃ gatabhīnīrjane gṛhe || 11-38 ||
analyzed: yaḥ japet sakalām rātrim gata bhīnīḥ jane gṛhe
sa bhavet kālikā dāsaḥ divyānām uttama uttamaḥ

original: evaṃ bhāvatrayaṃ jñātvā yaḥ karma sādhayettataḥ || 11-39 ||
analyzed: evam bhāva trayam jñātvā yaḥ karma sādhayet tatas
aṣṭa aiśvarya yutaḥ bhūtvā sarvajñaḥ bhavati dhruvam
bhāva trayāṇām madhye tu bhāva puṇya artha nirṇayam
śṛṇu nātha pravakṣyāmi sa avadhāna avadhāraya
akasmāt siddhim āpnoti jñātvā saṅketalāñchitam

original: yo jānāti mahādeva tasya siddhirna saṃśayaḥ |
analyzed: yaḥ jānāti mahādeva tasya siddhiḥ na saṃśayaḥ
dvādaśe paṭale sūkṣma saṅketa artham vadāmi tat
uvāca
ekādaśe ca paṭale śuddha bhāva artha nirṇayam
bhāvena labhyate sarvam bhāva adhīnam jagattrayam

original: bhāvaṃ vinā mahādeva na siddhirjāyate kvacit |
analyzed: bhāvam vinā mahādeva na siddhiḥ jāyate kvacid
paśu bhāva āśrayāṇām ca aruṇa udaya kālataḥ
daśa daṇḍa āśritam kālam praśna artham kevalam prabho
cakram dvādaśa rāśeḥ ca māsa dvādaśakasya ca
daśa daṇḍe vijānīyāt bhāva abhāvam vicakṣaṇaḥ
anuloma vilomena pañca svara vibhedataḥ
kaiśora saundaryam yauvanam vṛddha sañjñakam
asta aṣṭa mitam kramāt jñeyaḥ vidhiḥ pañca svaraḥ svayam
svakīyam nāsikā agra stham pañcamam parikītītam
yat nāsāpuṭa madhye tu vāyuḥ bhavati bhairava
tad nāsā puṭa madhye tu bhāva abhāvam vicintayet

original: ākāśaṃ vāyurūpaṃ hi taijasaṃ vāruṇaṃ prabho || 11-49 ||
analyzed: ākāśam vāyu rūpam hi taijasam vāruṇam prabho
pāthīvam kramaśas jñeyam bālya asta ādi krameṇa tu

original: vāmodaye śubhā vāmā dakṣiṇe puruṣaḥ śubhaḥ || 11-50 ||
analyzed: vāma udaye śubhā vāmā dakṣiṇe puruṣaḥ śubhaḥ
vāyūnām gamanam jñeyam gagana avadhiḥ eva ca

original: kevalaṃ madhyadeśe tu gamanaṃ pavanasya ca || 11-51 ||
analyzed: kevalam madhyadeśe tu gamanam pavanasya ca
tat ākāśam vijānīyāt bālya bhāvam prakītītam
tiryak gatiḥ tu nāsā agre vāyoḥ udayam eva ca
kevalam bhramaṇam jñeyam sarva maṅgalam eva ca
kiśoram tat vijānīyāt vāyau tiryañc gatau vibho
kevala ūrddhva nāsikā agre vāyuḥ gacchati daṇḍa vat
tat taijasam vijānīyāt gamanam balavat bhavet
tad vṛddha gata bhāvam ca vilamba udhika ceṣṭayā
prāpnoti paramām prītim varuṇa ambhaḥ udaye rujām
yadā adhas gacchati kṣipram kiñcid ūrdhvam agocaram
yadā karoti praśvāsam tadā roga ulbaṇa udayaḥ
pṛthivyāḥ unnatam bhāgyam yoga ātapa prapīḍitam
astamitam mahādeva anuloma vilomataḥ
pavanaḥ gacchati kṣipram vāma dakṣiṇa bhedataḥ
vāma nāsā puṭe yāti pṛthivī jalam eva ca  /
sadā phala aphalam datte muditā kuṇḍa maṇḍale

original: tayorvai vāyavī śaktiḥ phalabhāgaṃ tadā labhet || 11-59 ||
analyzed: tayoḥ vai vāyavī śaktiḥ phala bhāgam tadā labhet  /
yadi evam vāma bhāge tu vāmāyāḥ praśna karmaṇi

original: yadi tatra pumān praśnaṃ karoti vāmagāmine || 11-60 ||
analyzed: yadi tatra pumān praśnam karoti vāma gāmine
tadā rogam avāpnoti karma hīnaḥ bhavet dhruvam

original: yadi vāyūdayo vāme dakṣiṇe puruṣaḥ sthitaḥ || 11-61 ||
analyzed: yadi vāyu udayaḥ vāme dakṣiṇe puruṣaḥ sthitaḥ  /
tadā phalam avāpnoti dravya āgamana durlabham
akasmāt dravya hāniḥ syāt manogata phala apaham
suhṛd bhaṅga vivādam ca bhinna bhinna udaye śubham
kevalam varuṇasya eva puruṣaḥ dakṣiṇe śubham
aśubham pṛthivī dakṣe bhedaḥ yam vara durlabhaḥ

original: sadodayaṃ dakṣiṇe ca vāyostaijasa eva ca || 11-64 ||
analyzed: sadā udayam dakṣiṇe ca vāyoḥ taijase eva ca
ākāśasya vijānīyāt śubha aśubha phalam prabho
yadi bhāgya vaśāt eva vāyoḥ mandā gatiḥ bhavet
dakṣa nāśā madhya deśe tadā vāma udayam śubham
tadā vāme vicāran ca vāyu tejaḥ dvayasya ca

original: jñātvodayaṃ vijānīyād mitre hāniḥ sure bhayam |
analyzed: jñātvā udayam vijānīyāt mitre hāniḥ sure bhayam
evam su bhavana āgāre yadi gacchati vāyavī
tasmin kāle pumān dakṣaḥ dakṣa bhāga stha sammukhaḥ
tadā kanyā dāna phalam yathā prāpnoti mānavaḥ
tadā vāyu prasādena prāpnoti dhanam uttamam
deśa antara stha bhāva ārttāḥ āyānti putra sampadaḥ
bālya ādikam bhāva trayam rāśi bhede śubham diśet
etat cakre phalam tasya rāśi dvādaśa cakrake

original: sūkṣmaṃ phalaṃ vijānīyāt cakraṃ nāma śṛṇu prabho |
analyzed: sūkṣmam phalam vijānīyāt cakram nāma śṛṇu prabho
ājñācakram kāmacakram phalacakram ca sāra dam
praśnacakram bhūmicakram svargacakram tatas param
tulā cakram vāri cakram ṣaṣ cakram triguṇa ātmakam
sāracakram ulkācakram mṛtyucakram kramāt prabho
ṣaṣ koṇam ca atra jānīyāt anuloma vilomataḥ
sarva cakre svara jñānam sarvatra vāyu saṅgatim
sarva praśna ādi sañcāram bhāvena jāyate yadi
tadā tad daṇḍa mānam ca jñātvā rāśi udayam budhaḥ
kuryāt praśna vicāran ca yadi kītīm iha icchati
iti śrī rudrayāmale uttara tantre mahā tantra uddīpane bhāva bodha nirṇaye
paśu bhāva vicāre
sārasaṅkete siddha mantra prakaraṇe bhairavī bhairava saṃvāde ekādaśaḥ
paṭalaḥ
atha dvādaśaḥ paṭalaḥ
uvāca
tad vāma sandhi deśa stham aṣṭama aṅkam atho likhet
tad adhas sandhi deśa stham sapta aṅkam vilikhet budhaḥ
tad ūrdhvam vāma koṇe ca tṛtīya aṅkam likhet tatas
tad ūrdhvam koṇa gehe ca yugma aṅkam vilikhet tathā
tad dakṣiṇe gṛhe ca ekam aṅka varṇam śṛṇu prabho
vasu bhāvam śūnya bhāvam ṣaṣṭha bhāvam ca śūnyakam
etad madhye na asti varṇam koṇa aṅkam ca sa varṇakam

original: ṭatavargau śa śa likhet śare śūnyādha eva ca || 12-4 ||
analyzed: ṭa ta vargau śa śa likhet śare śūnya adhas eva ca
veda aṅka sthau ka ca vargau e e kāra samanvitau
tṛtīya aṅka sthitam varṇam ādi kṣa antam ṭavarga mā om
ta pa vargau yuga anta sthau makāram sa avadhānataḥ
vilikhet dakṣiṇe tasya gehe ca eka aṅka madhyake  /
u yugam pa ta vargau ca akāram yugma śīrṣake
etat cakram kāmacakram praśna kāle phala pradam
vāma āvarttena gaṇayet daśa koṇa stha varṇakān
yasmin gṛhe svīya nāma prāpnoti vedapāragaḥ
tad gṛha avadhi praśna artham gaṇayet graha siddhaye
nava graha nava sthānam varṇam jñātvā su buddhimān
bālya bhāva ādikam jñātvā yatra graha sthitiḥ bhavet
tat nakṣatram samānīya dvāra adhikāram ānayet
vinā trikoṇa yogena ṣaṭkoṇam likhet budhaḥ
tad madhye aṣṭakoṇam ca bhitvā devagṛha antaram

original: tanmadhye cāpi ṣaṭkoṇaṃ tanmadhye ca trikoṇakam || 12-12 ||
analyzed: tad madhye ca api ṣaṭkoṇam tad madhye ca trikoṇakam
krameṇa vilikhet varṇam dakṣiṇa āvartta yogataḥ

original: ūdrdhvavāmadeśabhāge a ā i ca kavargakam || 12-13 ||
analyzed: ū ū drdhva vāma deśa bhāge a ā i ca kavargakam

original: taddakṣiṇe ī i yugaṃ ṭavargañca likhed budhaḥ |
analyzed: tad dakṣiṇe yugam ṭavargam ca likhet budhaḥ
dakṣa pārśve adhobhāge ṛ yugam tu tavargakam

original: tadadho ḷ ḹ e e rūpañca pavargañca likhed budhaḥ |
analyzed: tad adhas rūpam ca pavargan ca likhet budhaḥ

original: tadvāmapārśvabhāge ca o au yaralavān likhet || 12-15 ||
analyzed: tad vāma pārśva bhāge ca o au likhet

original: śeṣagehe likhedaṃ aḥ śādikṣāntaṃ hi ṣaḍgṛhe |
analyzed: śeṣa gehe likhet idam hi ṣaṣ gṛhe
rudra agnim ūtīm anilam agni koṇe likhet budhaḥ
yajamānaḥ paśupatim ūtīṣaṣṭhan ca dakṣiṇe  /
mahādevam somamūtīm saptamam nairṛte likhet
jalamūttī bhavam yugmam paścime vilikhet budhaḥ
ugravīram vāyumūttīm vāyu koṇe caturthakam
bhīma rūpa ākāśa mūttīm pañcamam ca uttare likhet
īśānam sūryam ūtīn ca īśāne ṣaṣ dalam likhet
adhas ṣaṭkoṇa madhye ca ṣaṭkoṇam vilikhet tatas
ūdrdhva koṇe grīṣma kālam śiśiram ca api dakṣiṇe
varṣā kālam adhas tasya sarva adhas ca vasantakam  /
śarad kālam pañcakośe śīta kālam ca ṣaṣṭhake
trikoṇe ca api tad madhye vahni rūpam vakārakam
likhitvā gaṇayet mantrī varṇa deva aṅka vahnibhiḥ
etat cakram mahā sūkṣmam phala cakram viśāradam
adhunā kula nātha īśa pṛṣṭha cakram punar śṛṇu

original: vinā jñānena yasyaivaṃ pṛṣṭhabhāvo na jāyate || 12-24 ||
analyzed: vinā jñānena yasya evam pṛṣṭha bhāvaḥ na jāyate
yadi pṛṣṭha cakra bhāvam jānāti sādhaka uttamaḥ
tadā nija phalam jñātvā siddhim āpnoti niścitam
ānandabhairavaḥ uvāca
ṣaṭkoṇam kārayet mantrī vinā trikoṇa sādhanaiḥ
tad madhye ca catuṣkoṇam tad madhye śādi varṇakān
likhitvā vilikhet tatra ṣaṣ aṅka madhya deśataḥ
ṣaṣ aṅkam dāpayet mantrī dīrgha dīrgha krameṇa tu
tad agre ṣaṣ gṛham kuryāt tatra aṅka arṇān likhet sudhīḥ
ūrdhva prathama gehe ca kavargam vilikhet budhaḥ

original: taddakṣiṇe mandire ca cavargaṃ vilikhed budhaḥ |
analyzed: tad dakṣiṇe mandire ca cavargam vilikhet budhaḥ
ṭavargam dakṣiṇe ca adhas sarva adhas tu tavargakam
tad vāme mandire nātha pavargam varṇa maṅgalam
tad ūrdhve ca dakṣiṇa āvartta yogataḥ
akāra ādi svarān tatra mandire vilikhet budhaḥ
yāvat svara sthitiḥ yāti tāvatkālam vicārayet
meṣa ādi rāśi sadbhāvam varga lekhana mānataḥ
anuloma vilomena vilikhet ṣaṣṭha mandire
yat yat gṛhe sādhya nāma ca asti nātha svara ādikam
ekatrīkṛtya haraṇāt yat aṅkam prāpyate varam
ṣaṣ aṅkena tatas nātha haret anala saṃkhyayā

original: yadaṅkaṃ prāpyate tatra sa rāśistat kṣaṇasya ca || 12-34 ||
analyzed: yad aṅkam prāpyate tatra sa rāśiḥ tat kṣaṇasya ca

original: ājñācakraṃ phalaṃ siddhaṃ vidyānātha vadāmi tat |
analyzed: ājñācakram phalam siddham vidyānātha vadāmi tat
yena vijñāta mātreṇa sarvajñaḥ bhavati dhruvam
akasmāt śaktim āpnoti vidyā ratnam dadāmi tat
ravi ādi sapta vāram ca kṛte bhadra vivardhanam
śani ādi sapta vāram ca tretāyām saukhya varddhanam
guru ādi sapta vāram ca dvāpare dharma sādhanam
śukra ādi vāra saptañca kalau yuga phala pradam
atas śukra ādi paryantam gaṇanīyam vicakṣaṇaiḥ
gaṇayet sapta vāran ca madhye sudhīḥ
nija vāraḥ yatra patre samāptiḥ tu udbhavat ca tat
tad bha rāśim samānīya varṇabhedam samānayet  /

tad phala aphala māhātmyam śṛṇu saṅketa paṇḍita
ānandabhairavaḥ uvāca
dale pūrva bhāge ākāra ardhe indu
sphuṭe rājya lābham hakāra anta śabdam
sāmānārtha bhāvam viśiṣṭa artha yoga
kratu kṣema yuktam tathā putra lābham
dayā yukta bhūṣā āśraya tvam
samāpnoti martyaḥ vivāham su vāham
sukham nātha loka anurāgam su bhoga
vibhā dhāvakānām samāpte kṣaṇa ādim
padme dakṣiṇa patrake priya padā modat aham bhāsvara
nānā lakṣaṇa duḥkha dam śuci padāḥ āndolitaḥ taiḥ aham

original: pātrārthalābhaṃ yadi vādha eva pragacchati krūrakhalapratāpaḥ |
analyzed: pātra artha lābham yadi vā ādhas eva pragacchati krūra khala pratāpaḥ

original: tathāpi hantuṃ na ca varṇamadhye kṣamaḥ svasiddhaṃ bhajate kṣamādi ||
analyzed: tathā api hantum na ca varṇa madhye kṣamaḥ sva siddham bhajate kṣamā ādi

original: rasārthapraśnaṃ kurute yadi syād vāro hi cāro gṛhamadhyabhāge |
analyzed: rasa artha praśnam kurute yadi syāt vāraḥ hi cāraḥ gṛha madhya bhāge

original: svakīya indupriyavad bhaved dhruvam manogataṃ saukhyavivardhanañca || 12-47
analyzed: svakīyaḥ indu priya vat bhavet dhruvam manogatam saukhya vivardhanam ca

original: śatrūṇāṃ hananaṃ tadā kulagataṃ sañcāravātaṃ mudā |

original: ātharve patramadhye nivasati kamalā komalā vādyadātrī |

nityam kāntā mukha ambhoruha vimala madhu prema pāna abhilāṣam

original: meṣe tṛptimupaiti siṃha iṣubhiḥ kumbhena teṣāṃ phala|
analyzed: meṣe tṛptim upaiti siṃhaḥ iṣubhiḥ kumbhena teṣām phala

original: vittānāṃ haraṇaṃ tadā jalagate mitrasya rājyādikam |
analyzed: vittānām haraṇam tadā jala gate mitrasya rājya ādikam

analyzed: vāre śukre śani gata dina lavaṭa ahau ca sūrye

original: aṣṭau vargānudayati mudā prāpya vīro mahattva|

dvādaśaḥ paṭalaḥ
atha trayodaśaḥ paṭalaḥ
uvāca
ājñā praśna artha bhāvañca varṇa vinyāsa nirṇayam
adhunā śṛṇu sarvajña bhāva jñāna parāyaṇa
yadi meṣe sva nakṣatram sva vāra saṃyutam śubham

original: pūrve dale kakārasya varṇabhedaṃ śṛṇu prabho || 13-3 ||
analyzed: pūrve dale kakārasya varṇa bhedam śṛṇu prabho
manasi sukha samūham prāṇa saukhya artha cintā
vasana gamana lābham prīti putra artha yogyam
sthira padam api deśe darśanam prāṇa bandhoḥ
sakala kaluṣa hāniḥ ca ādi patre kakāre  /
sadā nṛ nāsike sukham sukha ulbaṇasya sevana
sadāśive ca bhakti dam svakīya geha sat phalam
kalādharasya dṛṣṭibhiḥ pradhāna loka pūjana
hita ahitam na bādhate vivāha kelinā sukham
ṛkāram vipadām dhvaṃsam dhairye vidyā vibodhanam
vyādhi pīḍā durjanānām pīḍā praśnam vadet tadā
ukāre vāyu bhāvasya vṛthāgamanam eva ca
dāridrya hānayoḥ yānti dūra āgamana durlabham
khakāre dravya praśnam ca śubha kārye gate bhayam

original: āśu bhayaṃ samāpnoti prāpya nirdhanatāṃ vrajet || 13-8 ||
analyzed: āśu bhayam samāpnoti prāpya nirdhana tām vrajet
pañcatva jijñāsanam eva satyam nityam sukhānām udayāya ceṣṭā
śatro vī nāśāya hitāya bandhoḥ pakārakūṭe para caura ceṣṭā  /
kaivalya ādi samāpanam nija manaḥ duṣṭa vya apaham kāminā
nānā bhoga vināśanam kanaka raupya rāja pradam svake
go vidyā śriyam āśu lābha vividham dharma artha cintā ākulam
caurya āharaṇa dravyasya na hāniḥ janma hārdake  /
ākāre tejasaḥ hāniḥ mahā śabde vināśanam

original: āgatānāñca hāniḥ syāt pakṣapātaṃ gatau jayam || 13-12 ||

analyzed: hareḥ pade bhaktim upaiṃti satyam prasādhanāt śukra suvāra kāle
śanaiścara dine bhayam bhuvana doṣa moha anvita
kṣitipriya sutapriyam parama tārakam strī sukham
viśiṣṭa dhana nīradam vayasi siddhiḥ ṛddhi arka ja
bhajanti yadi mānuṣāḥ sakala kāmanā ādeḥ prabhoḥ
punar ca ravi vāra gam phalam atīva duḥkha āspada

original: tameva paribhāvanaṃ parikaroti yo vā naro |
analyzed: tam eva paribhāvanam parikaroti yaḥ vā
na naśyati kadācana pracura tāpa śāpa ākaram
samagra kha cara aphalam phalavatām hi sañjñā phalam
gabhīra vacanam nṛpa priya karasya rakṣā kara
yadi indu bhajanam yadā kali śubha ādi śambho karot
tat tat tārā phalam vakṣye yena praśna artha nirṇayaḥ
aśleṣā bahu duḥkha vādana gatam vyāmoha śobhā āvṛta
nānā bhṛṅga niṣevaṇam dhanavatām hāniḥ pade sampade
bhūpānām parivarjanam khala janaiḥ ācchāditam tāpita
sandadyāt kṣiti jāti bhāti niyatam kolāhale nārake

original: maghāyāṃ maheśi dhanaṃ hanti madhye mahollāsavṛddhiṃ bhayaṃ tasya
analyzed: maghāyām maheśi dhanam hanti madhye mahā ullāsa vṛddhim bhayam tasya
śatroḥ
kṣiti kṣobha hantāram eti anta bhāvam ku kāma āturāṇām sadā saṅga kāram
pūrva phalguni nakṣatre dūra gānām phalam paṭhet
ati dhairyam śatru pakṣe hānayaḥ yānti niścitam
phalam uttaraphalgunyāḥ dīyate gatiḥ īśvarī

original: yadi devaparo nātha tadā sarvatra sundaram || 14-34 ||
analyzed: yadi deva paraḥ nātha tadā sarvatra sundaram

original: sā nityaṃ pradadāti rukmaśatakaṃ bhaktāya yajñāthīne |
analyzed: sā nityam pradadāti rukma śatakam bhaktāya yajñāthīne
nānā vyañjana bhojanaiḥ ati sukhī saṃjñā samūham dadet

original: dadāti vittaṃ jagatīha citrā manorathaṃ vyākulatāmalaṅkṛtā |
analyzed: dadāti vittam jagatī iha citrā manoratham vyākula tām alaṅkṛtā
kadācid evam hi śarīra duḥkha dam na prāpnuyāt īśvara bhaktim ālabhet

original: aśleṣānātha śukro vipadamapi kadā no dadāti praduḥkha|
analyzed: aśleṣa anātha śukraḥ vipadam api kadā naḥ dadāti praduḥkha
dakṣe patre vihāra uttara bhaya hara a caṇḍa tāpam na hanti
jīvaḥ śrīmān amogha āśā dhanam api vividham brāhmaṇaḥ pīta varṇaḥ
kurute bahu sukha vittam uttaraphalgunī nāthaḥ maṅgalena
hastāyāḥ patiḥ candraḥ vibhavam anantam citreśaḥ raviḥ  /
adhas tṛtīya patrasya nakṣatrāṇi śṛṇu prabho
yāsām vāra viśiṣṭānām praśna niṣkarṣa sat phalam
svātīm raviḥ pāti mahā ugra tejasā
vināśa kāle viparīta buddhi daḥ
indu vīśa akhām sukha daḥ sarasvatī
kujaḥ nurādhām vipadām prabādhām
budhaḥ hi pāyāt sakala artha sādhinī
tathā hi mūlām sukha dām ca jīvaḥ
tadā dhana artham pradadāti śukraḥ
pūrva anvita āṣāḍhikayā anvitaḥ sukham
caturtha patram vāma stham mahā maṅgala kāraṇam
atharvaveda rūpam tat sarva praśna kathā vṛtam
viparīte mahat dukham varṇa saukhye api hānayaḥ
bhavanti tārakāṇām ca śubha dṛṣṭayā mahā udayāḥ
tat tārakānātha guṇam śubha aśubha phala pradam
praśna varṇa samūhānām matam ālokya nirṇayam
śaniḥ pāti uttarāṣāḍhām hāni rūpām vipāka dām
duḥkha dāridrya saṃyuktām deva niṣṭhena bādhate
raviḥ prapāti śravaṇām dhana ādibhiḥ

original: tathā dhaniṣṭhāṃ phaladāṃ sudhāṃśuḥ kujo vipattiṃ
analyzed: tathā dhaniṣṭhām phala dām sudhāṃśuḥ kujaḥ vipattim
śatabhij gaṇa īśaḥ
tathā lokam mahādeva uttarabhādrapadā patiḥ
bṛhaspatiḥ sukha ullāsam revatī bhṛguḥ
dadāti parama āhlādam sva sva pattra stha rāśibhiḥ
abhijit tārakam pāti śaniḥ śrīmān dhana pradaḥ
phala bhāgam mudā dātum śanī rāja mṛga antike
tat candra ucca stham iti ke vadanti parama priyam
rāhurājā grahāḥ kṣetre abhijit kāla veṣṭitaḥ
tad kālam sūkṣma tad rūpam yaḥ jānāti mahī tale
sandhyā kālam iti jñeyam śani rāhū sukha antayoḥ
tad sandhi kālam evam hi sattva guṇa mahā udayam
tat kumbhakam vijānīyāt madīya deha sambhavam
mahā sūkṣma kṣaṇam tat hi kuṇḍalī maṇḍalam yathā

original: tasyāḥ prathamabhāge ca dhāraṇākhyaḥ śaniḥ prabhuḥ || 14-53 ||
analyzed: tasyāḥ prathama bhāge ca dhāraṇa ākhyaḥ śaniḥ prabhuḥ
svayam brahmā mudā bhāti nirañjana kalevaraḥ
tasyāḥ śeṣe recana ākhyaḥ saṃhāra vigrahaḥ śuciḥ
sarva pāpa analam hanti candra rūpī sudhākaraḥ
dvayoḥ madhye sūkṣma rūpā taḍit koṭi sama prabhā
kumbhaka ākrānta hṛdayā graha cakra purogamā
nakṣatra maṇḍala grāma madhya sthā tithiṣoḍaśī
asyāḥ ādya bhāga saṃsthaḥ brahma rūpī rajaḥ guṇaḥ
asyāḥ śeṣaḥ kāla rūpī tamaḥ guṇa laya priyaḥ
candraḥ brahmā śivaḥ sūryaḥ mahā māyā tanu uttaraḥ
ātreyī paramā śaktiḥ suṣumnā antara gāminī
madhya sthā brahma śivayoḥ vīdhi śāstrasya siddhi dā
yaiḥ jñāyate sarva saṃsthā sarva ānanda hṛdi sthitā
taiḥ ānanda phala upetaiḥ sattva sambhoga kāriṇī
mukti dā bhoga dā bhogyā śambhoḥ ādyā maheśvarī
ajñāna āvṛta tā ghora andhakāra kāla saṃhāra haṃsinī
manda vāyu priyāḥ yasya kalpanā arthe ca vīra hā

original: sā pāti jagatāṃ lokān tasyādhīnamidaṃ jagat || 14-65 ||
analyzed: sā pāti jagatām lokān tasya adhīnam idam jagat  /

original: nākāle mirayate kaścid yadi jānāti vāyavīm |
analyzed: na akāle mirayate kaścid yadi jānāti vāyavīm
vāyavī paramā śaktiḥ iti tantra artha nirṇayaḥ
sūkṣma āgamana rūpeṇa sūkṣma siddhim dadāti yā
narāṇām bhajana arthāya aṣṭa aiśvarya jayāya ca

original: kathitaṃ brahmaṇā pūrvaṃ śiṣyāya tanujāya ca |
analyzed: kathitam brahmaṇā pūrvam śiṣyāya tanujāya ca
lobha moha kāma krodha mada mātsarya hāya ca
tad kramam paramam prīti vardhanam bhū tale prabho
ājñācakrasya madhye tu vāyavī paritiṣṭhati
candra sūrya agni rūpā sā
manaḥ rūpā buddhi rūpā śarīram vyāpyam tiṣṭhati
ājñā dvi dala madhye tu catudrdaśam udāhṛtam
veda dale veda varṇam vādi sa antam mahā prabham
sampannam ṛgveda ādi samanvitam
śṛṇu tat veda māhātmyam kramaśas kramaśas prabho
iti śrī rudrayāmale uttara tantre bhāvapraśna artha nirṇaye
ājñācakra saṅkete
veda prakaraṇe bhairavī bhairava saṃvāde caturdaśaḥ paṭalaḥ
atha pañcadaśaḥ paṭalaḥ
uvāca
deva kāryam veda śākhā pallavam praṇavam param
vadāmi paramānanda bhairava āhlādam āśṛṇu
ādya patre akāram ca ṛgvedam parama akṣaram
brahmāṇam tam vijānīyāt ādya veda artha nirṇayam
vedena labhyate sarvam veda adhīnam idam jagat
veda mantra vihīnaḥ yaḥ śakti vidyām samabhyaset
sa bhavet hi katham yogī kaula mārga parāyaṇaḥ
uvāca

original: brahmastotraṃ hi kiṃ devi! brahmavidyā ca kīdṛśī? || 15-4 ||
analyzed: brahma stotram hi kim devi brahma vidyā ca kīdṛśī

original: brahmajñānī ca ko vā syāt ko vā brahmaśarīradhṛk |
analyzed: brahma jñānī ca kaḥ vā syāt kaḥ vā brahma śarīradhṛk
tad prakāram kula ānanda kāriṇi priyakaulini
vada śīghram yadi sneha dṛṣṭiḥ ced mayi sundari
uvāca
tat eva brahmaṇaḥ stotram vāyavī śakti sevanam
sūkṣma rūpeṇa magnā yā brahma vidyā prakītītā
sadā vāyū prāṇa rasa sūkṣma unmatta prasanna dhīḥ
sadā vivekam ākuryāt brahma jñānī prakītītaḥ
brahma ānandam hṛdi śrīmān śaktim ādhāya vāyavīm

original: sadā bhajati yo jñānī brahmajñānī prakītītaḥ |
analyzed: sadā bhajati yaḥ jñānī brahma jñānī prakītītaḥ
vijayā rasa sāreṇa binā bāhya āsavena ca
ānanda aśru jala unmattaḥ jñātaḥ brahma śarīradhṛk
śaktiḥ kuṇḍalinī devī jaganmātā svarūpiṇī

original: prāpyate yaiḥ sadā bhaktaiḥ muktirevāgamaṃ phalam |
analyzed: prāpyate yaiḥ sadā bhaktaiḥ muktiḥ eva āgamam phalam
ādya patre pratiṣṭhanti varṇa jāla samāśritāḥ
vāyavī śaktayaḥ kāntāḥ brahmāṇḍa maṇḍala sthitāḥ
rāśi nakṣatra tithibhiḥ sarva da ujjvala nāyikāḥ
bhavānī brahma śakti sthā sā avaśyam evam āśrayet

original: dvimāse vajradehaḥ syāt krameṇa vardhayet pumān |
analyzed: dvi māse vajra dehaḥ syāt krameṇa vardhayet pumān
dvi māse kalpa saṃyuktaḥ yasya sambandha rūpataḥ
caitanyā kuṇḍalī śaktiḥ vāyavī bala tejasā
caitanya siddhi hetu sthā jñāna mātram dadāti sā
jñāna mātreṇa mokṣaḥ syāt vāyavī jñānam āśrayet

original: mahābalī mahāvāggmī vardhate ca dine dine || 15-18 ||
analyzed: mahā balī mahā vāggmī vardhate ca dine dine
āyuḥ vṛddhiḥ sadā tasya
kuṇḍalī kṛpayā nātha vinā kiñcid na siddhi ati
brahmā viṣṇuḥ ca rudraḥ ca īśvaran ca sadāśivaḥ
tatas para śivaḥ deva vāyavī parikalpitā
ete ṣaṭ śaṅkarāḥ sarva siddhi dāḥ citta saṃsthitāḥ
sarve tiṣṭhanti patra agra imṛta dhārā rasa āplutāḥ
adhomukhāḥ sūkṣma rūpāḥ koṭi sūrya sama prabhāḥ
brahmamārga sthitāḥ sarve santi ṣaṭcakra maṇḍale

original: ājñayā adha evaṃ hi cakraṃ dvādaśakaṃ smaret |
analyzed: ājñayā adhas evam hi cakram dvādaśakam smaret
galita amṛta dhārābhiḥ āplutam kuṇḍalī priyam
āgneyīm kuṇḍalīm mattvā adhodhārā abhitarpaṇam
prakurvanti parānanda rasikāḥ ṣaṭśivāḥ sadā
candra maṇḍala sañjātā jīva rūpa dharā yathā
ātma jñāna samāśaktāḥ śakti tarpaṇa tatparāḥ
dvitīya dala rūpam hi yajurvedam kula īśvara
akasmāt siddhi karaṇam viṣṇunā parimīlitam
vajra koṭi mahā dhvāna ghora nāda samākulam
harim īśvaram īśānam vāsudevam sanātanam
satva adhiṣṭhāna vinayam caturvarga phala pradam
vāñchā atirikta dātāram kṛṣṇam yogeśvaram prabhum
mahābalam mahāvīram śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam
pīta ambaram sāra bhūtam yauvana āmoda śobhitam
śruti kanyā samākrāntam śrīvidyā rādhikā prabhum
daitya dānava hantāram śarīrasya sukha āvaham
bhāva dam bhakti nilayam yadā sāgara candrakam
garuḍa āsana samārūḍham manaḥ rūpam jagat mayam
adhas para amṛta rasa pāna unmatta kalevaraḥ
sādhakaḥ yoga nirataḥ svādhiṣṭhāna gatam yathā
tad ākāram vibhāvya āśu siddhim āpnoti śaṅkara

original: ko vaiṣṇavo vājikaḥ ko dhāmīko vāpi ko bhuvi || 15-34 ||
analyzed: kaḥ vaiṣṇavaḥ vājikaḥ kaḥ dhāmīkaḥ vā api kaḥ bhuvi  /

original: ko vā bhavati yogī ca tanme vada sureśvari |
analyzed: kaḥ vā bhavati yogī ca tat me vada sureśvari
uvāca
śaṅkara śṛṇu vakṣyāmi kāla nirṇaya lakṣaṇam
vaiṣṇavānām vaiṣṇava tvam ājñācakre phala aphalam
ājñācakram mahā cakram yaḥ jānāti mahī tale
tasya asādhyam tribhuvane na kiñcid api vartate
sadā śuciḥ dhyāna niṣṭhaḥ muhur jāpya parāyaṇaḥ
smṛti veda kriyā yuktaḥ vidhi śrutim anupriyaḥ
sarvatra sama bhāvaḥ yaḥ vaiṣṇavaḥ parikītītaḥ
sama tā śatru mitreṣu kṛṣṇa bhakti parāyaṇaḥ
sadā sādhuṣu saṃsargaḥ vaiṣṇavaḥ parikītītaḥ
viveka dharma vidyā arthī kṛṣṇe cittam nidhāya ca
śiva vat kurute karma vaiṣṇavaḥ parikītītaḥ
yajñikaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ dhīraḥ bhavaḥ prema abhilāṣavān
vana sthaḥ ghora vipine navīna taru śobhite
ekākī kurute yogam jīvātma paramātmanoḥ
vāyu agniḥ recakaḥ sūryaḥ pūrakaḥ candramāḥ tathā

original: jvalacchikhā sūryarūpā na ca yojanameva ca |
analyzed: jvalat śikhā sūrya rūpā na ca yojanam eva ca
punar pūraka yogaḥ ca candrasya tejasā haviḥ  /
ūdrdhva viṣā jvalat vahnau vāyavī bala cañcale

original: yo'niśaṃ kurute homaṃ maunī yājñika ucyate || 15-45 ||
analyzed: yoniśam kurute homam maunī yājñikaḥ ucyate  /
jīva sūrya agni kiraṇe ātma candra ādya pūrakaiḥ

original: kāye yaḥ kurute homaṃ yājñikaḥ parikītītaḥ || 15-46 ||
analyzed: kāye yaḥ kurute homam yājñikaḥ parikītītaḥ

original: surā śaktiḥ śivo māṃsaṃ tadbhoktā bhairavaḥ svayam |
analyzed: surā śaktiḥ śivaḥ māṃsam tad bhoktā bhairavaḥ svayam
śakti agnau juhuyāt māṃsam yājñikaḥ parikītītaḥ
vidhivat kulakuṇḍe ca kula vahnau śiva ātmakaiḥ
pūrṇahomam yaḥ karoti yājñikaḥ parikītītaḥ
bhū maṇḍale dharma śālaḥ nirjane kāma veśmani

original: dṛḍhabhaktyā jīvasāraṃ yo japet sa hi dhāmīkaḥ || 15-49 ||
analyzed: dṛḍha bhaktyā jīvasāram yaḥ japet sa hi dhāmīkaḥ

original: maṇau loṣṭhe samaṃ dhyānaṃ dharme'dharme jaye'jaye |
analyzed: maṇau loṣṭhe samam dhyānam dharma idharme jayejaye

original: kṛtvā tyāgī bhavedyastu brahmajñānī sa sādhakaḥ || 15-50 ||
analyzed: kṛtvā tyāgī bhavet yaḥ tu brahma jñānī sa sādhakaḥ
sadā īśvara cintā ca guroḥ ājñā vyavasthitiḥ
suśīlaḥ dīna bandhuḥ ca dhāmīkaḥ parikītītaḥ

original: parvate kandare maunī bhakto yogī prakītītaḥ || 15-52 ||

analyzed: brahma jñānī ca avadhūtaḥ puṇya ātmā sukṛtī śuciḥ
vāñchā vihīnaḥ dharma ātmā sa yogī parikītītaḥ
ūrdhvaretāḥ strī vihīnaḥ sa yogī parikītītaḥ
varṇa mālā citta jāpaḥ bhāvukaḥ sa hi yogi rāj
tithi vāram tu nakṣatra yuktam ājñā ambujam bhajet
diś kāla deśa praśna artham vāyavī śakti nirṇayam
bāla vṛddha asta ādi daṇḍa pala niśvāsa saṃkhyayā
vyāptam ājñācakra sāram bhajet parama pāvanam

original: cakre sarvatra sukhadaṃ satāṃ hānirna ca prabho || 15-58 ||
analyzed: cakre sarvatra sukha dam satām hāniḥ na ca prabho
khalānām viparītam ca nindakānām pade pade
duḥkhāni prabhavanti iha pāpinām ca phala aphalam

original: pāpī pañcattvamāpnoti jñānī yāti paraṃ padam |
analyzed: pāpī pañcattvam āpnoti jñānī yāti param padam

original: yaḥ śvāsakālavettā ca sa jñānī parikītītāḥ || 15-60 ||
analyzed: yaḥ śvāsa kāla vettā ca sa jñānī parikītītāḥ

original: śvāsakālaṃ na jānāti sa pāpī parikītītaḥ |
analyzed: śvāsa kālam na jānāti sa pāpī parikītītaḥ
guroḥ ājñā krameṇa eva adhas tattvena kuṇḍalīm
yajurveda mahā pātra sattva adhiṣṭhāna sevayā
lalāṭa amṛta dhārābhiḥ caitanyā kuṇḍalī bhavet
vibhāvya dvi dalam cakram homam kuryāt ahani īśam
śuddha ājyaiḥ juhuyāt mantrī adhas tuṇḍe ca kuṇḍalīm
bhajanti ruddha indriya śuddha yoga
pracaṇḍa raśmi pragata aṅga sundarāḥ
ā ambujam cakravaram
yat madhyadeśe śata koṭi tejasam
iti śrī rudrayāmale uttara tantre mahā tantra uddīpane bhāva nirṇaye
pāśava kalpe ājñā cakrasārasaṅkete siddha mantra prakaraṇe
pañcadaśaḥ paṭalaḥ
atha ṣoḍaśaḥ paṭalaḥ
uvāca
śṛṇuṣva ānanda rudra īśa tṛtīya dala lakṣaṇam
sāmavedam adhas cakram tamaḥ guṇa nirākulam
varṇa jāla ādinā ākrāntam rudra rūpam maheśvaram
bhavet
tat sthānam yoginām dharmaḥ guroḥ ājñā phala pradam
tad pada abjam śrī gurūṇām bhrū madhye dvidala ambuje
muhur muhur śanais dhyāyet samīra āspada bhāsvaram
vibhāvya manasā vācā karmaṇā sūkṣma vāyunā

original: līnaṃ kṛtvā sadā dhyāyet sadā harṣakalevaraḥ || 16-5 ||
analyzed: līnam kṛtvā sadā dhyāyet sadā harṣa kalevaraḥ
sahasrāre yathā dhyānam tad dhyānam dvidala ambuje
gurum ātmānam īśānam devadevam sanātanam
akasmāt siddhi dātāram yoga aṣṭāṅga phala pradam
nityam śabda mayam pramāṇa viṣayam nitya upameyam guru
candra ullāsa tanu prabham paṅkeruham
sarva prāṇa gatam gati stham acalam jñāna ādhi nirlepana
rūḍha a lāsya guṇa ālayam laya mayam sva ātma upalabdhim bhaje  /
yadi bhajet jagatām amala īśvaram smaraharam gurum īśvaram ātmani
parama sundara candra sāma ākulam nipatita ādi akula anala sañcayam  /

original: praṇamatāṃ samatāṃ kurute guro yadi bhavān viphalaṃ parihanti me |
analyzed: praṇamatām samatām kurute guro yadi bhavān viphalam parihanti me
tava pada ambujam adbhuta līlayā paribhaje bhava sāgara pāragam
guru padam sita paṅkaja rājitam kanaka nūpura sundara sañjanam

kuryāt sakala siddhi artham ambikā pūjanena ca
ṛgvedam cetasi dhyātvā mūlādhāre
vāyunā candra rūpeṇa dhārayet mārutam sudhīḥ
atharvāt nirgatam sarvam ṛgveda ādi carācaram
tena pūrṇa candramasā jīvena ārya amṛtena ca
juhuyāt eka bhāvena kuṇḍalī sūrya go nale
kumbhakam kārayet mantrī yajurveda puraḥsaram
sarva sattva dhiṣṭhitam tat sarva vijñānam uttamam
vāyavyāḥ pūrṇa saṃsthānam yoginām abhidhāyakam
punar punar kumbhayitvā sattve nirmala tejasi
mahāpralaya sāra jñaḥ bhavati iti na saṃśayaḥ
recakam śambhunā vyāptam tamaḥ guṇa manaḥ layam
sarva mṛtyu kula sthānam vyāptam dharma phala aphalaiḥ
punar punar kṣobha niṣṭhaḥ recakena nivartate

original: recakena layaṃ yāti recanena paraṃ padam || 17-93 ||
analyzed: recakena layam yāti recanena param padam
prāpnoti sādhaka śreṣṭhaḥ recakena api siddhi bhāj
recakam vahni rūpam ca koṭi vahni śikhā ujjvalam
dvādaśa aṅgula madhya stham dhyātvā bāhye layam diśet
candra vyāptam sarva lokam sarva puṇya samudbhavam
recaka agniḥ dahati iha vāyusakhyaḥ mahā balī
tat śaśāṅka jīva rūpam pītvā jīvati vāyavī  /

original: āgneyī dahyati kṣipraṃ eṣa homaḥ paro mataḥ |
analyzed: āgneyī dahyati kṣipram eṣa homaḥ paraḥ mataḥ

original: etat kāryaṃ yaḥ karoti sa na mṛtyuvaśo bhavet || 17-97 ||

etayoḥ sandhi kālam ca kumbhakam tattva sādhanam

mahā kumbha kalā ākṛtyā sthiram sthittvā ca kumbhake
atharva gāminīm devīm bhāvayet amaraḥ mahān
ananta bhāvanam śabhbhoḥ aśeṣa sṛṣṭi śobhitam
atharvam bhāvayet mantrī śakti cakra krameṇa tu
atharvayoginīm dhyāyet samādhi sthena cetasā
tatas ucyuta ākhyam jagatām īśvaram śīrṣa paṅkaje
prapaśyati jagannātham nitya sūkṣma sukha udayam
ājñācakre śodhanam aśeṣa dalam atharvam parikītītam

analyzed: vibhāvya śrī guroḥ pāde nīyate na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: japahomādikaṃ sarvaṃ haṃsena yaḥ karoti hi |

original: praṇavāntaṃ mahāmantraṃ nityaṃ japati yo naraḥ |

original: yad yajjñātvā surāḥ sarve jayākhyāḥ paramaṃ jaguḥ || 23-1 ||

original: yogābhyāsaṃ yaḥ karoti na jānātīha bhakṣaṇam |

original: ādau vivekī yo bhūyād bhūtale parameśvara |
analyzed: ādau vivekī yaḥ bhūyāt bhū tale parameśvara

udaram pūrayet nityam kumbhayitvā punar punar
nija hasta pramāṇābhiḥ pūrayet pūrṇam eva ca
tat pūrayet sthāpayet nātha viśvāmitra kapālake
haṃsa dvādaśa vāreṇa śilāyām api gharṣayet

original: dine dine kṣayaṃ kuryād bhakṣaṇādiṣu karmasu || 23-10 ||
analyzed: dine dine kṣayam kuryāt bhakṣaṇa ādiṣu karmasu
caret
śilāyām tad kapālam ca varddhayet pūraka ādikam

ākuñcayet sadā mūle kuṇḍalī bhakṣa dhāraṇāt

kāla krameṇa tat siddhim avāpnoti jita indriyaḥ
yat sthānam bhakṣaṇasya eva tad sthāne pūrayet sukham

athavā anya prakāreṇa bhakṣa tyāgam vinirṇayam

original: catuḥṣaṣṭidine sarvaṃ kṣayaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ sudhīḥ |

payaḥ bhakṣaṇam ākuryāt sthira cetāḥ jita indriyaḥ

ṣaṣ māsāt jāyate siddhiḥ pūraka ādiṣu lakṣaṇam
