dhārayet mārutam mantrī mūlādhāre manaḥ layam
atha āsana prabhedam ca śṛṇu mad siddhi kāṅkṣaṇām

original: yena vinā pūrakāṇāṃ siddhibhāk na mahītale || 23-23 ||
analyzed: yena vinā pūrakāṇām siddhi bhāj na mahī tale

original: sarvāsanānāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ hi ūdrdhvapādo yadā caret |
analyzed: sarva āsanānām śreṣṭham hi ūdrdhva pādaḥ yadā caret

original: tadaiva mahatīṃ siddhiṃ dadāti vāyavī kalā || 23-25 ||
analyzed: tadā eva mahatīm siddhim dadāti vāyavī kalā
etat padmāsanam kuryāt prāṇa vāyu prasiddhaye

ūru mūle vāma pādam punar tad dakṣiṇam padam
vāma ūrau sthāpayitvā ca padmāsanam iti smṛtam
savya pādasya yogena āsanam parikalpayet
tadā eka āsana kāle tu dvitīya āsanam ābhavet
pṛṣṭhe kara dvayam nītvā vṛddha aṅguṣṭha dvayam sudhīḥ
kāya saṅkocam ākṛtya dhṛtvā baddha āsanaḥ bhavet
baddha padmāsanam kṛtvā vāyu baddham punar punar
cibukam sthāpayet yatnāt hlādi tejasi bhāskare
iti āsanam hi sarveṣām prāṇinām siddhi kāraṇam

original: vāyuvaśyāya yaḥ kuryāt sa yogī nātra saṃśayaḥ || 23-31 ||
analyzed: vāyu vaśyāya yaḥ kuryāt sa yogī na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: sarvatraivaṃ prakāraṃ ca kṛtvā nāḍīva sāramet || 23-33 ||
analyzed: sarvatra evam prakāram ca kṛtvā nāḍī iva sāramet
āsanāni śṛṇu hi etat triṃśatā saṃkhyakāni ca

dvātriṃśat bindu bhedāya kalpayet vāyu vṛddhaye
kārmukāsanam ākṛtya udare pūrayet sukham
tadā vāyuḥ vaśaḥ yāti kālena sūkṣma vāyunā
kṛtvā padmāsanam mantrī veṣṭayitvā pradhārayet
kareṇa dakṣiṇena eva vāma pāda antikam taṭam
savya apasavya dviguṇam kārmuka āsanam eva ca
kārmuka dvaya yogena śara vat vāyum ānayet  /

nija hasta dvayam bhūmau pātayitvā jita indriyaḥ
padbhyām baddham yaḥ karoti kūrpara dvaya madhyatas
savya apasavya yugalam kukkuṭam brahmaṇā kṛtam

original: baddhaṃ kṛttvā adhaḥśīrṣaṃ yaḥ karoti khagāsanam || 23-41 ||
analyzed: baddham kṛttvā adhas śīrṣam yaḥ karoti khagāsanam
khagāsana prasādena śrama lopaḥ bhavet drutam

sthira vāyu prasādena sthira cetāḥ bhavet drutam
padmāsanam samākṛtya pādayoḥ sandhi gahvare
hasta dvayam madhya deśam niyojya kukkuṭa ākṛtiḥ
nija hasta dvaya dvandvam nipātya hasta nirbharam
kṛtvā śarīram ullāpya sthitvā padmāsana inilaḥ
sthitvā etat āsane mantrī adhas śīrṣam karoti ced
uttamāṅga āsanam jñeyam yoginām ati durlabham

original: punaḥ punaḥ prasādena caitanyā kuṇḍalī bhavet || 23-47 ||
analyzed: punar punar prasādena caitanyā kuṇḍalī bhavet
savya apasavya yogena yaḥ karoti punar punar

mūla ādi brahmarandhra ante sthāpayet laya ge pade
etat śubha āsanam kṛttvā sūkṣma randhre manaḥ layam
sūcī randhre yathāsūtram pūrayet sūkṣma vāyunā
etat krameṇa ṣaṣ māsān pūrakasya api lakṣaṇam
atha vakṣye mahādeva parvata āsana maṅgalam
yat kṛtvā sthira rūpī syāt ṣaṭcakra ādi vilopanam
yoni āsanam parvatena yogam yoga phala inilam
khecaraḥ yāvat eva hi
pāda yogena cakrasya liṅga agram yaḥ niyojayet
anyat padam ūrau dattvā tatra yoni āsanam bhuvi
tatra madhye mahādeva banddha yoni āsanam śṛṇu
yat kṛtvā khecaraḥ bhūtvā vicaret īśvaraḥ yathā
kṛtvā yoni āsanam nātha liṅga guhya ādi bandhanam
mukha nāsā netra karṇa kaniṣṭhā aṅgulibhiḥ tathā
oṣṭha adharam kaniṣṭhābhyām anāmābhyām ca nāsike
madhyamābhyām netra yugmam tarjjanībhyām paraiḥ śrutī  /
kṛttvā yonyāsanam nātha yoginām ati durlabham

original: kṛttvā yaḥ pūrayed vāyuṃ mūlamākuñcya stambhayet || 23-58 ||
analyzed: kṛttvā yaḥ pūrayet vāyum mūlam ākuñcya stambhayet   /
savya apasavya yogena siddhaḥ bhavati sādhakaḥ

aruṇa udaya kālāt ca vasudaṇḍe sadāśiva
savya apasavya yogena gṛhṇīyāt vāyu ga anilam
dvitīya prahare kuryāt vāyu pūjām manoramām
etat āsanam ākṛtya siddhaḥ bhavati sādhakaḥ
atha anyat āsanam vakṣye yat kṛtvā somaraḥ bhavet
mad sādhakaḥ śuciḥ śrīmān kuryāt gattvā nirāvile
bhekānām āsanam yogam nija vakṣasi sammukham

original: etat prabhedaṃ vakṣyāmi karoti yaḥ sa cāmaraḥ |
analyzed: etat prabhedam vakṣyāmi karoti yaḥ sa ca amaraḥ

original: ekapādena gagane tiṣṭhet sa daṇḍavat prabho || 23-68 ||
analyzed: eka pādena gagane tiṣṭhet sa daṇḍa vat prabho

original: kṛttvā sūkṣme śīrṣapadme samāropya ca vāyubhiḥ || 23-69 ||
analyzed: kṛttvā sūkṣme śīrṣa padme samāropya ca vāyubhiḥ

original: yo jānāti mahāvīraḥ sa yogī bhavati dhruvam || 23-74 ||

original: kālādīnāṃ nirṇayaṃ tu sa kadācinna naśyati || 23-77 ||

original: kṛtvā padmāsanaṃ mantrī jaṅghayoḥ hṛdaye karau |
analyzed: kṛtvā padmāsanam mantrī jaṅghayoḥ hṛdaye karau

kṛttvā sūkṣma vāyu layam paramātmani bhāvayet
atha anya āsanam āvakṣye yogapūraka rakṣaṇāt

original: adho nidhāya śīrṣaṃ ca ūdrdhvapādadvayaṃ caret |

original: nityaṃ sarvāsanaṃ hitvā na kuryād vāyudhāraṇam || 23-89 ||

original: bhūmau nipātya hastau dvau kūrparopari dehakam || 23-91 ||

original: nirantaraṃ yaḥ karoti tasya granthiḥ ślathī bhavet || 23-96 ||
analyzed: nirantaram yaḥ karoti tasya granthiḥ ślathī bhavet

original: ārādhya yoganāthaṃ ca sadā sarveśvarasya ca || 23-100 ||
analyzed: ārādhya yoganātham ca sadā sarveśvarasya ca

original: ūdrdhve hastadvayaṃ kṛtvā tadagre pādayoḥ sudhīḥ |
analyzed: ūdrdhve hasta dvayam kṛtvā tad agre pādayoḥ sudhīḥ

yat kṛtvā amaraḥ dhīraḥ bhavati eva iha sādhakaḥ

original: pṛṣṭhe pādadvayaṃ baddhvā hastau bhūmau pradhārayet |

original: pṛṣṭhe pādadvayaṃ baddhvā khañjanena jayī bhavet |

original: kareṇaikena pādābhyāṃ bhūmau tiṣṭhet śiraḥ karaḥ |

etat pūrakam ākṛtya kuryāt kumbhakam adbhutam
catuḥṣaṣṭi praṇavena japam dhyānam samācaret
kumbhaka anantaram nātha recakam kārayet budhaḥ  /
dvātriṃśat vāra jāpena mūlena praṇavena vā
kaniṣṭhā anāmikābhyām tu vāmam aṅguṣṭha dakṣiṇam
punar dakṣiṇa nāsāgera vāyum āpūrayet budhaḥ
manu ṣoḍaśa jāpena kumbhayet pūrvavat tatas
tatas vāme recakam ca dvātriṃśat praṇavena tu
punar vāmena sampūrya ṣoḍaśa praṇavena tu
punar dakṣiṇa nāsā agre dvādaśa aṅgula mānataḥ  /
kumbhayitvā recayet yaḥ sarvatra pūrvavat prabho
dvi vāram madhyamam proktam madhyamam ca eka vārakam
tri kālam kārayet yatnāt ananta phala siddhaye
prātar madhyāhna kāle ca sāyahne niyataḥ śuciḥ
japa dhyāna ādibhiḥ mur yuktam sagarbham yaḥ karoti hi
māsāt sat lakṣaṇam prāpya ṣaṣ māse pavanāsanaḥ
tālu mūle samāropya jihvā agram yoga siddhaye
tri kāle siddhim āpnoti prāṇāyāmena ṣoḍaśa
sadā abhyāsī pavanam janayet pumān
ṣaṣ māsa abhyantare siddhiḥ iti yoga artha nirṇayaḥ
yogena labhyate sarvam yoga adhīnam idam jagat

original: sadā māṃ kulasaṃsarge pātu kaule susaṅgatā || 36-193 ||

iti etat kathitam nātha mātuḥ prasāda hetunā

sarva deva manūnām ca caitanyāya su siddhaye
aṇima ādi aṣṭa siddhi artham sādhakānām hitāya ca

akulīne brāhmaṇe ca na deyaḥ kuṇḍalī stavaḥ

original: mama kriyāyāṃ yastiṣṭhetsa me putro na saṃśayaḥ || 36-199 ||

original: sa kṛṣṇaḥ śrī viṣṇuḥ prakṛtigadayā hanti satata|

original: sadā dhyāyet kṛṣṇaṃ kurugaṇaripuṃ yaḥ kulapatiḥ |

kula ānandam viṣṇum śaśi śata ghaṭa ārāma kiraṇam
manaḥ gamyam sūkṣmam triguṇa jaḍitam bhāvayati kaḥ

original: kṛṣṇabhaktiṃ mudā kṛṣṇaṃ dhyātvā kṛtvā yatirbhavet |
analyzed: kṛṣṇa bhaktim mudā kṛṣṇam dhyātvā kṛtvā yatiḥ bhavet
śrī kṛṣṇa caraṇa ambhoje tasya bhaktiḥ na saṃśayaḥ
kṛṣṇabrahma kṛṣṇabrahmā ca tri dhyāna parāyaṇaḥ

original: sa kṛṣṇastaṃ janaṃ nītvā dadāti api śaṅkara || 37-34 ||
analyzed: sa kṛṣṇaḥ tam janam nītvā dadāti api śaṅkara
vinā kṛṣṇa pada ambhojam svādhiṣṭhānam kutas jayam
kṛṣṇa dhyānāt mahāpadma bhedam prāpnoti śaṅkara

original: iti śrīrudrayāmale uttaratantre mahātantroddīpane ṣaṭcakraprakāśe bhairavībhairavasaṃvāde
analyzed: iti śrī rudrayāmale uttara tantre mahā tantra uddīpane ṣaṭcakra prakāśe bhairavī bhairava saṃvāde
svādhiṣṭhānaśrīkṛṣṇarākiṇīsādhanam nāma saptatriṃśattamaḥ paṭalaḥ
atha aṣṭātriṃśaḥ paṭalaḥ
uvāca
śṛṇu nātha pravakṣyāmi śrī kṛṣṇa sādhana uttamam
yena krameṇa bhaktiḥ syāt kāla jāla vaśaḥ bhavet
mama pāda ambuje bhaktiḥ bhavati eva na saṃśayaḥ
bhaktimān yaḥ sādhaka indraḥ mahā viṣṇum bhajet yadi
śiva tulyaḥ bhavet nātha mama bhaktaḥ mahī tale
śrī kṛṣṇam jagat īśvaram tri jagatām ānanda mokṣa ātmaka
sampūrṇam triguṇa āvṛtam guṇa dharam sattva adhidaivam param
liṅga adhas sthiti rājya pāla puruṣam pañcānana sthāyina

original: śrīviṣṇuṃ śubhadaṃ jano yadi bhajellokaḥ saśaktiṃ sukhī || 38-4 ||
analyzed: śrī viṣṇum śubha dam janaḥ yadi bhajet lokaḥ sa śaktim sukhī

original: ādau kāmaṃ trisargaṃ kulavadhuniyutaṃ kāmabījaṃ trisargaṃ |
analyzed: ādau kāmam trisargam kula vadhu niyutam kāma bījam trisargam
śrī kṛṣṇam vāra yugmam praṇaya yugalakam candrikā ākāśa yuktam

original: brahmadvandvaṃ bhajāmi prakṛti puruṣikāṃ kākinīṃ tatpare ca |
analyzed: brahma dvandvam bhajāmi prakṛti puruṣikām kākinīm tad pare ca
bhūyas bhūyas bhajāmi śravaṇa gala yanam vahnijāyā vilagnam

original: etanmantraṃ japitvā praṇavamiti namo'ntaṃ tathādye militvā |
analyzed: etat mantram japitvā praṇavam iti namaḥ ntam tathā ādye militvā

original: bhūyo bhūyo namo'ntaṃ tribhuvanasahitaṃ kṣobhayettat kṣaṇena |
analyzed: bhūyas bhūyas namaḥ ntam tribhuvana sahitam kṣobhayet tat kṣaṇena

original: rājaśrīstasya śīrṣe niravadhi vasudhā mandire saṃsthirā syāt |
analyzed: rāja śrīḥ tasya śīrṣe niravadhi vasudhā mandire saṃsthirā syāt

original: kālacchedaṃ prakṛtya pravasati sumukhī brahmadaṇḍe ca kāle || 38-6 ||
analyzed: kāla chedam prakṛtya pravasati su mukhī brahmadaṇḍe ca kāle
tatas prāṇe daivanātha mama santoṣa varddhana
idānīm narasiṃhasya mantram śṛṇu mahā prabho
mahā nṛsiṃha mantreṇa pūjayāmi namaḥ namaḥ
svādhiṣṭhāne mahāpadme manaḥ niṣpāpa hetunā

original: mano vidhāya yo yogī japenmantraṃ punaḥ punaḥ || 38-9 ||
analyzed: manaḥ vidhāya yaḥ yogī japet mantram punar punar
etad mantra japena api siddhaḥ bhavati sādhakaḥ
etad mantra prabhāveṇa bhāva siddhim kṣaṇāt labhet
sādhakaḥ yadi bhūmi sthaḥ sādhayet tu hareḥ manum
reṇu saṃkhyā krameṇa eva siddhim prāpnoti vīryataḥ
atha vakṣye mahādeva sarva varṇa su sārakam
varṇamālāsu asaṃśaktaḥ japtvā siddhim avāpnuyāt
siddhi mantram prārthayate yadi martyaḥ nirāśrayaḥ
nirjane saṃsthiraḥ ekākī
niḥśaṅkam prajapet mantram
vaśīkṛtam jagat sarvam yena tat kramam āśṛṇu
praṇavam pūrvam uccārya na anta bījam tathā udgaret
vahni bīja samālagnam adhas danta svara anvitam
narasiṃhāya śabda ante punar vāra trayam vadet  /
devī bījam śakti bījam svāhā antam manum udgaret
etad mantra prayogeṇa kuṇḍalī vaśam ānayet  /
svādhiṣṭhāne sthirībhāvam prāpnoti
sarveṣām prāṇa gaḥ bhūtvā prabalaḥ asau mahī tale

original: śītaṃ raudraṃ samaṃ tasya pāpāpāpaṃ jayājayam |
analyzed: śītam raudram samam tasya pāpa apāpam jaya ajayam
dharma adharmaḥ sadā jñānam nitya jñānam samāpnuyāt
punar śrī kṛṣṇa mantrāḥ ca sarva deva niṣevakāḥ
yat jñātvā devatāḥ sarvā sarva diṅmukha
tad prayogam mahādeva śṛṇu siddheḥ ca lakṣaṇam

original: vinā kṛṣṇāśrayeṇāpi brahmā tuṣṭo na kutracit || 38-21 ||
analyzed: vinā kṛṣṇa āśrayeṇa api brahmā tuṣṭaḥ na kutracid

original: na tuṣṭā kuṇḍalī devī paśubhāvaṃ vinā prabho |
analyzed: na tuṣṭā kuṇḍalī devī paśu bhāvam vinā prabho
paśu bhāve jñāna siddhiḥ vīra bhāve hi mokṣa bhāj
divya bhāve samādhi sthaḥ jīvanmuktaḥ saḥ ucyate
punar pūrva manum yuktā tri akṣara ātmā mahā manuḥ
etad mantra japam kṛtvā yogī bhavati yogi rāj

original: bahubhiḥ kiṃ kathanīyaṃ yaḥ karoti phalaṃ labhet |
analyzed: bahubhiḥ kim kathanīyam yaḥ karoti phalam labhet
dhyāyet śrī gopikānātham rākiṇī maṇḍala īśvaram
jagatām sattva nilayam śrī kṛṣṇam gokula īśvaram
śaṅkha cakra gadā padma mahā śobhā manoramam
sarva vidyā gatam kāmyam śrī govindam su śītalam
mahā moha haram nātham vanamālā vibhūṣitam
kirīṭinam mahā vīram bāla indum cūḍayā anvitam
guñjā mālā śobhita aṅgam śrīnātham parameśvaram
kāminī prāṇa nilayam vasudeva sutam harim

original: evaṃ dhyātvā ṣaḍdale ca sadā vakṣaḥsthakaustubham |
analyzed: evam dhyātvā ṣaḍdale ca sadā vakṣaḥ stha kaustubham
rājarāja īśvaram śaurim bhāvyam śrīvatsalāñchanam
svādhiṣṭhāna gatam dhyāyet murāri siddhi gaḥ naraḥ
evam dhyātvā purā brahmā nārāyaṇa guṇa udayaḥ
manaḥ kalpita dravyaiḥ ca pūjayet parameśvaram
ṣaḍdale ca mahāpadme saṃdhyāyet harim āyajet  /
ṣoḍaśa upacāra yuktaiḥ mānasa kṣetra sambhavaiḥ

original: manaḥ kalpitapīṭhe ca sthāpayitvā hariṃ gurum || 38-35 ||
analyzed: manaḥ kalpita pīṭhe ca sthāpayitvā harim gurum
ekānta citte ca āropya kṛṣṇam pīṭhe prapūjayet
tatra dala aṣṭakam padmam tatra ṣaṣ koṇa kaṇīkam
veda dvāra upaśobhañca sṃnirmmāya manoharam
punar punar yadā dhyāyet ṣaṣ daleṣu dala iṣṭakam
pañca upacāraiḥ daśakaiḥ śrī viṣṇum paripūjayet
āsanam svāgatam pādyam arghyam ācamanīyakam
madhuparka ācamana snāna vasana ābharaṇāni ca
sugandhi sumanaḥ dhūpa dīpa naivedya vandanam
prayojayet arcanāyām upacārān tu ṣoḍaśa
viṣṇoḥ ārādhane kuryāt sarvatra vidhiḥ eṣa yaḥ
vidhiḥ syāt kṛṣṇa viśveśa samudbhūtasya sat pateḥ
daśa upacāra kathanam śrūyatām vallabha prabho
pādyam arghyam tathā ācāmam madhuparka ācamanam tathā
gandha ādayaḥ naivedya antāḥ upacārāḥ daśa kramāt
viṣṇum sampūjya dhīmān
saṃbhāvayet svādhiṣṭhāne nirantaram mahā aśuciḥ
sa bhavet kālikā putraḥ yaḥ kṛṣṇa bhāva tatparaḥ
kṛṣṇam sañcintayet mūla kamala udrdhve kula ātmakam
sa bhavet kālikā putra uṣṭāṅga siddhi guṇa anvitaḥ
mānasaiḥ pūjanam kṛtvā śaṅkha sthāpanam ācaret
yat kṛtvā mānasam yogam na kuryāt bahis arcanam
mūlamantra devatāyāḥ sādhane daivatam yajet
devasya dakṣiṇa sthān ca pūrva upāsya su saṃsthitān
pūjayet gandha puṣpa ādyaiḥ tulya mantreṇa mantra vid
tatas śrī kṛṣṇa pāda abjam dhyānam kuryāt manas layam

original: evaṃ krameṇa tatpadme sthiro bhavati yogirāṭ |
analyzed: evam krameṇa tad padme sthiraḥ bhavati yogi rāj
yaḥ karoti śuddha bhāvam mahā moha haram harim  /
sthāpayitvā ca ṣaṭpadme mahāmokṣam avāpnuyāt
yaḥ pradhāna guṇa jñaḥ ca sa me śāstra artham āśrayet
ihakāle śatru loke nivasati eva yogi rāj
pāda ambhoje manaḥ dadyāt makha kiñjalka citrite
jaṅghā yuge cāru rāma kadalī kāṇḍa maṇḍite
ūru dvaye matta gaja kara daṇḍa sama prabhe
gaṅgā āvarta gabhīre tu nābhau śuddha vilemale
udare vakṣasi tathā harau śrīvatsa kaustubhe
pūrṇa candra ayuta pakṣe lalāṭe cāru kuṇḍale
śaṅkha cakra gadā ambhoje dos daṇḍa upari maṇḍite
sahasra āditya saṅkāśe sa kirīṭa kula dvayam
sthāneṣu eṣu yajet mantrī viśuddhaḥ śuddha cetasā

original: mano niveśya kṛṣṇe vai tanmayo bhavati dhruvam |
analyzed: manaḥ niveśya kṛṣṇe vai tad mayaḥ bhavati dhruvam
yāvat manaḥ layam yāti kṛṣṇe sva ātmani cit maye

original: iti śrīrudrayāmale uttaratantre mahātantroddīpane siddhamantraprakaraṇe ṣaṭcakraprakāśe
analyzed: iti śrī rudrayāmale uttara tantre mahā tantra uddīpane siddha mantra prakaraṇe ṣaṭcakra prakāśe
bhairava bhairavī saṃvāde śrī kṛṣṇasvādhiṣṭhānapraveśaḥ nāma aṣṭātriṃśattamaḥ paṭalaḥ
atha ekonacattvāriṃśaḥ paṭalaḥ
uvāca
atha nātha pravakṣyā iham saṃsāra sādhana uttamam
yena sādhana mātreṇa yogī bhavati tad kṣaṇāt
anāyāsena siddhiḥ syāt yat yat manasi varttate
trailokyam mohayet kṣipram trailokyam vaśam ānayet

original: rāmeṇa sahitaṃ nityaṃ jagatāṃ sākṣiṇaṃ varam |
analyzed: rāmeṇa sahitam nityam jagatām sākṣiṇam varam
jāmadagnya kara ambhoja sevitam sarva sevitam
ananta sattva nilayam vāsukī saṅgama ākulam
aṣṭa hasta agra su śrīdam nānā alaṅkāra śobhitam
svādhiṣṭhāna gatam dhyātvā śītalaḥ jāyate vaśī

original: tatstotraṃ śṛṇu me nātha yatpāṭhāt siddhimāpnuyāt || 39-5 ||
analyzed: tat stotram śṛṇu me nātha yad pāṭhāt siddhim āpnuyāt
brahma ādayaḥ sura adhīśāḥ munayaḥ kratu rakṣakāḥ

original: etat stotraṃ purā kṛtvā jīvanmukto mahītale || 39-6 ||
analyzed: etat stotram purā kṛtvā jīvanmuktaḥ mahī tale
atas śrī kālikānātha stotram śṛṇu mahat phalam

original: śrīviṣṇoradbhutakarmaṇo brahmaṣīstriṣṭupchandaḥ śrīviṣṇuḥ śrīkṛṣṇaḥ śrīnārāyaṇo devatā
analyzed: śrī viṣṇoḥ adbhuta karmaṇaḥ brahmaṣīḥ triṣṭubh chandaḥ śrī viṣṇuḥ śrī kṛṣṇaḥ śrī nārāyaṇaḥ devatā
sarva stotra sāra kavaca mantra siddhi arthe viniyogaḥ
śrī kṛṣṇam jagatām adhīśam anagham dhyānāt siddhi prada
govindam bhava sindhu pāra karaṇam santāraṇam kāraṇam

original: śrī viṣṇuṃ vanamālinaṃ narahariṃ nārāyaṇaṃ gokula|
analyzed: śrī viṣṇum vanamālinam naraharim nārāyaṇam gokula
yoga indram naranātham ādipuruṣam vṛndāvane bhāvayet  /
mokṣa śrī sahitam kṛtānta vikṛtam dharma arṇavam sundara
śrī rāmam bala rāma bhāva vimalam nitya ākulam sat kulam
śrī śyāmam kanaka ādi hāra vilasat lamba udaram śrīdhara
tam vande harim īśvaram guṇavatī māyā āśrayam sva āśrayam
vaikuṇṭha īśam aśeṣa doṣa rahitam sāyujya mokṣa ātmaka
nānā ratna vinimītā mama pūjā rāja indra cūḍāmaṇim
śobhā maṇḍala maṇḍitam sura taru chāyā karam yogina
vidyā gopa suta āvṛtam guṇa mayam vāc siddhaye bhāvayet
sva adhiṣṭhāna niketanam para janam vidyā dhanam māyina
saṃsāra utsava bhāva lābha niratam sarva ādi deśam sukha
vandeham vara sarpa śatru saphale pṛṣṭhe sthira ānanda dam
nityam śuddha guṇam gabhīra dhiṣaṇā āmoda eka hetum patim
vande śrīpatim acyutam nara harim daitya ari śikṣya ākula
gandharva prabhṛteḥ su gāyana ratam vaṃśīdharam bhāva dam
ratnānām adhipam gati stham acalam govardhana ādhāraṇa
viśvāmitra tapodhana ādi munibhiḥ saṃsevitam taijasam
vande govinda pāda ambujam ajam ajitam rājitam bhakti mārge
sattva utpannam prabhu tvam para gaṇanamitam cāru mañjīra hāram
haṃsa ākāram dhavala garuḍa ānanda pṛṣṭhe
bandhūka ārakta sāra anvita caraṇa talam sarva dāśa antarālam
rākiṇyāḥ prema siddham nava vayasi gatam gīta vādya ādi rāga
rāga utpannam su phala guṇa dam gokula ānanda candram
tam tribhuvana su jana āhlāda kartāram ādya
vande siddhānta sāram gati nati rahitam sāra saṅketi tā āptam
kāmam kāma ātmakam tam vidhu gata śirasam kṛṣṇa sambodhana anta

original: bījaṃ kāmaṃ punastat puruṣasurataruṃ bhāvayitvā bhaje'ham |
analyzed: bījam kāmam punar tat puruṣa sura tarum bhāvayitvā bhaja iham
śrī kṛṣṇam kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇam niravadhi sukha dam su prakāśam
gataḥ bhave siddhisthala stham
ākāśe cāru padme rasa bhaya valagam rakta varṇam
ātma ārāmam narendram sakala rati karam kaṃsa hantāram ādim
ādi anta sthāna hīnam vidhi hara gamanam sa indranīla amala ābha
bhāva utsāham trisarga sthiti param amaram bhāvaye bhāva siddhyai

original: sarveṣāṃ jñānadānaṃ rasadalakamale sarvadā tvaṃ karoṣi |
analyzed: sarveṣām jñāna dānam rasa dala kamale sarvadā tvam karoṣi
ātma ānandam sudhā ādi piraya dhana guṇinām eka yoga pradhānam

original: śrīrājākhyaḥ prapūrṇaḥ mayi dhanarahite dṛṣṭipātaṃ bhavādau || 39-18 ||
analyzed: śrīrāja ākhyaḥ prapūrṇaḥ mayi dhana rahite dṛṣṭipātam bhava ādau
kālī śrīkuṇḍalinyāḥ para gṛha niratam bhāvaka brahma rūpam
mukti chatram purā īśam nija dhana sukham bhāryayā krīḍayantam
sabhā kṣetram netram
dhyātvā aham praṇamāmi sūkṣma kamale lokādhipam vyādhipa
vaikuṇṭham kṛṣṇam īḍe kuru bhava vibhava kṣema hantāram antam
śāntānām jñāna gamyam sva nayana kamale pālayantam tri mārgam
vajrārim pūtanārim dva yavaka naraka dhvānta saṃhāra sūram
mānyam lokeṣu sarveṣu atiśaya manasam kevalam nirmalam ca
oṅkāram kāraṇa ākhyam sugati matimatām mātṛkā mantra siddham
siddhānām ādi siddham sura ripu śamanam kāla rūpam ripūṇā

original: mūlordhve ṣaḍdalānte manasi suvimale pūrayitvā mukundam || 39-21 ||
analyzed: mūla ūrdhve ṣaḍdala ante manasi su vimale pūrayitvā mukundam
nityam sambhāvaya iham nija tanu sama tā siddhaye pūjayāmi
tvam sākṣāt akhila īśvaraḥ piraya karaḥ śrī loka hastācītaḥ

original: kṣoṇīśaḥ pralayātmakaḥ pratiguṇī jñānī tvameko mahān || 39-22 ||
analyzed: kṣoṇīśaḥ pralaya ātmakaḥ pratiguṇī jñānī tvam ekaḥ mahān
yadi evam mama pāmarasya kaluṣam śrī dharma hīna andita

original: kṛtvā pādatale yadīha niyataṃ vyārakṣa rakṣātmagam |
analyzed: kṛtvā pāda tale yadi iha niyatam vyārakṣa rakṣa ātma gam
rādhā kṛṣṇa pada amala ambuja talam caitanya mukti ākulam
sarvatra ādi gama āgamam tri gamanam nirvāṇa mokṣa āśrayam
bālam vairi vināśanam sukha mayam kaivalya mokṣa āspada
daivam deva gaṇācītam rasa dale ca āropayāmi prabho
nirddaṣṭam bhuvana āśrayam yati patim nirvāṇa mokṣa sthitam
nirvāṇa ādikam odane pracapalam śrī cañcalā saṅkulam
vandeham parameśvaram sakala daityānām bala prāṇa ha
haṃsa ārūḍha nirakṣaṇam kṣaṇa gatam vāṇīpatim bhūpatim
vāñchā kalpalatā patim kula patim vidyā patim gopatim
śrī kumbha udbhava kāla satva nikaram tvām bhāskaram bhāvaye
siddhānām abhicinha yoga niratam rakṣa tvam ādau hi mām
prabho niḥsaṅketam guṇamaṇi matam śreyasi mata
matām antar sustham vigalita mahā prema surasam
mudā vande kṛṣṇam hara kara tala ambhoja yajitam
prabhā puñjam rāma āśraya pada madam kāma kuśala
trikoṇa stham ku stham kugati sugatim kāraṇa gati
pralīnam saṃsthānam jagati jagatām dharmam udayam
rama īśam vāṇī īśam vidhi gata padam śambhu nigata
tri kālam yogānām nayana kamalam śabda niratam
kula ānandam gopī jana hṛdaya gam
vidhānam tvām indram gurutaram upendram hari ripum

original: mudā tvāṃ vande'haṃ capalaṃ tāṃ me navahave |
analyzed: mudā tvām vandeham capalam tām me nava have
kula ālāpa śraddhā mayam akhila siddhi pradamanam
mala atītam nītam sura nara satām śāstra bhavanam
vinodam nārīṇām hṛdaya rasikam śoka rahitam
virājam yajñānām hita mati guṇam yāmi śaraṇam

original: etatsambandhamātrī mama kulaśirasi sthāyinaṃ pātu nityaṃ

original: maṇipūrabhedanakrame bhairavībhairavasaṃvāde rudraśaktilākinīstotraṃ nāma | ṣaṭcattvāriṃśaḥ paṭalaḥ
analyzed: maṇipūra bhedana krame bhairavī bhairava saṃvāde rudraśaktilākinīstotram nāma ṣaṭcattvāriṃśaḥ paṭalaḥ
atha saptacattvāriṃśaḥ paṭalaḥ
uvāca
śṛṇu kailāsa nātha abja cakra maṇḍala saṃsthitim
ṣaṭcakra bheda māhātmyam sa avadhāna avadhāraya
aprakāśyam idam mantram maṇipūra vibhedanam
aṣṭa aiśvarya sādhanāya jīvanmukti pradāya ca
kathayāmi mahākāla yat jñātvā yoginaḥ amarāḥ
kriyā sādhana mātreṇa kena yogena eva hi
sādhanāt eva sarvajñaḥ sarva artha jñānavān bhavet
rudrāṇī sahitam rudram dhyātvā sampūjya sañjapet  /
atha vakṣye mahā mantram pūjā prakaraṇam tathā
maṇipūre sthitaḥ mantrī rudrāṇī yajanam caret
samprati mantrasya uddhāram karomi kālakūṭapa

original: praṇavaṃ pūrvamuccārya namaḥ śabdaṃ tato vadet || 47-6 ||
analyzed: praṇavam pūrvam uccārya namaḥ śabdam tatas vadet

original: te śabdānte samuddhṛtya rudraśabdaṃ tataḥ param |
analyzed: te śabda ante samuddhṛtya rudra śabdam tatas param
rūpiṇyai padam uccārya rudrāṇī mantram īritam
tatas mahārudra mantram vakṣyāmi tattvataḥ śṛṇu
praṇava ante namaḥ śabdam te mahā śabdam uccaret
rudrāya padam uddhṛtya mahārudra manuḥ smṛtaḥ
tatas nyat kāla rūpa īśa rudrāṇī mantram āśṛṇu
ḍa ādi pha antaiḥ sarva varṇaiḥ ādi ante puṭitam manoḥ
sarva śeṣe vahnijāyā mahā mantra uttama uttamaḥ
asya jāpana mātreṇa ṣaṭpadma sādhane jayī
evam prakāram rudrasya ca athavā anya prakārakam
rudrāṇām vividham mantram koṭi tantre vinirṇayam
maṇipūre sadā dhyāyet yoga sādhana hetunā
sarvatra mānasam kāryam dhyāna pūjā vidhānakam
pramoda ākhyāti manubhiḥ mṛtyuñjaya ādibhiḥ tathā
caitanyam kārayet śīghram maṇipūra stha devayoḥ
atha vakṣye maheśasya rudrasya paramātmanaḥ
prāsāda ākhyam mahā mantram trailokya phala siddhi dam
sa antam oṅkāra saṃyuktam nādabindu vibhūṣitam
prāsāda ākhye manuḥ proktaḥ bhajatām kāma domaṇiḥ
praṇavam pūrvam uccārya svāhā antam japate yadi

original: stambhanādīni karmāṇi sa karoti na saṃśayaḥ |
analyzed: stambhana ādīni karmāṇi sa karoti na saṃśayaḥ
athavā mṛtyu jetāram mahā mantram mahā manum
japet mānasa jāpena yat jāpyam prāṇa rakṣakam

tri akṣara ātmā nigaditaḥ mantraḥ mṛtyuñjaya ātmakaḥ
athavā anya prakāreṇa japet mṛtyuñjaya ātmakam
mṛtyuñjayam samuddhatya pālaya dvitayam tatas
mṛtyuñjayam samuddhṛtya punar eva vilomataḥ
dvādaśa akṣara mantraḥ yaḥ mṛtyuñjaya abhidhā uparaḥ

analyzed: japitvā pūjayitvā ca naraḥ goptā bhavet vaśī

ati sa avadhāna paraḥ vidhi sevā parāyaṇaḥ

original: samāpya āsanaṃ sarvaṃ pītavastre pidhāya ca |
analyzed: samāpya āsanam sarvam pīta vastre pidhāya ca
athavā śukla vastre dve paridhāya manohare
komala ādi āsane gatvā prakṣālya pāda yugmakam
dvis ācamya vidhānena pūjāyām svastika āsane
vīrāsane tathā padmāsana yonyāsane tathā
upaviśya nirmala ātmā pūjā mārga paraḥ bhavet
sarvāṇi dravya bhojyāni manasā kalpitāni ca
tad alābhe sa lābhe vā manaḥ kalpita śodhanam
karaṇīyam sarvadā eva nija bāhye pi cālayet

original: yathā labhyāni dravyāṇi saṃśodhya tatra yojayet || 47-29 ||
analyzed: yathā labhyāni dravyāṇi saṃśodhya tatra yojayet  /
tatas kuryāt viśeṣeṇa prāṇāyāmam manoramam
catuḥṣaṣṭi mātrayā vā tathā ṣoḍaśa mātrayā
tad dvādaśa mātrayā vā saṃkhyayā vāyum āśrayet
prāṇāyāmam samāpya atha rudranyāsam samācaret
śrīkaṇṭha ādi mahāvīra nyāsam kuryāt prayatnataḥ
rudra nyāsam pravakṣyāmi manu yoga ādi siddhaye
etad nyāsa abhikaraṇe naraḥ rudra samaḥ bhavet
sadā kuryāt mahānyāsam sarva siddhi prakāśanāt
śakti hīnam śakti yuktam mahā nyāsam prakītītam
śakti yuktam samākṛtya mahā śaktaḥ bhavet balī
śakti hīnam tathā kāryam sarva vighna vināśanāt

original: mātṛkāpuṭitaṃ mantraṃ kiṃ vā mantreṇa saṃpuṭam |
analyzed: mātṛkā puṭitam mantram kim vā mantreṇa saṃpuṭam

original: vikramī siṃhatulyaḥ syāttaṃ dṛṣṭvā yānti śatravaḥ |
analyzed: vikramī siṃha tulyaḥ syāt tam dṛṣṭvā yānti śatravaḥ

maṇipūre sthiraḥ bhūtvā mahā tejaḥ mayaḥ bhavet
teṣām nāma pravakṣyāmi pañcāśat eka saṃkhyayā
pañcāśat eka śaktīnām tathā nāma śṛṇu prabho
sarveṣām abhidhāna ante īśāya namaḥ uccaret
ekaikam mātṛkā varṇam nāmnaḥ ādye niyojayet

original: śaktiyuktaṃ sadā nāma īśāntaṃ santyajet tathā || 47-40 ||
analyzed: śakti yuktam sadā nāma īśa antam santyajet tathā

kuśa āsane siddhi hetoḥ caila ajina kuśa uttaram  /
baddha ekam āsanam yogī nyāsa jālam samācaret
athavā dvīpi carma ādi komala ādi āsane api vā
yoga abhyāsī nyāsa jālam kṛtvā saḥ avabhayaḥ bhavet

original: bhadrakālī gṛhe sthitvā ye kurvanti nirantaram || 47-43 ||
analyzed: bhadrakālī gṛhe sthitvā ye kurvanti nirantaram
mahā nyāsam mahādeva tad kṣaṇāt amaraḥ bhavet
āyuḥ ārogya sampattim samprāpnoti mahā śriyam
samāyāti mama sthāne nyāsa yoga prasādataḥ
nyāsa dhāraṇa yogena maṇipūre hṛdaḥ bhavet
ādau tat nāma vaktavyam paścāt śaktyā abhivnanakam
śrīkaṇṭhaḥ ca api anantaḥ ca sūkṣmā ca
amareśvaraḥ ca arghīśaḥ bhāvabhūtiḥ tatas param
bhautikaḥ sadyojātaḥ ca api anugraheśvaraḥ tathā
akrūraḥ api mahāsenaḥ nirjara ādiḥ ca ṣoḍaśa
ete devāḥ mahā rudra ṣoḍaśa svara vigrahāḥ
krodhīśaḥ ca api caṇḍeśaḥ pañcāntakaḥ śiva uttamaḥ
ekarudraḥ tathā kūrmaḥ ekanetra īśvaraḥ tatas
caturānana ujeśaḥ ca sarvaḥ someśaḥ eva ca
mīneśaḥ ca api meṣeśaḥ lohiteśaḥ śikhīśvaraḥ
chagalaṇḍe dvis aṇḍeśaḥ mahākāleśvaraḥ tatas
vāṇīśaḥ ca bhujaṅga īśaḥ pinākīśaḥ tatas param

original: khaḍgīśa ścarakeśaśca śyeno bhṛgvīśa eva ca
analyzed: khaḍgīśaḥ carakeśaḥ ca śyenaḥ bhṛgvīśaḥ eva ca
nakulīśaḥ śiveśaḥ ca saṃvarttakeśaḥ eva ca
ete rudrāḥ samākhyātāḥ sarva kāle kula īśvarāḥ
yasya nāmnaḥ ca anta bhāte īśa śabdaḥ na vidyate
keśāntam nāma saṃskṛtya nyāsam maulīśam ācaret
kāmam moha ādi nāśa artham yaḥ karoti nirantaram

original: lolākṣī varttulākṣī ca dīrghaghoṇā tataḥ param |

analyzed: vajrā jayā tatas nātha sumukhā īśvarā api prabho

original: revatī mādhavī caiva vāruṇī vāyavī tathā |
analyzed: revatī mādhavī ca eva vāruṇī vāyavī tathā

vyāpinī ca eva māyā ca rudra aṅka pīṭha devatāḥ
sarva ābharaṇa saṃyuktā sindūra aruṇa vigrahāḥ
dhṛta śūla kapāla ādi bāṇa śakti prakheṭakāḥ
vara abhaya karāḥ nityāḥ sarpa vāhana vāhanāḥ
śrīkaṇṭha ādyāḥ mahārudrāḥ dhṛta śūla kapālakāḥ
khaḍga kheṭaka śaktīṣu gadā mūsala dhārakāḥ
nānā astra dhārakāḥ nityāḥ bandhūka koṭi sundarāḥ
raktacandana digdha aṅgāḥ pañcacūḍa dharāḥ parāḥ
rakta utpala mahā mālā alaṅkāra kara paṅkajāḥ
pīṭhanyāsam tatas kuryāt mama tantra anusārataḥ
sarvatra mūla puṭitam athavā varṇa sampuṭam

original: oṃ anantāya namaśca namo hṛdi tataḥ param |
analyzed: om anantāya namaḥ ca namaḥ hṛdi tatas param

original: mūke guhye bījanyāsaṃ śaktinyāsaṃ tu pādayoḥ |

original: śūlaṃ khaḍgaṃ dadhānaṃ varamabhayakaraṃ padmamekaṃ pracaṇḍam |

original: vāmā jyeṣṭhā tathā raudrī kālī kalapadādikā |

original: madhye catudīkṣu caivaṃ śeṣe vāradvayaṃ vadet |

original: evaṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ vidyāṃ ca śāntiṃ sampūjya yatnataḥ || 47-215 ||
analyzed: evam pratiṣṭhām vidyām ca śāntim sampūjya yatnatas
praṇava ādi namaḥ ntena caturthī anta padena ca
yojayitvā mahā pūjā vidhau kuryāt samarpaṇam
daśa dalasya madhye tu vibhāvya aṣṭadalam sudhīḥ
tatra eva pūjanam kuryāt aṣṭāṅga yoga siddhaye
praṇava ādi namaḥ ntena caturthī anta padena ca
pūjayet devadeveśam gandha puṣpa akṣata ādibhiḥ
ananta īśam pūjayet vai tathā sūkṣmeśam eva ca
śivottama īśam sampūjya ekanetra īśam eva ca
eka rudra īśam evam hi trimūrtti īśam tatas urcayet
bhaktyā samarcayet tatra śrīkaṇṭha īśam śikhaṇḍinam
tad bāhya patrikā agreṣu uttara ādi krameṇa tu
umā ādyāḥ devatāḥ pūjyāḥ praṇava ādi namaḥ ntikāḥ
umā devīm samabhyarcya tathā caṇḍeśvaram tatas
nandinam ca mahākālam gaṇeśam vṛṣabham tathā
indra ādīn lokapālāḥ ca gandha dīpaiḥ samarcayet

dhūpa dīpa ādi naivedya pāna artham punar ācamanam

original: evaṃ japaṃ sādhanañca purā nārāyaṇo muniḥ || 47-230 ||

original: etatstotraṃ paṭhitvā ca stauti yaḥ parameśvaram |

original: mṛtyuñjayasya mantraṃ vai japate yadi mānuṣaḥ |

original: krameṇa sarvaṃ karttavyaṃ kramabhaṅgo na cācaret || 47-251 ||

om hariṇīm āryām jayām buddhi dām

original: mātā yogavatāṃ satī parā parapadā mādhvīrasācchāditā |
analyzed: mātā yogavatām satī parā para padā mādhvī rasa ācchāditā

original: tvaṃ māṃ pāhi kṛpāmayī yamagataṃ mṛtyuñjaye śrīdhare || 49-5 ||

original: śrīvidyā bhayadāyinī tvamapi sā me nābhimūlodayā || 49-9 ||
analyzed: śrīvidyā bhaya dāyinī tvam api sā me nābhi mūla udayā

original: nādyastotraṃ bhaja bhaja bhaje tvāmanantāṃ svarūpe || 49-11 ||

tvam śrīghātrī dhavala kamalam nābhimūle pravakṣye
prītā a prītā parama gahanā cāruṇām ānanāyāḥ
tvam sā vidyā vidhi budha varā dhāraṇā jñāna gamyā
ramyā aramyā ramaṇa niratā nīradā pātu nābhim
kṣetra akṣetrā para cara gatā bhukti mukti prakāśā
kaula akaula ājñāpita nayanā gañjanā vāta mugdhā
mugdhā mugdhā mati dhanapateḥ nābhi saṃstheva nābhim
haṃsī siṃhāsana gata padā cakra vidyā su sūkṣmā
śrīvidyā tvam nava vila carā sundarī rakta varṇā

sarvāḥ varṇā parijana dayā nābhi padmam ca rakṣā

śrī śrīvidyā sakala vibhavā bhāvanīyā mahā indraiḥ
siddha sthāne maṇi maya gṛhe mūla siṃhāsana sthā
padme ca aṣṭa anvita yuga dale nābhi mūle mamāva
yoga jñānam dvividha vibhavam veda vidyā prakāśam

original: me cāṣṭāṅgaṃ samavatu mudā ṣoḍaśī bhairavasthā |
analyzed: me ca aṣṭāṅgam samavatu mudā ṣoḍaśī bhairava sthā
candrolkā tvam bhava bhaya harā śoka tāpa apahantrī

original: saṃśiṣṭā tvaṃ virata karuṇe śītale śītaśaile |

original: tvaṃ sā devī śubhamaṇigṛhe śītalatvaṃ vidhehi || 49-18 ||

original: mātastvaṃ me svamaṇibhavanaṃ pāhi sūkṣmā bhavānī |
analyzed: mātar tvam me sva maṇi bhavanam pāhi sūkṣmā bhavānī

original: tvaṃ mātaṅgī janani jagatāṃ bālikā vipracaṇḍā |
analyzed: tvam mātaṅgī janani jagatām bālikā vipracaṇḍā

original: tvaṃ me rudra hariharatanuṃ nābhimūle prarakṣa || 49-20 ||

vidyā caṇḍa amala sita sṛjā candana ālipta dehā

original: cittaṃ śubhraṃ kuru viṣayachedanaṃ chedini tvam || 49-22 ||
analyzed: cittam śubhram kuru viṣaya chedanam chedini tvam

original: bhogamokṣau kare tasya caihike yogirāḍ bhavet |
analyzed: bhoga mokṣau kare tasya ca aihike yogi rāj bhavet

original: pare yāti mahādevī pādapadme na saṃśayaḥ || 49-29 ||

nātha kānta pravakṣyāmi siddha sādhanam uttamam

original: yena sādhanamātreṇa naro yogī bhaved dhruvam || 50-1 ||
analyzed: yena sādhana mātreṇa naraḥ yogī bhavet dhruvam

original: sapta ūrdhvaṃ tathā nātha sapta bhūtalameva ca |
analyzed: sapta ūrdhvam tathā nātha sapta bhū talam eva ca
sapta pātālam evam hi sapta tri sapta saṃkhyakam
tad madhye trividham bhāvam divya vīra paśu kramam
divi tiṣṭhanti devāḥ ca vīrāḥ tiṣṭhanti bhū tale

original: paśavaḥ santi pātāle kramaśaḥ kramaśaḥ prabho |
analyzed: paśavaḥ santi pātāle kramaśas kramaśas prabho
sarvatra triguṇa channam sattva rajaḥ tama ādikam
sattva guṇam svarga madhye sarve viṣṇu parāyaṇāḥ

original: tadā sarve dṛḍhāḥ svarge bhūtale ca rajoguṇam || 50-6 ||
analyzed: tadā sarve dṛḍhāḥ svarge bhū tale ca rajaḥ guṇam
brahma sevā parāḥ sarve brahma jñāninaḥ eva ca
pātāle śiva sevāḥ ca śiva rūpiṇaḥ eva ca
tamaḥ guṇāt paśoḥ bhāvam tamaḥ dṛṣṭim samāpya ca

original: tato vihāya tajjñānaṃ vīro bhavati sādhakaḥ || 50-8 ||
analyzed: tatas vihāya tat jñānam vīraḥ bhavati sādhakaḥ
vīra bhāve jñāna dṛṣṭim brahma siddhim samāpya ca

original: sthiro bhūtvā mahādevo bhavatyeva krameṇa tu |
analyzed: sthiraḥ bhūtvā mahādevaḥ bhavati eva krameṇa tu
ākāśa gāminī siddhiḥ kramaśas bhavati dhruvam
mūlādhārasya ca adhas vai pātāla tala vāsinaḥ
tad ūrdhve brahmaloke tu bhū tala ādi nivāsinaḥ
tad ūrdhve sattva nilayam svādhiṣṭhānam hi daivatam
vidhi vidyā prakāśaḥ ca varadevasya sampadam
tad ūrdhve sarva rūpam ca sarva jñāna āśrayam param
para sthānam mahādeva maṇipūram manoharam
lākinī paramā māyā mahārudreṇa sevitā
maṇipūra prakāśāya rudra śakti vībhāti ca
mahā sūkṣma śabda mayam kuṇḍalam jñāna sādhanam
yasyāḥ sādhana mātreṇa yogī bhavati bhairava
prakāraḥ eva sevāyām mahā siddhīśvaraḥ bhavet

original: sarve ca paśavaḥ santi talavad bhūtale narāḥ || 50-17 ||
analyzed: sarve ca paśavaḥ santi tala vat bhū tale narāḥ
teṣām jñāna prakāśāya vīra bhāvaḥ prakāśitaḥ

original: vīrabhāvaṃ mudā prāpya krameṇa devatā bhavet || 50-18 ||
analyzed: vīra bhāvam mudā prāpya krameṇa devatā bhavet  /
yad kāle vīra bhāva ādi siddhim prāpnoti mānavaḥ
tad kāla nirṇayam vakṣye vīrāt deva tvam āpnuyāt
siddhiḥ māsena vākpatiḥ bhavet
māsa trayeṇa saṃyogāt jāyate sura vallabhaḥ
evam catuṣṭaye māsi bhavet dikpāla gocaraḥ

original: pañcame pañcabāṇaḥ syāt ṣaṣṭhe rudro na saṃśayaḥ || 50-21 ||
analyzed: pañcame pañcabāṇaḥ syāt ṣaṣṭhe rudraḥ na saṃśayaḥ
vīra bhāvam samāśritya sarvadā yogam āśrayet
paśoḥ adhīnam deveśa vīra bhāvam manoharam
vīra adhīnam divya bhāvam divyena rudra tarpaṇam
rudra darśana mātreṇa jīvanmuktaḥ bhavet dhruvam
jīvanmukti padam prāpya kin na sidhyati bhū tale
manaḥ niveśam ākṛtya paśu bhāva āśritaḥ naraḥ
vīra bhāvam samāśritya ca ādau yogam samāśrayet
sarvadā ca abhyaset yogam mantra nyāsa parāyaṇaḥ
yoga siddhim jñāna siddhim mokṣa siddhim tatas param
yadi mokṣam iha icchanti paśavaḥ śāstra mohitāḥ
sama jñānam vīra bhāvam āśritya yogam āpnuyāt
yoga abhyāsasya ca ādye ca śarīram pariśodhayet
ādau pañca amarāḥ kāryāḥ sarva kārya nirāśrayāḥ
kevalam yogam āśritya sadā pañca amarāḥ bhavet  /
dvi prakāram mahākāla pañca amara abhidhānakam

original: netī dantī tathā dhautī neulī kṣālanaṃ tathā || 50-29 ||
analyzed: netī dantī tathā dhautī neulī kṣālanam tathā
eka prakāram evam hi kathitam parameśvara

original: dantī netī tathā dhauti neulī kṣālanakramāt || 50-30 ||
analyzed: dantī netī tathā dhauti neulī kṣālana kramāt
evam vā nityam ākuryāt yoga siddhi samṛddhaye
oṣadhī pañcamam grāhyam pañca yoga su siddhaye
nirguṇḍī patram evam tu dūrvā granthi rasena ca
eṣām prakṛti nāmāni vakṣyāmi śṛṇu śaṅkara
kathitāḥ yoga siddhi arthe tat pramāṇam kramāt śṛṇu
pañca tolaka mānam tu vijayā patram eva ca

original: anyeṣāṃ tolakaṃ caikaṃ saṃśodhya bhakṣaṇaṃ caret || 50-36 ||
analyzed: anyeṣām tolakam ca ekam saṃśodhya bhakṣaṇam caret  /
etad bhakṣaṇa mātreṇa pañca yoge jayī bhavet
punar teṣām mahākāla manum vakṣyāmi tattvataḥ
sakalam ca amarā yogam mantreṇa anena bhakṣayet
tāta dvayam samuddhṛtya ṛ yugam tad anantaram
visarga bindu saṃyuktam tat paścāt amṛtāmukhi
dehi dehi padasya ante svāhā antam mantram uttamam
etad mantreṇa ca utpāṭya mantrayitvā prabhakṣayet  /
etad kāṇḍasya mantram tu tatra eva pariyojayet
nirguṇḍī mantrarājam tu śṛṇu vakṣyāmi bhairava
sarva yogam tatas paścāt sādhayat vayam eva ca
amṛta tvam mayi śaktam samarpayat vayam tatas
svāhā anta manunā ca atha ca utpāṭya bhakṣaṇam caret  /
bilva patram pragṛhṇīyāt tad mantram śṛṇu bhairava
brahmabījam tatas paścāt gaurasundari ca āvadet
mām sthāpaya mahā yoge pālaya dvayam eva ca
śaṅkara prema galite svāhā antam mantram uccaret
tulasī patram saṃśodhya ca utpāṭya manunā amunā
māyā chedam tatas paścāt saṃsāram
amara tvam dehi dehi svāhā antam praṇava ādikam
śṛṇu śrī vijayā patra śodhanam hi catuvīdham
catur varṇam sva mantreṇa pariśodhya kulākulam
tad kramam parivakṣyāmi sa avadhāna avadhāraya
praṇavam pūrvam uccārya devī bījam tatas param

amṛtemṛta śabda ante tad bhave padam tatas
krameṇa ca samuddhṛtya vijaye jñānasundari

original: mama paścāt kāyasiddhiṃ dehi dehi tataḥ param || 50-53 ||
analyzed: mama paścāt kāya siddhim dehi dehi tatas param

ākarṣayat vayam paścāt siddhim dehi anala piraye
etad mantreṇa saṃśodhya sāvadhānena bhakṣayet
nyūna adhikam na kartavyam śanais abhyāsam ācaret

original: yāvat pramāṇabhakṣaḥ syāt pramāṇe cādhikaṃ na ca |
analyzed: yāvat pramāṇa bhakṣaḥ syāt pramāṇe ca adhikam na ca
etat bhojanam ākṛtya payaḥ pānam samācaret  /

śarīram aparicchinnam brahmāṇḍam sacarācaram
mūla ādi maṇipūra antam triguṇam manu rūpakam
varṇamālām upādāya muhur muhur japet sudhīḥ
pūrṇa tejaḥ mayīm dhyāyet koṭi kālāgni rūpiṇīm
sva devatām sadā dhyāyet mūla ādi brahmarandhrake
tad mūtīm aparicchinnām gūḍha sthāna nivāsinīm
gabhīra ūrdhva gala ānandām sudhā sāgara vāsinīm
yat jñātvā brahma tulyam syāt brahmarandhre vibhāvanāt
mūlarandhre mudā dhyāyet koṭi kāla anala ujjvalam
jvalantam dhyānam ākuryāt ūrdhva śikhā prabhā karam
sudhā rasa moda mugdham havya agni sadṛśa ujjvalam
vigalat rasa puñjam tu tad rasa projjvala ānanam
sthira vāyu sthira ākāram mantra artham ca iti bhāvayet
athavā śuddha saṅkāśam pūrṇa brahma mayūkha gam
mūla ādi brahmarandhra antam mūlam dhyātvā punar punar
vicintayet sūkṣma rūpām mahā gurvīm sva devatām
mantra artham ca iti tat jñānam tad jñānāt mokṣam āpnuyāt
mantra artha jñāna mātreṇa siddhi nirvāṇam āpnuyāt

original: na sthūlaṃ nātisūkṣmaṃ guṇamayavapuṣaṃ viśvanāthaṃ svaśaktiṃ |
analyzed: na sthūlam na ati sūkṣmam guṇa maya vapuṣam viśvanātham sva śaktim
sva ānanda ānanda cittam kali phalam acalam cañcalam śukla raktam
pīna apīna ādi rūpam triguṇa ga gamanam mūlapadma ādi vaktre
viśvātmānam kula ākhyam manu guṇa jaḍitam bhāvayet siddha lokaḥ
catuḥ ṣaṣṭi kṣetre triguṇa jananīm dhyāna nipuṇām
mahā mantra ākārām bhuvana karuṇām bodha viṣaye
m avāpya amanda abdhau kula pathi bhajanti iha rasikāḥ
samastam śūnya artham rajata ghaṭa nārāyaṇa mayam
visargam bindu stham ravi śaśi kalāḥ vahni kiraṇam
jagat vyāpāra aṅgam bhava virahitam bhāva jaḍitam
vikāra ādhārā aham daśa dala bile sthāpayati dhīḥ
sura asura bhaya pradam taruṇa rūpa śobhā karam
manohara kalevaram sakala deha saṃjñāpanam
bhajanti munayaḥ nṛpāḥ yatayaḥ indra deva ādayaḥ
daśacchada niketane prakṛti deha madhya sthitam
pracaṇḍa vacana āśrayam dhvani kalāpa sammardanam
mahā utkaṭa tapaḥ priyam bhajati ca āśu toṣam śivam

original: nidhāya hṛdi paṅkaje kimapi nābhimūle'pi vā |
analyzed: nidhāya hṛdi paṅkaje kim api vā
vibhāva guṇa bhāvanam parikaroti yogī mahān
svakīya guṇa sattvake kaṭhina citta saṃjñā arpaṇam
catur bhuja kalevare daśa kalādhara indīvare
prakṛtya parameśvare praṇava rūpam āropaye
vivikta mati nirmalam kamala hāsa mālya āśrayam
śivam śataka bhāskaram sakala deha madhye pi vā
bhuja ayuta dharam dharādhara dharam hi mudrā dharam
bhajanti kula kāminī patayaḥ īśa veśma āspadā
sadā caraṇa paṅkaje
kṛpā maya sa lakṣaṇam gati gasa tva sambhāvanam
sadā eka guṇa bhāvanam parama devadevasya yā
triloka jananī pate ramaṇam eva kuryāt vaśī
evam kṛtvā nirālamba viśvāsa dhyānavān naraḥ
akasmāt mantra caitanyam prāpnoti artha vinirṇayam

original: iti śrīrudrayāmale uttaratantre mantrārtha caitanyavinyāso nāma | dvipañcāśattamaḥ paṭalaḥ || 52 ||
analyzed: iti śrī rudrayāmale uttara tantre mantrārtha caitanyavinyāsaḥ nāma dvipañcāśattamaḥ paṭalaḥ  /
atha tripañcāśattamaḥ paṭalaḥ
uvāca
ānanda sāgara ambhoja madhya stha parama priya
idānīm kālajāla ādi vāraṇam śṛṇu bhairava
sampūrya sañcaya ācchannam vāyum svābhāvikī gatim
kumbhayitvā svabhāvena cira kālam sukhī bhavet

original: śanaiḥ śanaiḥ recayitvā sarvadā tadgato bhavet |
analyzed: śanais śanais recayitvā sarvadā tad gataḥ bhavet
kāla jāla vaśaḥ yāti tad kṣaṇāt na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: vinā vāyvākuñcanena na sidhyati ca ko janaḥ |
analyzed: vinā vāyu ākuñcanena na sidhyati ca kaḥ janaḥ
vāyu cālana mātreṇa sūkṣma mārga udgamena ca
sidhyati eva mahā yogī kāla jāla vaśaḥ api ca
kāla vaśam na karoti mohāt atisukhāyate

original: kālabhakṣo bhavet so'pi mirayate nātra saṃśayaḥ |
analyzed: kāla bhakṣaḥ bhavet saḥ upi mirayate na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: maṇipure mano dattvā sādhayed devatāḥ sadā || 53-6 ||
stotraṃ dhyānaṃ nāma guṇaṃ paṭhitvā ca punaḥ punaḥ |
analyzed: stotram dhyānam nāma guṇam paṭhitvā ca punar punar
manaḥ yogam ca sarvatra vāyunā kārayet budhaḥ
kumbhayitvā dhārayitvā recayitvā punar punar
sarva kāla vaśam nītvā jita ātmā ca amaraḥ bhavet
lobha mohau varjayitvā kāma krodha ādi pātakam
sarvadā vāyu pānañca kṛtvā rahasi saṃvaśī
nityam vāyu sādhanāni ṣaṣ cakra bhedanāya ca
śanais śanais dhārayet vai cira jīvi tva sādhanāt

original: yadi na cirajīvī syāt kālātmā vāyusevakaḥ |
analyzed: yadi na cira jīvī syāt kāla ātmā vāyu sevakaḥ
ṣaṭcakra bhāva siddhi ante jñānī mṛtyu vaśaḥ bhavet  /
atas kuryāt śiva jñānam vāyu saṃsiddha kāraṇam
tad kriyā sādhana arthāya ādau pañcāmarā vidhim
kuryāt sādhaka mukhyaḥ ca nija kāya prasādhanāt

original: netīyogaṃ tadā kuryād yathā bhavati saṃvaśī || 53-13 ||
analyzed: tadā kuryāt yathā bhavati saṃvaśī

original: dhautīyogaṃ tadā kuryād yathā bhavati saṃvaśī |
analyzed: dhautī yogam tadā kuryāt yathā bhavati saṃvaśī
neulī yogam ākuryāt yatra lokaḥ na vidyate  /
dantī yogam tadā kuryāt yadā mukhya kriyāvataḥ

original: tadā kṣaṇena yaḥ kuryād yadā tṛṣṇāvivajītaḥ || 53-15 ||
analyzed: tadā kṣaṇena yaḥ kuryāt yadā
tṛṣṇā nāśaḥ bhavet mokṣaḥ iti me yoga nirṇayaḥ
viśeṣeṇa pravakṣya iham śṛṇu kailāsa pāvana

original: etatkāryaṃ purā kṛtvā divi devā munīśvarāḥ |
analyzed: etat kāryam purā kṛtvā divi devāḥ muni īśvarāḥ
kāya siddhim mudā kṛtvā
sarvatra gāminaḥ sarve dharma śāstra artha paṇḍitāḥ
cira jīvinaḥ eva api sakala śrī samanvitāḥ
tad tad bhedān pravakṣyāmi sādhanam kāya rakṣaṇam
yaḥ karoti mahādeva kāya sādhanam uttamam
saḥ āyāti mama ānanda sadane na atra saṃśayaḥ
prabhāte ca samutthāya brāhme kāla phala udaye
sahasrāre guroḥ pāda paṅkaja dhyānam ācaret
vicintayet tatas śrīmān guru rūpām sarasvatīm
sva devatām para ānanda rasikaḥ yoga buddhimān
praṇamya śirasā nityam śauca kāryam samācaret
śauca kriyā krameṇa eva siddhaḥ śuci guṇa anvitaḥ
pragacchet śauca kārya artham ghaṭamānam tu yatnataḥ
mṛttikā prastha mānam ca nītvā śaucam samācaret
kulkulam saptadaśakam varca tyāgam punar punar
tatas tarjanyā ca āloḍya vāma hastasya śaṅkara

original: gudarandhre samāyojya kṣālanaṃ hi punaḥ punaḥ || 53-25 ||
analyzed: guda randhre samāyojya kṣālanam hi punar punar
yāvat ca visasaṃtyāgam niḥśeṣeṇa mala kṣayam
tāvat mṛd payasā kṣālya śodhayet udaram sudhīḥ
yāvat na jāyate saukhyam tāvatkālam samācaret
tatas utthāya vidhinā mṛttikā śaucam ācaret
yena krameṇa viṣṭhāyāḥ gandha nāśaḥ api jāyate
pāda dvayam samākṣālya ca antaḥśaucam samāśrayet
tad kriyā saphalam vakṣye śṛṇu yogeśvara prabho
sūkṣma vastra samudbhūtam ḍorakam sūkṣma randhrake
nāsikāyāḥ dṛḍhataram komalam ca ati nirmalam
śanais śanais nīyojya atha jihvā mūle niveśayet
jihvā mūlāt sadā ādāya vāram dvādaśakam sudhīḥ
manda manda āgharṣaṇam tu kṛtvā bhedam samānayet  /
māyā trayeṇa bījena devī bīja trayeṇa ca
ramā bīja trayeṇa api yoginyai namaḥ iti api
etad mantreṇa yogi indraḥ samācaret
śiraḥ stha aṅgam samākṛtya kaṇṭha śodhanam ācaret

original: tato vakṣaḥśodhanaṃ tu tato nābheśca śodhanam |
analyzed: tatas vakṣaḥ śodhanam tu tatas nābheḥ ca śodhanam

original: krameṇa kuryāt kāyārthe tatprakāraṃ śṛṇu prabho || 53-34 ||
analyzed: krameṇa kuryāt kāya arthe tad prakāram śṛṇu prabho
dhautī kriyām samākuryāt tapta udaka nisevanam
śukla vastram sūkṣma sūtram ca aṣṭa aṅgula pramāṇakam
dvātriṃśat hasta mānam tu pūrṇa saṃkhyā udīritā
mantrī prathamatas kuryāt caturaṅgula vastrakam
dīrghe pañca hasta mānam tapta udaka samanvitam
bhakṣayet śeṣa jihvā agre saṃsthāpya vasanam sukham
tarjanī madhyamā aṅguṣṭha mudrābhiḥ bhakṣayet sudhīḥ

original: krameṇa vardhayennityaṃ dīrghe ca prasave tathā || 53-38 ||
analyzed: krameṇa vardhayet nityam dīrghe ca prasave tathā
etad mantreṇa deveśa pūrva ukta manunā tathā
sarvatra pūrva bījena saṃśodhya bījam uccaret
śakti bīja trayam paścāt kāma bīja trayam tathā
tu kṣālaya dvayam eva ca
bhāryā vahet tatas paścāt udare san niveśayet
śanainīveśam ākṛtya yāvat sarvaḥ prajāyate
etad yoga prasādena vāyavī su kṛpā bhavet
tatas kuryāt sādhaka indraḥ vigraha kṣema kāraṇāt
neulī paramam yogam gātra dṛḍha nibandhanam
ghūrṇāyamānam ākuryāt udaram parameśvara
sarvadā cālanam kuryāt prāṇa vāyu pradhāraṇam
vāme ghūṇītam ākṛtya dakṣiṇe ghūṇītam caret
evam krameṇa deveśa puṭapākam samācaret
etad mantreṇa deveśa śubha āsane haṭhaḥ bhavet
devī praṇava yugmam tu gātra sthāyai namaḥ dviṭhaḥ
tad ante nāḍikā ādīnām kṣālanam parama adbhutam
vakṣaḥ sthānam mahādeva dantī yogena kārayet
gajamānam dantakāṣṭham nirmalam sundaram matam
dantakāṣṭham kṣālayet vai manunā

original: me hṛdgranthiṃ chedaya iti yugalaṃ vahnisundarī || 53-50 ||
analyzed: me hṛd granthim chedaye iti yugalam vahnisundarī
krameṇa vidhinā anena gala randhre niveśayet
yāvat nābheḥ adhas yāti yāvat sukha mayāni ca
tāvat dantī yoga kāryam prabhāte sarvakāryakam
etad ante tatas kuryāt nāḍī kṣālanam eva ca
tat mantram śṛṇu vīra indra ca amara tva pradāyakam
ādau praṇavam uddhṛtya dīrgha praṇava yugmakam
śrī bījam manmatham lakṣmīm śītale tad anantaram
svāhā anta manunā nityam kṣālayet nāḍikā adhamāḥ
yāvat tṛṣṇā nāśakaḥ syāt tāvat kālam samācaret
tāvat na jāyate nātha kṣālanam sukha sādhanam
yadi bhāgya vaśāt eva tridaṇḍa vāyu kumbhakam
svayam eva samāyāti nāḍikā kṣālanam śubham
yāvat sūkṣma anila ālāpam madhu pānam nirantaram
pāda ambhoja niḥsṛtam tu parama ānanda vardhanam
tat sukhena aparicchinnam saṃjñāna nirmalena ca
tadā hi hṛdaya granthi bhedanam deha vardhanam

original: tadā hi pulakaṃ sthairyaṃ dehāveśasthiraṃ tathā |
analyzed: tadā hi pulakam sthairyam deha āveśa sthiram tathā
tadā ṣaṣ kañja siddhānta jñānam caitanya nirmalam
cit ānanda mayaḥ bhūtvā
sthira cetāḥ mahā yogī bhavati eva na saṃśayaḥ
āstikaḥ deva bhaktaḥ ca

original: sa evātmā mahājñānī bhavatyeva na saṃśayaḥ |
analyzed: saḥ eva ātmā mahā jñānī bhavati eva na saṃśayaḥ
pañca yogam samākṛtya nitya ādikam anuttamam
snānam kuryāt vidhānena tīrtha rāja niketane
iḍā gaṅgā jale vā api piṅgalā yamunā jale
suṣumnāyām sarasvatyām vasu puṣkara koṭiṣu
tathā api bāhyasnāne tu sarva aṅga mastakam vinā
sapta vāram samāsiñcet mastakam bāhya vāriṇā
mārjanena api manunā mūlamantreṇa vā punar
tatas uṅgam mārjayitvā ca sandhyā vandanam ācaret
bāhya sandhyām tu mantreṇa eva antare prakṛti īśvaram
ūrdhva adhas taijasam bindum nāda maṇḍala sampuṭam
sandhyā vandanam ākṛtya mahauṣadhim prabhakṣayet
pañcagavyam kula īśvara
tatas kuryāt mahā pūjām sva sva mantra ukta sādhitām

original: ṣaṭcakrārthaṃ tato dhyāyed yaduktaṃ vidhinā prabho |
analyzed: ṣaṭcakra artham tatas dhyāyet yat uktam vidhinā prabho
kuṇḍalinyāḥ mahā pūjā sahasranāma maṅgalam
devatānām paṭhet dhīmān sarva kāle su siddhaye
mūlādhāram mudā bhitvā sūkṣma vāyu dvayena ca
tatas bhedam svādhiṣṭhānam rākiṇī viṣṇu saṅgamam
tayoḥ anukramam nātha sahasranāma maṅgalam
bhitvā bhedam mudā kuryāt maṇi pīṭha stha devayoḥ

original: dhyānaṃ jñānaṃ stavaṃ nityaṃ yajanaṃ nāmakīrtanam |
analyzed: dhyānam jñānam stavam nityam yajanam nāma kīrtanam
caitanyam rudralākinyāḥ tathā mṛtyuñjayasya ca
nityam guru mayam dhyātvā sarva gāminam īśvaram
cira jīvī mahā yogī bhavati eva na saṃśayaḥ
iti śrī rudrayāmale uttara tantre mahā tantra uddīpane siddha mantra prakaraṇe
bhairava bhairavī saṃvāde maṇipūrabhedaḥ nāma tripañcāśattamaḥ paṭalaḥ
atha catuḥpañcāśattamaḥ paṭalaḥ
uvāca
idānīm śṛṇu sarvajña pañca dravya ādi sādhanam
ṣaṣ cakra padma bheda artham yat kramāt jāyate kṣaṇāt
amaraḥ ca amarā ca eva sarva siddhi pradāyikā
amaralatā tathā dhyeyā dūrvā saṃjñā pratiṣṭhitā
nīla amarā tatas grāhyā nīla tulasī saṅgitā
śivapriyā sadā pūjyā pūrva ukta āvāsam āśrayet
etad bhakṣaṇa mantrāṇi śṛṇu kailāsa bhūpate

original: brāhmaṇī kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrā cakramato jayā || 54-6 ||
analyzed: brāhmaṇī kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrā cakramataḥ jayā
tad tad mantreṇa saṃśodhya bhakṣayet manunā amunā
sarvāsām a mara ādīnām bhakṣaṇe samudīritā
praṇavam dīrghapraṇavam kapile jñāna sādhani

original: mama yogaṃ sādhayeti yugaṃ svareṇa sampuṭam || 54-8 ||
analyzed: mama yogam sādhaya iti yugam svareṇa sampuṭam
śākhā samūha sampūrṇe mahā oṣadhi nivāsini

original: māmekamamaraṃ dehi kuru yugmaṃ tato dviṭhaḥ || 54-9 ||
analyzed: mām ekam amaram dehi kuru yugmam tatas dviṭhaḥ  /
amara aśana mantrāṇi śṛṇuṣva pārvatīśvara
yasya smaraṇa mātreṇa naraḥ nārāyaṇaḥ bhavet
śiva vat viharet loke bilva patrasya bhakṣaṇāt
śrī bīja trayam uddhṛtya vāgdevī tritayam tatas
siddha viśveśi parame nigūḍha taru vāsini
mām ekam jñāna tattva inte niyojaya yugam dviṭhaḥ
śodhayitvā punar nātha cāmarām śodhayet tatas
tatas hi viṣṇu bījam ca kiṅkaṇī bījam uddharet
sudhā khaṇḍe mām iha ante siddha amara padam likhet
dehi dehi namaḥ svāhā śabdam uccārya śodhayet
etad bhakṣaṇa mātreṇa cira kālam sukhī bhavet
sarva saṃyoga mātreṇa siddhaḥ bhavati sādhakaḥ
siddha amara śodhanam tu śṛṇu śrī candraśekhara

original: siddhāmarā ca nirguṇḍī triṣu lokeṣu gopitā |
analyzed: siddhā amarā ca nirguṇḍī triṣu lokeṣu gopitā

original: etatpradhānaṃ mūlañca patraṃ vā cālayet sudhīḥ || 54-19 ||
analyzed: etad pradhānam mūlam ca patram vā cālayet sudhīḥ

original: mūlābhāve dalaṃ grāhyaṃ dalābhāve na mūlakam |
analyzed: mūla abhāve dalam grāhyam dala abhāve na mūlakam
ānayet sādhaka śreṣṭhaḥ śobhanena dinena tu

original: tadā bhavati siddhiśca kaulānāṃ niyamo nahi |
analyzed: tadā bhavati siddhiḥ ca kaulānām niyamaḥ nahi
kaulike sarva siddhiḥ ca kaulike yoga sādhanam
kula ācāra vihīnānām yoga bhoga ādikam katham
vinā yogena bhoga ādi sañcayaḥ jāyate katham
yoga sādhana mātreṇa bhoga sādhanam ālabhet
tad bhogam paramam jñānam kāla amṛta nisevanam
viṣaya āhlāda bhoga ādiḥ anāyāsena vardhate
śarīriṇām ādi kārya śarīrasya prabho priyam
ādi sādhanam evam hi kathitam sneha hetunā
vallabha prāṇa rakṣā arthe śoka atīvāraṇāya ca
punar tu kathaye tubhyam nirguṇḍī śodhanam manum
om nirguṇḍi mahāmāye mahā yava nivāsini
āyuḥ ārogya janani brahma śabda nivāsini

original: madīyaṃ sakalaṃ kāyaṃ śuddhaṃ kuru yugaṃ tataḥ |
analyzed: madīyam sakalam kāyam śuddham kuru yugam tatas
na anta yugmam bindu nāda bhūṣitam cāru tejasam
caturdaśa svara vyāptam ṭha yugam bindu bhūṣitam
etad mantreṇa saṃśodhya bhakṣayet sādhaka uttamaḥ

original: tato'maro bhavet kṣipraṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā |
analyzed: tatas umaraḥ bhavet kṣipram na atra kāryā vicāraṇā
tulasī śodhanam vakṣye śṛṇuṣva parameśvara

original: yatkṛtvā ca nirogī syād balavān vijitendriyaḥ |
analyzed: yat kṛtvā ca nirogī syāt balavān vijita indriyaḥ
praṇavam vaiṣṇavī devī sattva jñāna nivāsini

original: kāmabījatrayānte tu māṃ rakṣa yugalaṃ dviṭhaḥ |

analyzed: etat śodhanam ākṛtya bhakṣaṇam yaḥ karoti ca
kāya siddhiḥ bhavet tasya dhyāna dhāraṇa yoginaḥ

original: iti śrīrudrayāmale uttaratantre siddhamantraprakaraṇe ṣaṭcakraprakāśe bhairavībhairavasaṃvāde
analyzed: iti śrī rudrayāmale uttara tantre siddha mantra prakaraṇe ṣaṭcakra prakāśe bhairavī bhairava saṃvāde
pañcasiddhadravyaśodhanam nāma catuḥpañcāśattamaḥ paṭalaḥ
atha pañcapañcāśattamaḥ paṭalaḥ
uvāca
kathayāmi tava snehāt kāya vaśya viśeṣaṇāt
haṭhayogam prakathitam idānīm śṛṇuta kramam
maṇipūra sthitam rudram trailokye pavana akṣayam
kathayāmi śiva ānanda śiva śaṅkara maṅgala
svādhiṣṭhāna ūrdhva deśe ca parama ānanda sāgaram
nābhi mūlam vidyut śata ākulam
rahasya ati rahasyam ca yoginām atisāra gam
tad nābhi mūla deśe ca nīla padmam mahā prabham
tad dala agre sadā bhānti ḍa ādi pha anta akṣarāṇi ca

original: tad bāhye śobhitaṃ rūpaṃ trikoṇamanalasya ca || 55-5 ||
analyzed: tat bāhye śobhitam rūpam trikoṇam analasya ca
prabhāta sūrya saṅkāśam śikhā ākāram nirañjanam
tatra agni bīja rūpam ca rūpa atītam guṇa antaram
vicintayet meṣa pṛṣṭhavāhanam ca aruṇa ākṛtim
catur bāhum tri nayanam cāru deha dharam param
tad kroḍe bhāti rudra īśaḥ sindūra aruṇa vigrahaḥ
vibhūti bhūṣita aṅgaḥ tu lokānām iṣṭa daḥ vibhuḥ

original: tasya vāme sadā bhāti lākinī paradevatā || 55-9 ||
analyzed: tasya vāme sadā bhāti lākinī para devatā
śyāma aṅgī pīta vasanā vicitra alaṅkṛtā amarā
sarva siddhi pradā mātā sarvatra sarva pālikā

original: sadā rakṣatu māṃ devī vidyābhiḥ kulapālikā || 55-11 ||
analyzed: sadā rakṣatu mām devī vidyābhiḥ kulapālikā
evam dhyātvā pūjayitvā japa yāga stava ādibhiḥ
tatas siddhaḥ bhavet mantrī maṇipūra prasādataḥ
maṇipūra phalam vakṣye samāsena śṛṇuṣva tat
koṭi varṣa śatena api phalam vaktum na śakyate
maṇipūra anantaram hi pravaktavyam anāhatam
stotram dhyānam nāmadheyam sahasraguṇa śaṅkaram
phalam atyanta guhyam ca suhṛd padma upasiddhi dam
saṃhartā jana saṅghānām pālakaḥ kamala ākaraḥ
akasmāt jñāna sandoha lakṣmīm prāpnoti yogi rāj

original: iti śrīrudrayāmale uttaratantre siddhamantraprakaraṇe ṣaṭcakraprakāśe bhairavībhairavasaṃvāde
analyzed: iti śrī rudrayāmale uttara tantre siddha mantra prakaraṇe ṣaṭcakra prakāśe bhairavī bhairava saṃvāde
maṇipūrabhedaḥ nāma pañcapañcāśattamaḥ paṭalaḥ
atha ṣaṭpañcāśattamaḥ paṭalaḥ
uvāca
vada kāmini kaumāri surānande kuleśvari
hṛdaya ambhoja vinyāsam adhunā vaktum arhasi  /
yasya vijñāna mātreṇa naraḥ yoga īśvaraḥ bhavet
sarva siddhi kriyā sthānam yoginām ati durlabham
sarva tattva svarūpam ca siddhi mārga prakāśakam
bhavet
śrotum icchāmi tat sarvam ṣaṭcakra sāra maṅgalam
snehāt dṛṣṭi krameṇa eva bhakti yoga udbhavena ca
bhedanam bhāvanam jñānam citta darśanam eva ca
mantra uddhāram ca saṅketam sarvajña ādi guṇa udayam
yajanam kākinī devyāḥ īśvarasya guṇa ātmanaḥ
stavanam kavacam sarvam sahasranāma maṅgalam
vāyūnām maṇḍala jñānam samāsena vadasva me

original: tvameva śaraṇaṃ devi trāhi māṃ duḥkhasaṅkaṭāt || 56-7 ||
analyzed: tvam eva śaraṇam devi trāhi mām duḥkha saṅkaṭāt
mahākāla bhaya abhāva bhakti bhāva parāyaṇa
mama ānandabhairava īśa śṛṇu vakṣyāmi tattvataḥ

original: yaduktaṃ bhavatā cātra cāśrutaṃ cādbhutaṃ matam |
analyzed: yat uktam bhavatā ca atra ca a śrutam ca adbhutam matam

original: noktaṃ kutrāpi sarveśa tava snehāt prakāśitam || 56-9 ||
analyzed: na uktam kutra api sarva īśa tava snehāt prakāśitam
aprakāśyam idam ratnam duḥkha jāla nivāraṇam
sāvadhānena sarva īśa kuru tvam yoga sādhanam

original: mayi yogaṃ mahādeva kṛtvā kālavaśaṃ naya |
analyzed: mayi yogam mahādeva kṛtvā kāla vaśam naya
mayi yogam na karoti siddhi bhakti kriyā ādikam
akasmāt maraṇam tasya kālabhakṣaḥ na saṃśayaḥ
kevalam mām hṛd ambhoje paripūrṇa phala udaye
sarva ākāre manaḥ rājye nānā kautuka saṅkule

original: pūjayitvā sadā dhyāyet kākinīṃ māṃ na saṃśayaḥ || 56-13 ||
analyzed: pūjayitvā sadā dhyāyet kākinīm mām na saṃśayaḥ
sa yogī jāyate nātha hṛd ambuja prasādataḥ
hṛd paṅkeruha madhya sthāḥ sarve devāḥ sa vāsavāḥ
mām arcayanti te nityam bhakti bhāva parāyaṇāḥ

original: ye dhyāyanti mahāvīra te paśyanti savāsavān || 56-15 ||
analyzed: ye dhyāyanti mahā vīra te paśyanti sa vāsavān

original: krameṇa prāṇasaṃyogān māṃ paśyanti na saṃśayaḥ |
analyzed: krameṇa prāṇa saṃyogāt mām paśyanti na saṃśayaḥ
mām ekam kākinī dhyānam sthira vāyum pracaṇḍakam
paśyanti yoginaḥ kāye aṣṭa aiśvaryam mahā prabham
kevalam bhakti yogena nitya yoge syuḥ uttamāḥ
padma dhyānam prathamatas kṛtvā siddhaḥ bhavet naraḥ
tat hayānam śṛṇu vīreśa yoginām iha durlabham
hṛd padmam kula pālitam su lalitam haṃsena saṃśodhitam
bandhūka amala dīpti koṭi jaḍitam sambhāvitam sādhakaiḥ

original: dhyātvā paśyati yo naraḥ pratidinaṃ kādyāruṇairāvṛtam || 56-19 ||
analyzed: dhyātvā paśyati yaḥ naraḥ pratidinam ka ādya aruṇaiḥ āvṛtam
sa syāt koṭi dhana īśvaraḥ nara varaḥ bhūyāt tu abhāva arṇave
yaḥ nityam lipi bhāvanam prakurute nitya īśvara ālokanāt

original: taddhayānaṃ kramato vadāmi sakalaṃ yena prasiddho bhave-- |
analyzed: tat hayānam kramatas vadāmi sakalam yena prasiddhaḥ bhave
dale pūrve dhyāyet ati vimala varṇam kam iti vā
prabhāta arka chāyā aruṇa kiraṇa yogam yuga mayam
catur bāhum nityam tri nayanam anantam ravi gatam
bhava ādi aśakti stham sva bhavana ghaṭa aśobhita tanum
dvitīye khamaruṇa samūha āśraya padam
padam śrītāriṇyāḥ anila gaganayoḥ priya karam
mudā dhyāyet evam paramam anilam deva bhujagam
suvarṇa alaṅkāram tri nayanam amaulyam sukha mayam
tṛtīye patresmin vidhu yuta kapālam tri nayanam
sva sindūra ākāram dvi yuga bhuja śobhā bhavam aham
sadā dhyāyet evam paramapuruṣam śrī gaṇapatim
sphurat rakta ākāram taruṇa maṇi mālam jita madam
catuḥ patre dhyāyet yam aruṇa śatam ghora ninadam
kriyā dakṣam mūtīm trinayana sarojam yuga bhujam
phaṇa alaṅkāra aṅgam śiva śiva mukheśa uttamam aham
ṅaṃ bījam sindūra aruṇam am akhilanātham trinayanam
mahāmokṣa sthānam maṇi kanaka ratna ādya bharaṇam
catur bāhum rudram jagati bhavam ekam guṇa vibhum
kapālam śrī mālam varam abhayakam bibhratam aham
catur bāhu ullāsam kamala vara mālā asi sahitam

original: vibhuṃ taṃ dhyāye'haṃ vidhuśatamukhaṃ taṃ trinayanam |
analyzed: vibhum tam dhyāya iham vidhu śata mukham tam trinayanam
prabhāta arka prāyam sakala maṇi ratna ābharaṇakam
tam ekam netra stham cham amalakaram nūtana ravim
catur bāhum dhyāye vara tanu kapāleṣu sahitam
sudhā dhārā pānam kanaka japa mālā vṛta tanum
trinetram yoga indram vasu dala gatam cāru vadanam
caturvaktram dhyāye jam ajam amaram sa aruṇa tanum
viśāla akṣam sūkṣmam sama rasa mayam brahma vapuṣam
catur bāhum devam tribhuvana padam sāra ghaṭitam
mahāśaṅkham rudram varam abhayakam
mahākāyam tejaḥ mayam api carum bījam akhilam
mudā dhyāye kāma apaham atimukham ca aṣṭama dale
trinetram pañcāsyam daśa bhuja yutam sarva vapuṣam
catur bāhum dhyāye su kamala gadā cakra niyutam
mahā mālā vyāptam su kanaka śubha alaṅkṛta gurum
manaḥ rūpa ācchannam trinayanam adhīśa aruṇa dale
tam ekam soma īśam maṇi maya calat kuṇḍala dharam

original: mudā dhyāye śambhuṃ hṛdi śivadale siddhakamale || 56-31 ||
analyzed: mudā dhyāye śambhum hṛdi śiva dale siddha kamale
trinetram kāma ākhyam śiśu karuṇayā siddhi phala dam
su ratna alaṅkāra chavi ruci tanūnām sam anagham
ṭhakāram bindu indvam nava ravi ghaṭā koṭi kiraṇam
dale ca arke dhyāye kamala vara mālā śiśu dharam
etat śuddha manaḥ layasya bhavanam caitanya saṃsiddhaye
varṇānām japa bhāvanam yadi sadā cintāmaṇeḥ maṇḍalam
yogi indraḥ kurute vaśiṣṭha sadṛśaḥ vācām patiḥ bhū tale

original: vāksiddhiṃ cirakālavāsamakhile devo hi no mānuṣaḥ || 56-33 ||
analyzed: vāc siddhim cira kāla vāsam akhile devaḥ hi naḥ mānuṣaḥ
vāñchā cintāmaṇi gṛham hṛdaya ambhoja maṇḍalam
tad madhye pavana sthānam maṇḍala ākāram ulbaṇam
buddhi pratibhayā vyāptam tad madhye pavana akṣaram
ācchanna dhūma saṅkāśam prasiddha sthānam uttamam
tad madhye devatā pīṭham ṣaṭkoṇam maṇḍalam param
tad madhye bhāvayet iṣṭam sva sva kalpa ukta sādhitam
vāyoḥ dhyānam tatra kuryāt atyanta sūkṣma rūpiṇam
nirākāram param brahma sa ākāram śabda rūpiṇam
nirakṣaram sva akṣara āḍhyam mahā ugram sthira rūpiṇam
catur bāhum jagat vyāptam kṛṣṇa sāra āsanam yavam
pañcabhūta ātmakam raudram prāṇa sañjñam kirīṭinam
saṃbibhratam vara abhīti ghaṇṭā ḍamaru sevakān
īśa nāmnā paricitam para haṃsam kula īśvaram
sarva alaṅkāra śobhā aṅgam viveka udaya kāraṇam
vicintayet sādhaka indraḥ parivāra gaṇa āvṛtam
tatra paṅkeruhe dhyāyet īśvaram varṇa rūpiṇam
trailokya maṅgalam nātham catur bāhum kirīṭinam
ratna mālā śobhita aṅgam śukla varṇam mahā prabham
īśvaram yoginām īśam vara dam parameśvaram
vara abhīti śaṅkha padma śriyā juṣṭam purātanam
ratna ābharaṇa bhūṣā aṅgam hṛdaya ambhoja vāsinam
paramahaṃsam īśānam dhyāyet hṛd padma maṇḍale
tad pārśve dhyānam ākuryāt kākinīm parameśvarīm
trailokya pūjitām devīm kāka cañcu prakāśinīm
catur bhujām pīta varṇām pīta vastra upaśobhitām
nava vidyut koṭi rūpām vilola netra paṅkajām
kapāla śaśi śūla astra vara dāna samākulām
vicitra ratna nirmāṇa svarṇa alaṅkāra bhūṣitām
trailokya lalitām sūkṣmām vara abhaya kara ambujām
sudhā pāna ratām mattām pūrṇa rūpām kula īśvarīm
ratna kaṅkaṇa mālā āḍhyām paramānandabhairavīm
hṛdaya ambhoja madhya sthām dhyāya iham haṃsa gāminīm
tad pīṭha madhya nikare trikoṇam paricintayet
pīṭha śaktim suvarṇa āḍhyām vidyut koṭi sama udayām
kākinī sadṛśīm mattām pūrṇa antar karaṇa udyatām
sarva alaṅkāra bhūṣā āḍhyām parivāra gaṇa āvṛtām
tad dakṣiṇe pārśva bhāge cintayet tvām aliṅgakam
suvarṇa śuddha saṅkāśam nirmalam cāru tejasam
jñāna yoga udayam brahma rūpiṇam bahu rūpiṇam
pradīpa kalikā ākāram cintayet īśvaram śivam
eteṣām jñānam ākṛtya vāgīśaḥ bhavati kṣaṇāt
vākya siddhim tatra nātha cintayet prasiddhaye
tatra bhānoḥ maṇḍalam ca cintayet
padma kiñjalka madhye tu cintayet aruṇā yutam
dvi māse granthibhedaḥ syāt ananta guṇavān bhavet
tri māse yoga yogyaḥ syāt sarpa ādi viṣa nāśa kṛt
catur māse nirmala ātmā bhāvakaḥ sthira mānasaḥ
pañcame māsi samprāpte vāyavī kṛpayā anvitā
sthira vāyuḥ sthirā dṛṣṭiḥ atīva sukha sampadaḥ
tatas dine dine vṛddhiḥ vāyūnām anukampayā
ṣaṣ māsāt pāpa saṃtyaktaḥ mukta vat bhramate ciram

original: jale cāgnau ca bhūgarte kadācinna mirayeta hi || 56-61 ||
analyzed: jale ca agnau ca bhū garte kadācid na mirayeta hi

original: sa bhūtvā cirajīvī ca bhuktibhāgī dine dine |
analyzed: sa bhūtvā cira jīvī ca bhukti bhāgī dine dine
saptame kalpa santyaktaḥ madanaḥ doṣa vigrahaḥ
aṣṭame sarva śatrughnaḥ

navame kṣālanā siddhiḥ bhūmi tyāgaḥ tri hastakaḥ
daśame yoga siddhiḥ ca ṣaṭcakra ādi pradarśanam
sapta svarga ālokanam ca ṣaṣ śiva priya darśanam
dvādaśe deva sanmānam devatā pāda darśanam

original: te vīrāste ca yogīndrāste divyāste ca bhairavāḥ || 56-69 ||
analyzed: te vīrāḥ te ca yogi indrāḥ te divyāḥ te ca bhairavāḥ

original: ye tiṣṭhanti mahāraṇye nirjane parvate ciram || 56-70 ||

original: yoge yogād bhavenmokṣa iti me tattvanirṇayaḥ || 56-71 ||
analyzed: yoge yogāt bhavet mokṣaḥ iti me tattva nirṇayaḥ

original: loke hi durlabhaṃ yogaṃ yogātparataraṃ nahi || 56-72 ||
analyzed: loke hi durlabham yogam yogāt parataram nahi

original: sarvatrāpi manoyogād baddho mukto bhaved dhruvam || 56-74 ||
analyzed: sarvatra api manaḥ yogāt baddhaḥ muktaḥ bhavet dhruvam

original: iti śrīrudrayāmale uttaratantre mahātantroddīpane siddhamantraprakaraṇe ṣaṭcakraprakāśe
analyzed: iti śrī rudrayāmale uttara tantre mahā tantra uddīpane siddha mantra prakaraṇe ṣaṭcakra prakāśe
bhairava bhairavīsaṃvādena āhatapadmavinyāsaḥ nāma ṣaṭpañcāśattamaḥ paṭalaḥ
atha saptapañcāśattamaḥ paṭalaḥ
uvāca
atha atas sampravakṣyāmi viveka guṇa lakṣaṇam
varṇa dhyāna anantaram hi pūjanam tat mahā phalam
pūjayā labheta pūjām vivekam bhāva sambhavam
kākinīśvara saṃyogam bhāvam parama durlabham
yajanam kākinī devyāḥ īśvarasya api bhāvanam
pūjā abhāve mahāsiddhiḥ jāyate tad kṣaṇāt śiva

original: bhāvena labhyate pūjā vivekaṃ pūjayā labhet |
analyzed: bhāvena labhyate pūjā vivekam pūjayā labhet
vivekam brahma bhāvam tu prāpnoti koṭi janmani
athavā labhyate śīghram tava api mad anugrahaiḥ
tad prakāram śṛṇu prāṇa vallabha tripureśvara
yasya vijñāna mātreṇa bhavet parama bhāvakaḥ
vicintayet varṇa pārśve catu dīkṣu krameṇa tu
siddha īśvarān yoga yuktān mahāpuruṣa saṃśritān

original: brahmāṇaṃ paramaṃ haṃsaṃ rudraṃ viśveśvaraṃ prabhum || 57-7 ||
analyzed: brahmāṇam paramam haṃsam rudram viśveśvaram prabhum

original: candraṃ sūryaṃ prajānāthaṃ dakṣaṃ munīndrameva ca |
analyzed: candram sūryam prajānātham dakṣam muni indram eva ca
pracetasam marīcin ca kaśyapam pulaham tathā

original: tathā rūpaṃ rasaṃ gandhaṃ prakṛtiñca vikārakam || 57-12 ||
analyzed: tathā rūpam rasam gandham prakṛtim ca vikārakam
yat ca anyat kāraṇam sarvam bhuvā akṣayam carācaram

agastyaḥ ca mahā tejāḥ mārkaṃṇḍeyaḥ ca vīryavān
yamadagniḥ bharadvājaḥ saṃvartaḥ cyavanaḥ tathā
durvāsāḥ ca mahābhāgaḥ ṛṣyaśṛgan ca dhāmīkaḥ
sanatkumāraḥ bhagavān yoga ācāryaḥ mahā tapāḥ
asitaḥ devalaḥ ca eva jaigīṣavyaḥ ca tattva vid
ṛṣabha ajīta śakraḥ ca mahā vīryaḥ tathā maṇiḥ
āyurvedam tathā aṣṭāṅgam ete bhānti sva mūrtayaḥ
candramāḥ saha nakṣatraiḥ ādityaiḥ ca gabhastibhiḥ

original: vāyava ṛtavaścaiva saṅkalpaḥ prāṇa eva ca |
analyzed: vāyavaḥ ṛtavaḥ ca eva saṅkalpaḥ prāṇaḥ eva ca
mūtīmantaḥ mahātmānaḥ mahā vrata parāyaṇāḥ

original: ete cānye ca bahava īśvaraṃ samupāsate |
analyzed: ete ca anye ca bahavaḥ īśvaram samupāsate
ete pārśve cintanīyāḥ varṇānām sādhaka uttamaiḥ

original: artho dharmaśca kāmaśca harṣo dveṣastathā damaḥ || 57-20 ||
analyzed: arthaḥ dharmaḥ ca kāmaḥ ca harṣaḥ dveṣaḥ tathā damaḥ
tatra gandharva mukhyāḥ ca sahita apsarasaḥ tathā
viṃśatiḥ sapta ca eva anye lokapālāḥ ca sarvaśas
śukraḥ bṛhaspatiḥ ca eva budha uṅgārakaḥ eva ca

original: śanaiścaraśca rāhuśca grahāḥ sarve tathaiva ca || 57-22 ||
analyzed: śanaiścaraḥ ca rāhuḥ ca grahāḥ sarve tathā eva ca
mantraḥ rathantaraḥ ca eva haviṣmān vasumān api

tad madhye kaṇīkā sthānam tad madhye ca catur dalam
catur dala ante sā devī vibhāti tām upāśrayet
tām upakuñcya yatnena siddha rūpī

original: devaiḥ sārdhaṃ tato gacchet ṣaḍdale kākinīsthale |
analyzed: devaiḥ sārdham tatas gacchet ṣaṣ dale kākinī sthale
tayā sārdham kuṇḍalinyā devaiḥ gacchet daśacchade

original: evaṃ krameṇa hṛtpadmaṃ ṣoḍaśāraṃ tataḥ param |
analyzed: evam krameṇa hṛd padmam ṣoḍaśa aram tatas param
dvi dalam bhedam ākṛtya bodhinīcakram āśrayet

original: tadūrdhve brahmadaṇḍaṃ tu tadūrdhve kevalaṃ jalam || 64-254 ||
analyzed: tad ūrdhve brahmadaṇḍam tu tad ūrdhve kevalam jalam

sarva bīja mayam nātha mātṛkā maṇḍalam tatas
mātṛkā maṇḍala ūrdhve ca preta bījam sudhā mayam
pretāsana upari dhyāyet mahākāla kula īśvarīm
tatra eva śrī pada ambhoja tale saṃsthāpayet manaḥ  /
pūrva ukta devatābhiḥ tu laya yogena lepayet
tatra eva sthitvā saṃdhyāyet mūlena alam anum prabho
vāyu bījena prajvālya dahet deham yati īśvaraḥ

original: pradahya bhrūdale netre vahnau vahnilayaṃ caret |

original: sādhakālambanaṃ vakṣye yena siddho hi sādhakaḥ |

analyzed: japam samarpayet devyāḥ vāma haste tu mantrakaiḥ
guhyā ati guhya goptrī tvam gṛhāṇa asmad kṛtam japam
siddhiḥ bhavatu me devi tvad prasādāt sureśvari
prāṇāyāmam tri ṣaṣ kṛtvā vandanam ca pradakṣiṇam
saṃvande vara de devi trailokya kula pāvani
sarva siddhi prade devi śākinī tvām namāmi aham
veda vidyā prakāśe tvam nānā vidyā vinodini

original: bhavāni siddhide devi varadā bhava sarvadā |
analyzed: bhavāni siddhi de devi vara dā bhava sarva dā
sarva dānava hantrī tvam mama śatrūn vināśaya
akāla mṛtyu haraṇam kula kaumāri śākini
sadāśiva yute nitye sadāśiva vihāriṇi

original: amaratvaṃ sadā dehi bhaktiṃ muktiṃ prayaccha me |
analyzed: amara tvam sadā dehi bhaktim muktim prayaccha me
śākinī prāṇa de devi devānām prāṇa rakṣiṇi  /
śākambhari namaḥ te tu mama deham samāśraya
vāñchā kalpataroḥ mūle sthāyini prema dāyini

original: kāmākhye praṇamāmi śākini padaṃ mātahī śākambhari |
analyzed: kāmākhye praṇamāmi śākini padam mātahī śākambhari
devānām jagatām hitāya vinaye samyak vara śrī prade
sthiti ādi krama saṃsthitā bhava mahā ākāśa prabhā cañcale

original: iti praṇamya bhāvena bhuktimuktī labhed dhruvam |
analyzed: iti praṇamya bhāvena bhukti muktī labhet dhruvam

original: iti śrīrudrayāmale uttaratantre mahātantroddīpane siddhamantraprakaraṇe ṣaṭcakraprakāśe
analyzed: iti śrī rudrayāmale uttara tantre mahā tantra uddīpane siddha mantra prakaraṇe ṣaṭcakra prakāśe

original: kuru nātha vandanaṃ bho pūjanaṃ kavacaṃ paṭha |
analyzed: kuru nātha vandanam bho pūjanam kavacam paṭha

paramā śākinī vidyā mahā moha nivāriṇī
yoginī koṭibhiḥ sārdham rājate sūrya vat sadā
vārāṇasī pure sthitvā kaṇṭha padma sthitām bhaja
stotreṇa anena vidhinā bhaktim kuru mahāśive
akhaṇḍe nīla paṅkeruha vimala kare sthāpitām ṣoḍaśāre
hema ābhām vidyuta ābhām su kaṇaka valayām candra koṭi prabhāvām
śrī kanyām śākinī īśām tripura hara kara ambhoja pūjā vinodīm
kāma ākhyām rudra māyām vadhu nayana yutām śakra kānta prakāśām
sindhu sthām bhāvayāmi pramatha gaṇa vadhū projjvalām veda yuktām
yoga indra ānanda kartrīm kamala valayām nīla jīmūta netrām
oṅkārām kāraṇa ākhyām madhu gṛha nikarām aṣṭa geha prakāśā
mā ānanda jñāna nityām dvi vinada la kalām kaṇṭha vaikuṇṭha śobhām
dharma artha jñāna dātrīm tribhuvana bhuvika āhlāda hetoḥ prakāśyām
vindhya sthām pīṭha kanyām tri kamala nayanām veda hastām prasannām
smera āsyām candra vaktrām hari hara vidhibhiḥ dhyāna gamyām kadācid
cchambhu sthām cāru rūpām bhava bhaya haraṇīm tāriṇīm bhāvayāmi  /
sūkṣmām sthūla prabhā āḍhyām caraṇa tala vibhā koṭi bandhūka kāntim
kāntānām kāma kāntām jaya rati bhavatīm śākinīm śoka hantrīm
śabda antar prāntara sthām sthiti laya gaganām padmarāga sraj āḍhyām
kāntyā viśvam jvalantīm madana vadhuram ā bīja mālām smarāmi
vyāghra sthām vyāghra vastrām hariṇa nayanakaiḥ kevala ānanda rūpām

original: vāmāṃ śaktiṃ pravālāṃ trikulajalakalāṃ kālarājeśvarīṃ yām |
analyzed: vāmām śaktim pravālām tri kula jala kalām kālarāja īśvarīm yām
ānanda abdhau prabhāntīm prabhu gaṇa bhaya hām mātṛkā bīja bhūṣām
ghorām aṭṭa aṭṭahāsyām daśana su hasanām cāru netrām bhajāmi
bāla āditya ayuta ābhām carama pada madām madya mādhurya bhakṣām
kṣoṇī siṃhāsana sthām maṇi maya japa mālābhiḥ vara ānanda hastām
mātal līlā kalāpām tara tanu vimalām ca amale kaṇṭha pame
nitya jñāna prakāśām bhajati mama sat ānanda citta avasannām
hālā pāna udyata aṅgīm parama sukha mayīm veda santāna kartrīm
yoga ānanda ādi kartrīm taruṇa ghana ghaṭa aghora rūpām karālām
ākāśa ambhoja madhye vikala kara yuṣā vyāpaka aṅga prakāśām

original: sā mātā śrīṃ vahantīṃ parisamayakalau mokṣabhaktiṃ bhaje tvām || 67-10 ||
analyzed: sā mātā śrīm vahantīm parisamaya kalau mokṣa bhaktim bhaje tvām

original: tvaṃ mātā vedamātā hara hara kaluṣaṃ bāliśaṃ tārayantī |

original: jvālā mālāvilolā kalayati kaluṣaṃ śākinī saiva mātā |
analyzed: jvālā mālā vilolā kalayati kaluṣam śākinī sā eva mātā

original: saṃsāre'śādihaṃsā cala cala capalaṃ tvaṃ kalāṣoḍaśāre || 67-12 ||
analyzed: saṃsāra īśa ādi haṃsā cala cala capalam tvam kalā ṣoḍaśāre

original: kaṇṭhe hṛtpadmamūle kathayati kavitā stambhitāstvāṃ prayāmi || 67-13 ||
analyzed: kaṇṭhe hṛd padma mūle kathayati kavi tā stambhitāḥ tvām prayāmi

original: parā sā parvā sā rahitamatahāsā praviśa me |

analyzed: hite mātar śākambhari dharaṇi bālā kamalayā

original: niśārdhe śatrvaṅgaṃ hana hana kare saṃhara ripuṃ |

original: sāvitrī madhyakāle na calati calati śraddhayā mastakordhve |
analyzed: sāvitrī madhya kāle na calati calati śraddhayā mastaka ūrdhve

original: koṭyarkābhāsamānā na namati kuṭilaṃ tejasā vyākulālaṃ |

original: iti śrīrudrayāmale uttaratantre mahātantroddīpane siddhamantraprakaraṇe ṣaṭcakraprakāśe
analyzed: iti śrī rudrayāmale uttara tantre mahā tantra uddīpane siddha mantra prakaraṇe ṣaṭcakra prakāśe

trailokya rakṣaṇa arthāya pūjayāmi tava anaghe
saṃsāra vilaya arthāya tava śrī caraṇa ambujam
bhavāni bhairavi prāṇe varṇa dhyānam vada amalam
uvāca
atha kāmeśa gaura aṅga dharma adharma pradarśaka
idānīm śṛṇu sarvajña mahā jñāna nirūpaṇam

original: varṇadhyānaṃ tava snehāt kathaye mama rūpakam |
analyzed: varṇa dhyānam tava snehāt kathaye mama rūpakam
akasmāt siddhi dam dhyānam jñāna mātreṇa siddhi ati
akāram dhyāya iham hari hara caturvaktra vibudhaiḥ
sadā dhyeyam śuklam vidhu mukhi vadhu śrī śruti bhujam
vidheyam kaumāram trinayanam alaṅkāra jaḍitam
ām bīja āḍhyām prabhāsām kanaka ghaṭa madhu prītimānām vimānām
śukla chāyām vahantīm śruti bhuja sahitām padma nāla ākhya mālām
khaḍgam tām dhārayantīm mukuṭa maṇi rucim krodham ākāśa deśam
nānā alaṅkāra dīptim himakara kapilā vāhanīm bhāvayāmi  /
iṃ māyām bhuvana sthitām vadhu yutām śrī ṣoḍaśī saṃyutām
māyā lakṣaṇa lakṣitām trijagatām vidyā abhaya śrī padām
hasta ambhoja catuṣṭayām tri nayanām śūla asi mālā ambujām
nānā ratna ja nūpurām sura natām dhyāye viśuddha ambuje
koṭi arka ābhāsamānām kanaka maya mahā alaṅkṛtām dhyāna gamyām
īkāra ākāram ūtīm tri nayana kamalām veda hāsya ujjvala aṅgīm
śaṅkha ambhoja asi ghaṇṭā sahita tanu varām deva siṃhāsana sthām
veda sthām veda siddhām rudhira śita yutām bāla līlām bhajāmi
ukāram brahmāṇam tri muni sahitam kāñcana rasam
hayam haṃsa ārūḍham iva rasana yutam mandirā jāla vādyam
viśālam veda āsyam śata ravi suvarṇam tri nayanam
jaṭā kuṇḍa āhlādam taruṇa puruṣam naumi satatam
uṃkāram sarva rūpam vidhu śata jaṭitam kāñcana ābham trisargam
mandāraiḥ mānasa āptam pracaya ghana rasam śuddha sūtra akṣa mālam
hastau dvau saṃvahantam phaṇi gaṇa lalanā mālayā ānanda rūpam
siddhānām iṣṭa siddhim kula kamala ghanam bhāvaye ṣoḍaśāre
ṛṃkāram sapta rekhā sahita vimalayā mālayā śobhita aṅgam
māyā vistham prasanna ānana kamala varam vāraṇa ākāra deham
puṇyam yajña ādi siddham madana śaśi kalā mādanam ṣaṣ bhuja āḍhyam
ghaṇṭā cāru astra khaḍga amala kamala kapāla aṅgam ekam bhajāmi

original: ṝṃ bījaṃ cātithīśaṃ śitakamalamukhaṃ śuklavarṇaṃ trinetraṃ |
analyzed: bījam ca atithi īśam śita kamala mukham śukla varṇam trinetram
māyā alakṣmī svara antam taruṇa ravi karam ṣaṣ bhujam nīla vastram
nānā alaṅkāra śobhā tara mukuṭa taṭam candra bimba svabhāvam
khaḍga abja jñāna mudrā madhudhara su gadā pāśa pāṇim bhajāmi
ḷṃkāram sthāṇu keśam trinayana vadana ambhoja tejaḥ prakāśam
pūrṇa ātmānam para īśam triguṇa ghana mayam nīla varṇam tri bhāvam
ṣaṣ bāhum piṅga keśa amala galita śiraḥ maṇḍalam mālayā āḍhyam
veda asi jñāna mālā ambuja vara gadayā śobhitam bhāvayāmi  /
ḷṃkāram śita vasana yuj śukla kiraṇam
sudhā magnam dhyāye hariṇa nayanam veda bhujagam
bhujaṅga ambhoja asi priya vara da bhāvam śubha karam
karālam bhūpālam sura muni gaṇaiḥ sevyam aniśam
eṃ bījam kāla varṇam śata yuvati gatam veṣṭitam deva mukhyaiḥ
sūrya ābham bindu sargam bhuja yuga sahitam padma bhālam karālam
sa alaṅkāram kirīṭam tri nayanam amaram nūpura indu prakāśam
jhiṇṭīśam śambarīśam pramatha suta gaṇaiḥ vyāpitam bhāvayāmi
śukla ābham vā bhava arṇam tri valita nayanam śuddha bandhūka vastram
ratna alaṅkāra hāram tribhuvana vacanam ṣaḍbhujam bīja sāram
dhyāya iham ṣoḍaśa are trimadana ramaṇe bhāvitam pañca raśṃmi
yoga ādyam bhautika īśam gagana patha karam vahnijāyā svara antam
bhaje praṇava lakṣaṇam śita karam calat kuṇḍalam
catur bhuja vibhā karam kamala śaṅkha śūla abhayam
alaṅkṛta kalevaram vimala pīta vastram mukham
śukla aṃśu śata veṣṭitam mukuṭa nūpura āḍhyam param
dhyāye ca anugraha īśam praṇava dhavale auṅkāra rūpam su sūkṣmam
brahma advāra prabhedam śruti bhuja lalitam khaḍga bāṇa astra mālam
jantūnām koṭi kāntim śata ravi mukuṭam krodharājam maheśam
ratna alaṅkāra śobham carala tala ribhā maṇḍalam sa aruṇa ābham
aṅkāram bindu bhāvam lalita daśa bhujam vyāghra carma ambara āḍhyam
pañcāsyam tam trinetram sva kaṇaka valayam candra koṭi prakāśam
śūla astra asīṣu cakra pratana phala gadā ākheṭaka ambhoja mālam
dhyāye ca akrūra devam paraśu khara padam sāra dam sthūla sūkṣmam
aḥkāram śrī visargam kamala dala gatam dīna dātāram ekam
śukla ābham koṭi sūryam śata bhuja lalitam veda vidyā astra khaḍgam
sarva aṃṅga ārakta dhāram trinayana kamala ānanditam manda hāsyam
pañcāśat vaktra śobhā bhava tanu kiraṇam kāraṇam bhāvayāmi
evam dhyātvā ṣoḍaśāre sthira cetāḥ prapūjayet
varṇa rūpam śakti yutam lokanātham sadāśivam
tadā prasannā buddhiḥ syāt amaraḥ jāyate cirāt
pūrva ādi vāmatas dhyāyet kāma nābha yavajītaḥ

original: guptasthāne dhyānakāryaṃ yatra vidyāḥ sphuranti tāḥ || 68-23 ||
analyzed: guptasthāne dhyāna kāryam yatra vidyāḥ sphuranti tāḥ

original: iti śrīrudrayāmale uttaratantre mahātantroddīpane siddhamantraprakaraṇe ṣaṭcakraprakāśe
analyzed: iti śrī rudrayāmale uttara tantre mahā tantra uddīpane siddha mantra prakaraṇe ṣaṭcakra prakāśe

kailāsa śikhara ārūḍha pañcavaktra trilocana
bhava prāṇa prarakṣāya kālakūṭa harāya ca
prati aṅgirā pādukāya dāntam śabda mayam priyam
icchāmi rakṣaṇa arthāya bhaktānām yoginām satām
avaśyam kathayāmi atra sarva maṅgala lakṣaṇam
aṣṭottarasahasra ākhyam sadāśiva samanvitam
mahā prabhāva jananam damanam duṣṭa cetasām
nāmnām smaraṇa mātreṇa yoginām vallabhaḥ bhavet
sadāśiva yutām devīm sampūjya saṃsmaret yadi
dhanam ratnam kriyā siddhim vibhūti siddhim ālabhet
paṭhanāt dhāraṇāt yogī mahādevaḥ sadāśivaḥ
viṣṇuḥ cakra dharaḥ sākṣāt brahmā nityam tapodhanaḥ
yoginaḥ sarva devāḥ ca munayaḥ ca api yoginaḥ

original: siddhāḥ sarve sañcaranti dhṛtvā ca paṭhanād yataḥ |
analyzed: siddhāḥ sarve sañcaranti dhṛtvā ca paṭhanāt yatas

original: ye ye paṭhanti nityaṃ tu te siddhā viṣṇusambhavāḥ || 69-11 ||
analyzed: ye ye paṭhanti nityam tu te siddhāḥ viṣṇu sambhavāḥ
kim anyat kathanena api bhuktim kṣaṇāt labhet
asya śrī bhuvanamaṅgala mahāstotra aṣṭa uttara sahasranāmnaḥ sadāśiva ṛṣiḥ gāyatrī chandaḥ
om śākinī pīta vastrā sadāśivaḥ umāpatiḥ
yuga ādyā yuga dharmā ca yoga vidyā suyogi rāj
vītijñāḥ manmathaghnaḥ ca camarī cārulocanaḥ
ekāntarā kalpataruḥ kṣamā buddhaḥ ramāsavaḥ
rāmā rāmananāthaḥ ca lakṣmī nīleṣulocanaḥ

original: gatigrāhyaḥ prabhāgauraḥ kṣamā kṣubdhaḥ śivā śivaḥ |
analyzed: gati grāhyaḥ prabhā gauraḥ kṣamā kṣubdhaḥ śivā śivaḥ
javāḥ yatiḥ parā hariḥ hara ahara ukṣara akṣaraḥ
mayā amayaḥ payā apayaḥ palā apalaḥ dayā ādayaḥ
samāgamaḥ dhamādhamaḥ ramāramaḥ vamāvamaḥ
priyā anvitā śiromaṇiḥ tu śākinī sadāśivaḥ

original: ruṇāruṇo ghanāghano hayī hayo layī layaḥ |
analyzed: ruṇāruṇaḥ ghanāghanaḥ hayī hayaḥ layī layaḥ
calat kucā java āvṛtaḥ ghana antarā svara antakaḥ

triśūlinī gadā dharaḥ pravālikā mahā balaḥ
śmaśānanilayā śambhuḥ bhavānī bhīma locanaḥ
catur bhujā padma netraḥ daśa hastā mahā guruḥ
sulakṣmīḥ prāntara sthaḥ ca yogi kanyā kṛtāntakaḥ

uttara āsyam sadā pātu sadyojāta sva rūpa dhṛk
mṛtyu jetā sadā pātu jala iraṇye mahābhaye  /

original: dharmātmā dharmasanṃdhiṃ me piṅgalāṃ pātu caṇḍikām || 74-45 ||

original: sarvātmā ca mahātmā ca śivātmā ca śmaśānagaḥ || 74-52 ||
analyzed: sarva ātmā ca mahātmā ca śiva ātmā ca śmaśāna gaḥ

sadā pāntu mātṛka sthāḥ sthiti sarga laya ātmakāḥ
ādi pīṭham kāmarūpam kāñcī pīṭham tad antike
ayodhyā pīṭha nagaram tad ūrdhve jāla kandharam
jālandharam tad ūrdhve tu siddha pīṭham tad antike
kālī pīṭham tad ūrdhve tu caṇḍikā pīṭham agrake
sadā pātu mahāvīraḥ kāladharmī parātparaḥ
madhupurī mahā pīṭham ca aṣṭa pura antara sthitam
māyāvatī mahā pīṭham tad ūrdhve
vārāṇasī mahā pīṭham dharmapīṭham tad antike
jvālāmukhī mahā pīṭham tad antar stham prakītītam

tad ūrdhve pūṇagiri ākhyam kurukṣetram tad antike
uḍḍayānam tad ūrdhve tu kamalā pīṭham eva ca

hiṅgulādam tad ūrdhve tu laṅkā pīṭham tad ūrdhvake

liṅga pīṭham kalā pīṭham dvārakā pīṭham eva ca

tad ūrdhve tāriṇī pīṭham sahasra dala madhyake
kartrī pīṭham tad ūrdhve ca devī pīṭham tad ūrdhvake
rājarāja īśvarī pīṭham ṣoḍaśī pīṭham eva ca
sahasra dala madhye tu sahasra pīṭham eva ca
madhye eka jaṭā pīṭham kartrī tīra kalā upari
ṣoḍaśī mukhavidyābhiḥ veṣṭitā tāriṇī kalā
kālī nīlā mahāvidyā tvaritā chinna mastakā
vāgvādinī ca anna pūrṇā devī pratyaṅgirā punar
dhūmāvatī vedamātā harasiddhā ca dakṣiṇā
etāḥ vidyāḥ mahā vidyāḥ śiva sevana śobhitāḥ

atas madhupurī nāma ca aṣṭa pūram madhusthalam

ahan ca nivasāmi asyām bhavanti anye ca madvidhāḥ

original: tato hi śabdanikaraṃ parāsthānaṃ tataḥ param |
analyzed: tatas hi śabda nikaram parā sthānam tatas param

original: bhṛgupūraṃ tato bhitvā nādapūraṃ tataḥ param || 77-12 ||
analyzed: bhṛgu pūram tatas bhitvā nāda pūram tatas param

kriyākaram prāṇa layam yajña sthānam śikhāpadam
pūrṇagirim uḍḍayānam ca sva padam tatas
durga sthānam tatas bhitvā prakāśa sthānam eva ca
tad ūrdhve piṅgalā sthānam tad ūrdhve tad padam tatas
suṣumnā maṇḍalam bhitvā dhaumira koṇam mahā layam

original: mahābinduṃ tadūrdhve tu ṣaṭkoṇaṃ tu tadūrdhvake |
analyzed: mahābindum tad ūrdhve tu ṣaṭkoṇam tu tad ūrdhvake
tad ūrdhve vāsanāpūram bījapūram tad ūrdhvake

tam bhitvā kāmanagaram sarva kāma phala pradam
tad ūrdhve śakracakram tu tad ūrdhve bhūmicakrakam
tad ūrdhve koṣa cakram tu tad ūrdhve vāyu cakrakam
tad ūrdhve vahnicakram tu tad ūrdhva imṛtacakrakam
tad ūrdhve jalacakram tu divācakram tad ūrdhvake
tad ūrdhve yāminīcakram tad ūrdhve tāra cakrakam
tad ūrdhve dharmacakram tu kālacakram tad ūrdhvake
sarvakālam sadā vyāpya jagat sthāvara jaṅgamam
sadā tad ūrdhva nikaram sapta sāgara maṇḍalam
tad ūrdhve bhāti satatam śrī jalāntaka maṇḍalam
tad ūrdhve tu mahā cakram mahā padma vana ākaram
ṭaṅkāra upari saṃdhyāyet sahasrāre su paṅkajam

original: taṃ bhitvā jñānapadmaṃ tu kaṇīkāyāṃ prapaśyati || 77-23 ||

asya urasi preta bījam sūrya ayuta sama prabham
ūru mūle ca tasya api krodha bījam śata aruṇam

śava rūpa mahādeva hṛdaya upari saṃsthitām
śivābhiḥ ghora rāvābhiḥ catu dīkṣu samanvitām

sukha prasanna vadanām smera aruṇa saroruhām
madhu māṃsa carbaṇa āḍhyām vara dām madana āturām
veda vedāṅga vidyābhiḥ udāra guṇa sambhavām

ati saundarya vadanām dhārā visphurita prabhām

indu nīla maṇi śreṇi śobhā vidyut prakāśinīm

lajjā atītām kula atītām jñāna atītām nirañjanām

original: evaṃ dhyātvā mahākālīṃ śyāmāṃ kāmadughāṃ śivām |
analyzed: evam dhyātvā mahākālīm śyāmām kāmadughām śivām

original: iti śrīrudrayāmale uttaratantre mahātantroddīpane siddhamantraprakaraṇe ṣaṭcakraprakāśe
analyzed: iti śrī rudrayāmale uttara tantre mahā tantra uddīpane siddha mantra prakaraṇe ṣaṭcakra prakāśe
