uvāca
śṛṇu bhairava vakṣyāmi saṅketa artha vinirṇayam
kula cakra kramam siddham śakti sadāśivasya ca
asya vijñāna mātreṇa kaṇṭha padme sthiraḥ bhavet
padma agre ca sāra cakram yoginām ati su priyam
dhyānāt eva mahā bāho sarva cakra pradarśakam

original: khecaro dhārakaḥ śrīmān kaulikaḥ sādhako bhavet |
analyzed: bhavet
tad cakra dhyānam evam tu dvi dvāram agratas mukhe
tad ante ca api dvi dvāram tila ardham bhinna rekhayā
rekhā dvaye na eka dvāram evam dvāra dvayam punar
agrāt uttara paryantam dhyāyet vāra dvayam sudhīḥ
dvayoḥ madhye catur veda rekhā maṇḍalam eva ca
tad antare ca ṣaṭkoṇam dvi ṣaṭkoṇam tad antare
tad madhya iṣṭadalam padmam tad madhye candra maṇḍalam
tad madhye śūnya rūpam tu nirākāram nirañjanam
tattva jñāna āśrita ānanda vidyā ātmānam mama āspadam
sthūla sūkṣma mayam śuddham vācya vācaka bhāvanam
abhedam tu mama ātmānam koṭi sūrya sama prabham
koṭi vidyut prabhā ākāram candra koṭi su śītalam
sarva vyāpakam īśānam abheda jñāna kāraṇam
vidhātāram para brahma sarvajñam sarva daśīnam
sarva śāstra pravaktāram jñāna jñeyam carācaram
aṣṭa hastam viśāla akṣam śūlinam muṇḍa mālinam
harim brahmāṇam īśānam tri lokānām prabhā mayam
gandharvanagaram deśam viśeṣam sarvatomukham
akāla tārakam svāhā svadhā śakti samanvitam
koṭi kāla anala ākāram raudram rudra ātmakam bhavam
tejaḥ bimbam bhāsamānam sarva vyādhi nikṛntanam
daitya kṣatriya darpa ghnam paraśurāmam dvijādhipam
bhṛgu vaṃśa patim satya jñāna avatāram uttamam
śrī rāmam pāvanam rakṣaḥ hantāram tāpasam gurum
trailokya ādhāram ānanda rūpam haladharam param
anantam yoginām ādyam sahasra aṅka phaṇa anvitam
buddham nirākāra dharmam sarva śāstra artha vardhakam
svayambhuvam sva prakāśam paramātmānam maṅgalam
eka ākāram dharma cakra vedinam su accha saṅgaram
duṣṭa nigraha kartāram mahā vīram dhanañjayam
śrī kṛṣṇam sarva sevābhiḥ pūjitam tad mayam śubham
rājarāja īśvaram vāsyam sarva loka niṣevitam
sarva deha sthitam dharmam dharma ātmānam vinodinam
viśiṣṭam pañca pāṣāṇa mahā pīṭha nivāsinam
ananta ananta mahimam kapāla śūla dhāriṇam
eka vaktram dvi pādam ca dvi mukham ca catuṣpadam

original: trimukhaṃ ṣaḍbhujaṃ nāthaṃ caturvaktraṃ vidhiṃ param |
analyzed: tri mukham ṣaṣ bhujam nātham catur vaktram vidhim param
śivam daśa bhujam saukhyam sundaram śrī ṣaḍānanam
nityam dvādaśa hastam ca sarva astra dhāriṇam dhruvam
sapta mukham mahā kāyam caturdaśa bhujam priyam
aṣṭa mukham śiva āhlādam bhuja ṣoḍaśa maṇḍitam
nava padma mukha ambhojam aṣṭādaśa bhujam vibhum
amara īśam mahā kāyam aṣṭādaśa bhujāpatim
kālarāśim kṛṣṇa varṇam citra sarpa su mālinam
śata vaktram koṭi hastam sahasra vadana ambujam
ananta caraṇa ambhojam ananta jana sevitam
ananta hasta kamalam ananta alaṅkṛta ujjvalam
antar prakāśa nikaram ananta guṇa sambhavam
ananta sṛṣṭi sraṣṭāram ananta sthiti kāraṇam
ananta kamalau anye ca ananta saṃhṛti priyam
ananta bīja nikaram ananta śāstra niścayam
ananta tāpa santṛptam ananta jala madhya gam
ananta parama ādhāram ananta vahni dhāriṇam
ananta ākāśa nikaram ananta pṛthivīpatim
ananta jvālā mālā āḍhyam ananta buddhi kāraṇam
ananta sthāna pūjā āḍhyam ananta nāma siddhi dam
ananta gati vijñānam ananta rājya dam sukham
ananta citta sañcāram ananta ananta vikramam
ananta jīva saṃjñānam ananta bhāvanā priyam
ananta gāthā kartāram ananta sindhu saṃsthitam
sarvatas pāṇi pāda antam sarvatas akṣi śiraḥ mukham
sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhantam aparājitam īśvaram
dhyātvā ānanda mayam devam pīṭha madhye ca sādhakam  /
devadevam viśva mayam śākya rūpam sanātanam

original: mama rūpaṃ yadā nāmnā stauti kāmavinodinam |
analyzed: mama rūpam yadā nāmnā stauti kāma vinodinam
dhyātvā cakrapure yogī nirālambaḥ digambaraḥ
gagane cakrasāram tu kula nāmnā pratiṣṭhitam

original: dhyātvā bhavati yogīndraḥ khecaro gatabhīḥ prabhuḥ || 78-48 ||
analyzed: dhyātvā bhavati yogi indraḥ khecaraḥ gata bhīḥ prabhuḥ

original: anāyāsena siddhiḥ syād jñānī ca jñānavān bhavet |
analyzed: anāyāsena siddhiḥ syāt jñānī ca jñānavān bhavet
ūrdhva mukham kaṇṭha padmam tad agre cakra maṇḍalam
adhomukham netra padmam dvi dalam ca ati sundaram
tad agre ca mahā cakram tad ākāram mahā prabham
dvi cakra saṅgamam yatra dṛśyate rātri yogataḥ
tadā bhavati deveśa catur dvāram manoharam
cakram nirañjanam jñāna jñeyam mantra mayam śiva

original: yo jānāti mahādeva sa bhavet kalpapādapaḥ || 78-52 ||
analyzed: yaḥ jānāti mahādeva sa bhavet kalpapādapaḥ

original: iti kaṇṭhasya māhātmyaṃ saṃkṣepāt kathitaṃ mayā |
analyzed: iti kaṇṭhasya māhātmyam saṃkṣepāt kathitam mayā
jānāti yogī dhyānena jñāna yuktena cetasā
paśyati eva mahātmānam jñāna jñeyam sudhā mayam
koṭi varṣa śatena api kathitum nā eva śakyate
tava bhaktyā mahādeva tava āyuḥ kṣetra rakṣaṇāt
idānīm kathitam kaṇṭha padma sañcāramaṅgalam
nirjane doṣa rahite
subhikṣā nindā rahite sthitvā tatra dṛḍha vrataḥ

original: bhāvayet parayā bhaktyā tava rūpaṃ vicintayan || 78-57 ||
analyzed: bhāvayet parayā bhaktyā tava rūpam vicintayan
acirāt yoga siddhaḥ syāt nidāna jñāna siddhi bhāj
śrī mātṛkā mahādevī līlāvatī śubhā satī
ambā gurvī guru śaktiḥ pātu mām ati kātaram

original: tāmambāmambujākṣīṃ ca praṇamya ca punaḥ punaḥ || 78-59 ||
analyzed: tām ambām ambuja akṣīm ca praṇamya ca punar punar
idānīm kathaye nātha bhrū padma jñāna nirṇayam

original: iti śrīrudrayāmale uttaratantre mahātantroddīpane siddhamantraprakaraṇe ṣaṭcakra--prakāśe
analyzed: iti śrī rudrayāmale uttara tantre mahā tantra uddīpane siddha mantra prakaraṇe ṣaṭcakra prakāśe
bhairavī bhairava saṃvāde kaṇṭhāmbhojabhedaprakāśaḥ nāma aṣṭasaptatitamaḥ paṭalaḥ
atha ekonāśititamaḥ paṭalaḥ
uvāca
kathayasva varārohe kāmanā siddhi maṅgalam

original: aprakāśyaṃ mahājñānaṃ yadi sneho'sti māṃ prati || 79-1 ||
analyzed: aprakāśyam mahā jñānam yadi snehaḥ usti mām prati
an ādi śāstra gopyam tu sarva tantreṣu gopitam
sukha sneha kṛpā dṛṣṭyā sarva tattva su maṅgalam
jñāna gamyam śabda jālam komala antar prakāśakam
āyuḥ ārogya jananam dharma artha kāma mokṣa dam
bhrū padma dvi dalam siddha muni maṇḍala saṅkulam
jñāninām ātma siddhānta rūpa jñāna samāgamam
yāmalasya mahā rudra sevitasya varānane
vada vistārya yatnena jīvanmukti padam yatas
labhyate tad kṣaṇāt eva kṛpayā karuṇā mayi
kālakūṭa prabhāveṇa ca ātmanaḥ vismṛtiḥ gatā

original: tāṃ vismṛtiṃ samākṛtya smṛtijñānaṃ vidhehi me |
analyzed: tām vismṛtim samākṛtya smṛti jñānam vidhehi me
uvāca
vakṣye iham dvi dalam vibhāṇḍa kamalam kāla anala vyākulam
śobhā mohana rañjanam su capalā mālā kapāla ujjvalam
saṃhāra ujjvala kānti kānta nikaram saṃhāra kūpa ujjvalam
tejaḥ rūpa mahā śikhā sukha padam pīyūṣa taila priyam
tārā adhīśa dineśa taijasa mayam māyā parāda udyamam
ākāśa agre prabhā agra ugra gamana dharaṇī dhāra sāre pracāre

original: vidyā śrīhākinīśaḥ sphaṭikamaṇigṛhe raktaśaktyā ca haṃsaḥ || 79-10 ||
analyzed: vidyā śrīhākinī īśaḥ sphaṭika maṇi gṛhe rakta śaktyā ca haṃsaḥ
puras vibhāti kaṇīkā su madhya cakra maṇḍale
viśiṣṭa śakti hākinī tathā api durgata ariṇī
yadi iha bhāvyate naraiḥ
paratvam āpnuyāt davi sthiraḥ bhavet ṛte
madhye hākinī devamātrī
yadi carati viliptā ca ūrdhva mārge niṣaṇṇā
tribhuvana karuṇābhiḥ sādhakasya prasannā
japa raṭi para mantra prāṇa jāpī
bhavati vimala cetāḥ hākinī homadevyāḥ
manum api hṛdi nityam saṃvibhāvya pratiṣṭhaḥ
vidhi kṛta kula doṣam bhāti nijītya doṣam
ratipati sama kāntaḥ sādhakaḥ niṇīta antaḥ
japati manu dhana artham bhrānti homa utsava artham

ayuta śata su mantra anna āśa puñja akṣarāṇi
dvi dala kamala śobhā koṭi saṃbhāṣayantī
nija kula paridevaiḥ bhāvyate
rbhavati capalamādyā hākinī su prasannā
ājñā nāma su paṅkajam vidhu śata āhlāda prabhā pāṭalam
vidyut raśmibhiḥ unnatam dhavala pīṭha ānanda cit rūpa dam
hastābhyām kanaka prabhā dīptābhyām prakāśa ujjvalam

original: sūkṣmātsūkṣmātisūkṣmaṃ viracayati sudhāṃ hākinī prāpya nāthaṃ |
analyzed: sūkṣmāt sūkṣma ati sūkṣmam viracayati sudhām hākinī prāpya nātham

original: dhyāyed devīṃ parāḍhyāṃ tribhuvanajananīṃ ṣaṇmukhīṃ vedahastāṃ |
analyzed: dhyāyet devīm para āḍhyām tribhuvana jananīm ṣaṇmukhīm veda hastām
vidyā mudrā viruṇḍam japa vaṭi ḍamarum dhārayantīm jvalantīm
cetaḥ śānti pradātrīm vidhu maṇi mukurām bhīṣamāṇām samānām
ṣaṭkoṇe bindu mūle yuga dala kamale dvāra yugma dvaya āḍhye  /
etad cakrasya madhye sakala sura gaṇa vidyut ākāra dīptā
nityam saṃbhāti pārśva avadhi kamala mahā maṇḍala ākāra bhāve
doṣa aśeṣa apanāśe sakala budha janaiḥ śobhitā padma mālā
manaḥ yoga cinham prasiddham su sūkṣmam
śubhe padma madhye śikhākāra cittam
mahāyoni cakre priye kaṇīkāyām
śiva sthānam ugram vaśī vīkṣya śuklam
mahā vidyut akāraṇam bhāsamānam param brahmasūtra prabodham vinodam
mahā kaula mārgam sthira prāṇa buddhiḥ krameṇa eva tat cintayet sādhaka indraḥ
mahāveda sūtra ādi bīja prakāśam
śatānanda candra prabham bhāvyamānam
vibhāvya āśu nātha priyam pañcacūḍam
yaḥ etat sva citta anvitaḥ sādhaka indraḥ
vibhu dhyāna yuktaḥ priya ātmā mahātmā
pure śīghra gāmī parāṇām narāṇām
dvidhā bodha vijñāna śūnyaḥ
bhavet sarva darśī sa sarvajña rājaḥ
sadā
kṣaṇāt āvibhāvya prabhuḥ dīrgha jīvī
sudhīḥ sarva śāstra artha vettā su mantrī
mahā jñāna yuktaḥ
balī bāṇa tulyaḥ vidhātuḥ praśasyaḥ
tad antare ca ṣoḍaśa chadāḥ vibhānti vāmake
su patrake manohare pradīpa bhā śikhā ākṛti
rmahā ujjvalā sphurat prabhā caturgṛham tatas bahis
praṇava viracanābhiḥ śobhitam cakrarājam
tad upari vilasat śrī candra khaṇḍa prakāśaḥ
tad upari vigalat bindu kāntaḥ makāra

original: dhyāyedyaḥ kramataḥ sudhīḥ priyapadālīne iha kṣetrake |
analyzed: dhyāyet yaḥ kramatas sudhīḥ priya pada ālīne iha kṣetrake
badhvā cetasi bhāva puñja nikarām śrī nātha sevā uditām
yogi indra udita yoga śāsana nirālambām parām sādarā

original: mabhyāsānniyataṃ vaśī paranara ugrāṃ kalāṃ paśyati || 79-29 ||
analyzed: vaśī para naraḥ ugrām kalām paśyati  /
tad madhya antar prakāśām ati vimala kalām ātma prakāśā
sva pratiṣṭhām ati sukha vibhavām āśraye sthāna siddhām
hākinyā aṅghra prabhā maṇḍala kamala mahā rūpa lāvaṇya dhairyam
saubhāgyam dhyāna niṣṭhe vilasati madhuram dhyānam āropayāmi
jvalat koṭi dīpa ākṛti sneha jālam
vahantam raṭantam navīna arka kāntam
sphurat jyotiḥ ākāśa pṛthvī indu madhyam
bhavet vai mahā indraḥ vilokya āśu yogī

original: ihānandabāhye pareśo hi sākṣān mahāpūrṇabhūtiprabhāvo'vyayo hi |
analyzed: iha ānanda bāhye pareśaḥ hi sākṣāt mahā pūrṇabhūti prabhāvaḥ vyayaḥ hi
mahā vahni candra arka sat maṇḍalaḥ vā mahā viṣṇu cakra upari śrī hariḥ syāt
vilokya aśubha na artha tantra pratāpam tadā tat viśati atra pañcatva kāle
laya sthānam ākāśa vāyoḥ atīva pratāpa priyasya añjanasya āśu paśyet
mahānāda rūpam tad ūrdhve śiva ardham viśāla akṣa rūpam śiva ākāra mānam
su śāntam mahāntam dharā kānta lāntam varam dātum utphulla hasta aravindam
sa bhīti pradam śuddha buddha prabodham dayā dāna kartāram āpaśyati iha

original: gurūṇāṃ padāmbhoruhāhlādalīno janaḥ paśyati prāṇanāthaṃ pareśam |
analyzed: gurūṇām pada ambhoruha āhlāda līnaḥ janaḥ paśyati prāṇanātham para īśam

original: dineśaṃ rameśaṃ dhaneśaṃ nareśaṃ sa yogī nirogī mahāśuddhaveśam || 79-36 ||
analyzed: dineśam rameśam dhaneśam nareśam sa yogī nirogī mahā śuddha veśam
sa vācām su siddhim samāpnoti śuddhim
varam kāma lakṣmī īśvara tvam mahattvam
na bhūyāt triloke punarjanma bhāvaḥ
sadā gāyati śrīpatiḥ nāradaḥ vā
uvāca
na śrutam devi kalyāṇi hākinī kūṭa mantrakam
tathā pūjā vidhim dhyānam japam vāyu vinirgamam
ityādi yogam stotrāṇi sahasranāma maṅgalam
tathā śrī vara nāthasya kṛpayā vada sundari

original: iti śrīrudrayāmale uttaratantre mahātantroddīpane siddhamantraprakaraṇe bhairavabhairavīsaṃvāde
analyzed: iti śrī rudrayāmale uttara tantre mahā tantra uddīpane siddha mantra prakaraṇe bhairava bhairavī saṃvāde

atha aśītitamaḥ paṭalaḥ
uvāca
śṛṇuṣva parama ānanda hetu pāna priyaṅkara
ati adbhutam parasya api hākinyāḥ mantram eva ca
trayāśītitame nātha paṭhana āhlāda sāgare
rahasyam parama ānanda vardhanam kāma dam manum

original: asyāpi bhāvakartā yaḥ sa yogī na tu mānuṣaḥ |
analyzed: asya api bhāva kartā yaḥ sa yogī na tu mānuṣaḥ
ati vidyā ca ati dhanam mahā rājyam sadāśiva
asya ārādhana mātreṇa svayam eva samāpnuyāt

original: iti hetoḥ saṅkathaye mantroddhāraṃ krameṇa tu || 80-4 ||
analyzed: iti hetoḥ saṅkathaye mantra uddhāram krameṇa tu
ati adbhutam jñāna nidāna bhāva dam
mahā manum mānasa jāpam āśrayam

original: tāraṃ brahma manuṃ śmaśānasahitaṃ śambhuṃ vibhuṃ hāntakaṃ |
analyzed: tāram brahma manum śmaśāna sahitam śambhum vibhum ha antakam
bhāntam rānta jalam hutāśana mayam vāyum ca vāma akṣiṇam

vidye hākinī tāra mantra puṭitam māyā agnijāyā anvitam

original: ye dhyāyanti mahītale priyamayī bhāryā patipremagā || 80-7 ||
analyzed: ye dhyāyanti mahī tale priya mayī bhāryā pati prema gā
ākāśam vahni kūṭam vadhu śiva dayitā śakti kāma tri kūṭam

original: hākinyāḥ premamantraṃ japati yadi sudhī rājarojeśvaraḥ
analyzed: hākinyāḥ prema mantram japati yadi sudhī rājaroja īśvaraḥ
syāt ānanda abdhau nimagnaḥ pracayati kiraṇam bhāva rāśi prakāśam

original: kṣetrajñaḥ kṣetravijño vaśayati jagatāṃ bhāvasāraṃ narendraḥ |
analyzed: kṣetrajñaḥ kṣetra vijñaḥ vaśayati jagatām bhāva sāram narendraḥ

original: śabdākhyaṃ brahmatattvaṃ taruṇi bhuvaneśi pretya hākinīṃ śrīm || 80-9 ||
analyzed: śabda ākhyam brahma tattvam taruṇi bhuvaneśi pretya hākinīm śrīm

yasya ārādhana mātreṇa mṛtyu jetā na saṃśayaḥ

original: atyantaṃ duḥkhajālaṃ me hana yugmaṃ vidāraya |
analyzed: atyantam duḥkha jālam me hana yugmam vidāraya

original: śivabījaṃ tadante tu haṃsaḥ so'haṃ tato vadet |
analyzed: śivabījam tad ante tu haṃsaḥ tatas vadet

original: kumbhakaṃ recakaṃ kṛtvā dhārayet pavanaṃ śubham |
analyzed: kumbhakam recakam kṛtvā dhārayet pavanam śubham

original: evaṃ kṛtvā mahādeva śivānandaṃ prakṛtya ca || 80-15 ||
analyzed: evam kṛtvā mahādeva śiva ānandam prakṛtya ca

tasya darśana mātreṇa lokāḥ nirogiṇaḥ
aṣṭādaśa lakṣa japāt brahmāṇḍa bhedakaḥ bhavet

original: sahasrāre mano yāti tasyaiva nātra saṃśayaḥ |
analyzed: sahasrāre manaḥ yāti tasya eva na atra saṃśayaḥ
tadā saṃsāra saṃhāra pālana sṛjana āspadaḥ
tasya saṃsāram sakalam koṭi brahmāṇḍam eva ca
anayoḥ mantra jāpena siddhārtha vat bhavet kaviḥ
sarva śāstra artha veda artha sāṅkhya artha ādiṣu pāragaḥ
tasya sākṣāt mūtīmantaḥ vibhānti puratas dhruvam
vāram ekam kadācid vā ca āyāti mukha paṅkaje
catuvīdhā muktiḥ kāma siddhayaḥ sarvadā hṛdi

original: vibhānti hi kimanyadvā kathituṃ śakyate mayā |
analyzed: vibhānti hi kim anyat vā kathitum śakyate mayā

original: valānte rāmaputraḥ syāt saśrīkaḥ kṛṣṇa eva saḥ || 80-23 ||
analyzed: vala ante rāma putraḥ syāt sa śrīkaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ eva saḥ  /

original: kṛṣṇānte rāmanāma syāt bhūpateḥ pālako bhavet |

analyzed: om pada ante ca śirasi sadāśivāya śabdataḥ

original: ṛṣaye nama uccārya mukhe śabdaṃ tato vadet || 82-72 ||
analyzed: ṛṣaye namaḥ uccārya mukhe śabdam tatas vadet  /
gāyatrī chandase paścāt namaḥ śabdam tatas vadet
hṛdi śrī hākinī devyai para śaktyai tatas vadet
devatāyai namaḥ paścāt mūlādhāre tatas vadet

original: klīṃ bījāya namaḥ paścāt sarvāṅge ca tato vadet || 82-74 ||
analyzed: klīṃ bījāya namaḥ paścāt sarva aṅge ca tatas vadet  /
mūlam ārya devatāyai namaḥ śabdam tatas vadet
tatas kuryāt mahādeva śṛṇu sarva aṅga siddhaye
hṛdaye hastam āropya śrī tattva mudrayā sudhīḥ
bindu yuktam nyaset ādau tatas dakṣa bhuje nyaset
ekāra ādi catur varṇyam mūlena puṭitam prabho
bindu yuktam dakṣa haste vinyaset sādhaka uttamaḥ
tathā vāma bhuje nyāsam ācaret manu sampuṭam
ṭha ādi ḍha anta akṣara epa indī uktaiḥ nyāsam samācaret
nādi bha anta akṣara eṃ bi indu yuktaiḥ sva manu sampuṭaiḥ
dakṣa pāde nyaset dhīmān tatas vāma pade nyaset
mā ādi kṣā anta akṣara ebi indu saṃyutaiḥ manu sampuṭaiḥ
mātṛkā nyāsam ākṛtya kara nyāsam samācaret
hrīṃ bījena kara nyāsam ṣaṣ dīrgha bhāj svareṇa ca
evam ca aṅganyāsam kāryam vidhānena kula īśvara
pūrva uktena api sakalam nyāsa jālam samāpayet
tatas ṣoḍhā samākuryāt hākinī para devayoḥ  /
mūla ākhyām mātṛkā sthāne nyāsa sthānam su lakṣaṇam
rudraiḥ tu prathamaḥ nyāsaḥ dvitīyaḥ tu grahaiḥ yutaḥ
lokapālaiḥ tṛtīyaḥ syāt śiva śaktyā caturthakaḥ
śakti ādibhiḥ pañcamaḥ syāt ṣaṣṭhaḥ
mantreṇa puṭitam rudram mātṛ sthāne pravinyaset
arghīśaḥ bhārabhūti īśa utithi īśaḥ hi tatas param
sthāṇukeśaḥ hareśaḥ ca jhiṇṭīśaḥ bhautikeśvaraḥ
sadyojāta īśvaraḥ paścāt anugrāha īśvaraḥ tatas
akrūra īśaḥ mahāsenaḥ sūrāṇām adhipa īśvaraḥ
krodhīśaḥ ca api caṇḍeśaḥ pañcāntakeśaḥ eva ca
śiva uktam īśaḥ ca atra api ca ekarudra īśvaraḥ tatas
kūrma īśaḥ ekanetra īśaḥ caturānanaḥ eva ca
aja īśaḥ ca api sarva īśaḥ soma īśaḥ tad anantaram
lāṅgalīśaḥ eva ca
umākānteśvaraḥ paścāt āṣāḍhīśaḥ tatas param
daṇḍīśaḥ drīśa mīneśau megheśaḥ tad anantaram
lohiteśaḥ śikhīśaḥ ca chāgalaṇḍeśaḥ eva ca
dvis aṇḍeśaḥ mahākāleśvaraḥ vāṇīśaḥ eva ca
bhujaṅga īśaḥ pinākīśaḥ khaḍgīśaḥ tad anantaram
bakeśvaraḥ ca śveteśaḥ bhṛgvīśaḥ tad anantaram
nakulīśaḥ śiveśaḥ ca saṃvartakeśaḥ eva ca
pañcāśat eka yuktāḥ syuḥ rudra ādyāḥ krodhabhairavāḥ

original: ādau mūlaṃ tato mātṛvarṇamekaṃ krameṇa tu || 82-94 ||

original: hṛdaye ca kaṇṭhakūpe galadeśe tataḥ param || 82-97 ||

analyzed: śukraḥ śanaiścaraḥ paścāt rāhuḥ ketuḥ tatas param

original: svaraiḥ sūryaṃ yādirāntaiḥ somaṃ kādiśaraiḥ kujam |
analyzed: svaraiḥ sūryam ya ādi ra antaiḥ somam ka ādi śaraiḥ kujam
ca ādi pañca akṣaram nātha budham ṭa ādi śaraiḥ gurum
ḍādi ha antaiḥ tathā śukram pādi māntaiḥ śanaiścaram
śādi ha antaiḥ tathā rāhum lakṣa ādyām ketum eva ca
lokapāla nyāsam ādau vakṣyāmi kulabhairava
śiraḥ maṇḍala madhye tu dakṣiṇa āvarta yogataḥ
adhas paryanta mālyasya mūlena puṭitam sadā
indrāya śakti hastāya sa vāhanāya om namaḥ
hrasva pañca svareṇa api mūla ante saṃnyaset sudhīḥ
ekādaśa svareṇa api yuktāya vahnaye namaḥ  /
sa vāhanāya sarva astra dhāriṇe tādṛśāya ca
yamāya vāhana sthāya śūla astra dhāriṇe namaḥ  /
kādi pañca varṇa sāraiḥ mūlena puṭitaiḥ api
karṇe dakṣiṇa mūla ūrdhve hastasya tattva mudrayā

ādau bījam ca ādi pañca bīja ante nairṛtāya ca
vasaḥ adhipataye sarva astra ādi vāhana vāhine

original: namo'nte mūlamantraṃ tu iti sarvatra bhāvanā || 82-108 ||
analyzed: tu iti sarvatra
mūlam ṭādi pañca varṇam varuṇāya tatas param
sa vāhanāya sarva astra dhāriṇe namaḥ eva ca
tad ante mūlamantram tu varuṇāya samācaret
mūla ante ta ādi pañca arṇa sa vāhanāya vāyave  /
sarva astra dhāriṇe paścāt namaḥ mūlam tatas param
tatas kuryāt kuberasya nyāsam parama durlabham
ādau mūlam pādi pañca akṣaram uccārya sādhakaḥ
kuberāya sarva astra dhāriṇe nara vāhine
namaḥ nte mūlamantram tu vāma karṇa upari nyaset
ādau mūlam pādi vāntam īśānāya tatas param
sa vāhanāya sarva astra dhāriṇe namaḥ uccaret
tad ante bīja vinyāsam īśānanyāsaḥ īritaḥ
ādau mūlam śādi ha antam śakra ūrdhve hastam arpayan
adhonantāya devāya sarva astra dhāriṇe tatas
sa vāhanāya hṛd śabdam mūlam ca api tad antare
ādau mūlam tatas lakṣam brahmaṇe stra ādi dhāriṇe
sa vāhanāya hṛd śabdam mūlam ca tad anantaram
brahmarandhre pravinyasya brahma jñānam avāpnuyāt
iti dikpāla vinyāsaḥ kathitaḥ kālabhairava
śiva śakti nyāsa jālam śṛṇuṣva parama adbhutam
yasya karaṇa mātreṇa ṣaṭcakra bhedakaḥ bhavet

original: kāmarājaṃ trikoṇe tu hṛdi jvālandharaṃ tathā |
analyzed: kāmarājam trikoṇe tu hṛdi jvālandharam tathā

tad ūrdhve śāṅkarī pīṭham rudra pīṭham tad ūrdhvake
tad ūrdhve karuṇā pīṭham ca unmanī pīṭham eva ca
rodhanī pīṭham evam tu bindu pīṭham tad ūrdhvake
tad ūrdhve ratna pīṭham tu tad ūrdhve śukra pīṭhakam
tad ūrdhve vāsanā pīṭham visarga pīṭham eva ca
brahmapīṭham tad ūrdhve tu kālī pīṭham tad ūrdhvake
tad ūrdhve tāriṇī pīṭham eka pīṭham tad ūrdhvake

original: vaśiṣṭho nāradaścava śukaḥ prahlāda eva ca |

original: dhyāyet pañcamukhaṃ mahāstravaradaṃ bhaktaiḥ sadā pūjitam || 82-165 ||
analyzed: dhyāyet pañcamukham mahā astra vara dam bhaktaiḥ sadā pūjitam

arghya dvayam sthāpayitvā krameṇa tu

ām

original: oṃ hākinī vasudhā lakṣmī paramātmakalā parā |
analyzed: om hākinī vasudhā lakṣmī paramātma kalā parā
pañcānana priyā pūrvā para dārā para ādarā
para deśa gatā nāthā parama āhlāda vadhīnī
pūrva atītā para atītā apāra mahima sthitā
para anala śikhā ākārā para bhrū madhya vāsinī
parvateśvara kanyā ca para agni koṭi sambhavā
para chāyā para chatrā para chidra vinirgatā
pārijāta vana sthā ca pārijāta sraja priyā
para apara vibhedā ca para loka vimukti dā
para tāpa anala ākārā para strī para jāpinī
prasannā para yantra sthā prasannā padma mālinī
priyaṃvadā paratra āptā para dhānya artha vadhīnī
para bhūmi ratā pītā para kātara pūjitā
parāsya vākya vinatā puruṣa sthā purañjanā
prapañca duḥkha hantrī ca prapañca sāra nirgatā
purāṇa nirgatā pīnā pīna stana bhava ujjvalā
paṭṭa vastra parīdhānā paṭṭa sūtra pracālinī
para dravya pradā prītā para śraddhā para antarā
paramā eva nigūḍha artha tattva cintā prakāśinī
pracura artha pradā pṛthvī padma patra dvaya sthitā
prasanna hṛdaya ānandā prasanna āsana saṃsthitā
prasanna ratna mālā āḍhyā prasanna vana mālinī
prasanna karuṇa ānandā prasanna hṛdaya sthitā
para ābhāsa ratā pūrva paścima uttara dakṣiṇā
pavana sthā pāna ratā pavana ādhāra vigrahā
para janma nirastā ca para sañcāra kāriṇī
paramāṇu sthūla karī parātparatarā pathā
pūṣaṇaḥ priyakartrī ca pūṣaṇā poṣaṇa trayā
bhūpa pālā pāśa hastā pracaṇḍā prāṇa rakṣiṇī
pīyūṣa tṛpta dehā ca pīyūṣa mathana kriyā
pīyūṣa nirmala ākārā pīyūṣa ghana vigrahā
pāṣāṇa tanu saṃsthā ca pāṣāṇa citta vigrahā
prabhākāra tanu ugrā ca prabhākara mukhī prabhā
su prabhā prāntara sthā ca preyatva sādhana priyā
asthitā pāmasī pūrva nātha pūjita pādukā
pādukā mantra siddhā ca pādukā mantra jāpinī
pādukā maṅgala sthā ca pādukā ambhoja rājinī
pālayantī tri lokānām paramā para hākinī
parama āhlāda modā ca parama ākāśa vāhinī
para yoṣā para prāyā para santāna rakṣakā
para śmaśāna gamyā ca priya candra mukhī palā
plakṣasthā pallavasthā ca paṅkeruhamukhī paṭā
pavitra alaṅkṛta aṅgī ca pavitra deha dhāriṇī
tripurā parama aiśvarya pūjitā sarva pūjitā
palala priya hṛdyā ca palāla carvaṇa priyā
para go gaṇa gopyā ca prabhu strī raudra taijasī
praphulla ambhoja vadanā praphulla padma mālinī
puṣpa sthā puṣpa saṅkāśā puṣpa komala vigrahā
pauṣpī pāna ratā puṣpa madhu pāna ratā pracā
pratīcī pracaya āhlādo prācana ākhyā ca prāñcikā
prayoga kuśalā pakṣā pakṣa bheda prakāśinī
eka pakṣā dvi pakṣā ca pañca pakṣa prasiddhi dā
pātra pakṣā pīta vastrā pīta varṇa prakāśinī
nipīta kālakūṭī ca pīta saṃsāra sāgarā
padma patra jala sthā ca padma patra nivāsinī
para nirvāṇa dātrī ca para āśā para śāsanā
apriya vinihantrī ca para saṃskāra pālinī
pratiṣṭhā pūjitā siddhā prasiddha prabhu vādinī
apratiṣṭhā nihantrī ca pāda padma dvaya anvitā
paiśācī ca prakṣapitā pitṛ śraddhā pitāmahī
prapitāmaha pūjyā ca pitṛ loka svadhā parā
punarbhavā punarjīvā paunaḥpunya gati sthitā
para jñāna artha dātrī ca paratantrā artha sādhinī
praphulla pada dātrī ca prasamāyā purodayā
parvata prāṇa śobhā ca parvata chatra kāriṇī
prāk sura īśvara patnī ca para vīra kula apahā
para vīra niyantrī ca para praṇava mālinī

hartrī samasta duḥkhānām hiraṇya hāra śobhitā

original: hariṇākṣī haristhā ca harā hārāvatī hirā || 86-75 ||

ākaṣīṇī stambhinī trijaṭā rukmamālinī

siddhāḥ vidyādharāḥ hārāḥ ratiḥ kaiśoradhamīṇī

original: bhuvaneśī sundarī ca satī siddhipradā kalā || 88-27 ||
analyzed: bhuvaneśī sundarī ca satī siddhipradā kalā
kṛpaṇā padma vadanā śabdeśī bhaga mālinī

bhairavī vīramātā ca mahābhāgyavatī umā
sulabhā durgamātā ca sugandhā gandhamālinī

etāsām dhyānam ākṛtya catu dīkṣu krameṇa tu
vibhāvya taijasīm sarvām tejaḥ mālā vināśinīm
ati saundarya laharīm pārijāta vana antare
mahā maṇḍala madhye tu ratna santāna nimīte
grahasya api mahākālam catur dvāram vicintayet
maṇḍapasya ūrdhva bhāge ca mahā candra ātapam śitam
śata sūrya prabham kāntam muktā dāma vibhūṣitam

tad adhas svarṇa nirmāṇa chatram maṇi mayam rucim
tad adhas siṃha rūpa akṣi yukta siṃhāsanam param
tad ūrdhve preta bījam tu preta liṅga upamam smṛtam
preta liṅga upari dhyātvā kāñcanasya api maṇḍalam
mahāpīṭham trikoṇam tu kaṇīkāyām mahā prabham
śukla padmam mahā śobham ṣoḍaśa chada maṇḍitam

dakṣiṇa āvarta yogena vidyut rūpam vicintayet

para ambā rūpiṇīm tārām taruṇa āditya sannibhām

original: caturdvāre sadā dhyāyed devānāṃ cāpi maṇḍalam || 88-42 ||
analyzed: catur dvāre sadā dhyāyet devānām ca api maṇḍalam
sa vāhanam daivatam ca parivāra samanvitam
vahni koṇe tathā vahni maṇḍalam sarvatomukham
parivāra anvitam dhyātvā yama lokam tu dakṣiṇe
yamam śyāmam mahā kāntam parivāra gaṇa anvitam
sa vāhanam tatas dhyāyet nairṛtam rākṣasīm purīm
tad uttare sadā dhyāyet varuṇam meṣa vāhanam
parivāra anvitam śuklam bhāsvaram tatra cintayet
tad uttare marut lokam kṛṣṇa sārasva vāhanam
parivāra anvitam dhyātvā tad pūrve cintayet tatas
kuberam uttara dvāri parivāra gaṇa anvitam
sa vāhanam kutsitam ca sarva ratna upaśobhitam
īśāne īśa lokam ca parivāra gaṇa anvitam
sa vāhanam sarva loka pūjitam parameśvaram
parivāra anvitam dhyātvā nānā vādya samanvitam
bherī turī dhudhurīṇām sahasra koṭim eva ca
nānā sundara vādya āḍhyam pūrva lokam vicintayet
veṇu vīṇā mṛdaṅgānām sahasra koṭi nāditam
yama lokam nairṛte ca mantra koṭi samanvitam
kara tāla kāṃsya ḍhakkā dhvani koṭi prapūritam
jaleśvara mahā lokam dundubhi dhvani mohitam
yantra koṭi dhvani śreṇi mohitam tatra cintayet
rucim
marut lokam tathā dhyāyet kubera sthānam eva ca

original: varuṇe ca tato dhyāyenmaṇḍalasthān daśa kramān |

śiva liṅga ayuta īśāḥ ca sarva śakti samanvitāḥ
vāyu koṇe sthitāḥ ete rudrāḥ ca ayuta liṅga pāḥ
rūpa nāthaḥ hi hanumān sūrya īśaḥ vasudhā īśvaraḥ
vāsukīvallabhaḥ satyapatiḥ ete maheśvarāḥ

ete pūjyāḥ cintanīyāḥ kāmanā phala siddhaye
uttare ca uttara āsyaḥ ca kubereśvaraḥ īśvaraḥ

ete pūjyāḥ dhyāyitavyāḥ pūrva ukta mūtī kalpanāḥ
īśāne ca tatas dhyāyet īśvarān parameśvara
īśaḥ vaiśvānara īśaḥ ca viśvāmitra īśvaraḥ tathā
īśānaḥ api ca māyeśaḥ baṭukeśaḥ rameśvaraḥ
ekādaśā ete rudrāḥ ca kāmapīṭha nivāsinaḥ
ayuta ānanda liṅga īśāḥ cintanīyāḥ prapūjitāḥ

adhas maṇḍala madhye tu cintayitvā prapūjayet

ete trayodaśa ānanda śiva rūpāḥ sureśvarāḥ
ayuta ānanda liṅga īśāḥ pūjyamānāḥ sura asuraiḥ
vara abhaya pradāḥ pañcatattva prakāśa kāriṇaḥ

śṛṇu kānta pravakṣyāmi hākinī pañca maṇḍalam
tatra śrī hākinī devyāḥ pañcapīṭham vicintayet
pañca pīṭhe pañca devam ratna mālā vimaṇḍitam
bhūta preta piśāca ādi yakṣa dānava koṭibhiḥ
veṣṭitam sarva loka āḍhyam pañcakoṇam vicintayet
nirvāṇa siddhi dam deva kim anyat kathayāmi te
pañcakoṇe pañcatattvam pañcabījam svam eva ca
pūrva koṇe indrabījam pṛthivyāḥ ca trikoṇakam
tad dakṣiṇe vāyubījam vāyavī śakti maṇḍalam
vāyum ugra vega dharam dharaṇībhañjana ākhyakam
tad adhas gṛha pīṭhe ca trikoṇa maṇḍala ujjvale
jala bījam vāruṇa ākhyam sarva ratna āsana sthitam
śītalam bahu rūpam tam triloka vāyu bhañjakam
sarva adhas taijasam rūpam vahni bījam mahā prabham
sarvadā tam mūtīmantam tejaḥ mālā samākulam
mahā ugram sarva bhakṣam ca jalīya doṣa bhañjakam
ākāśam sarva śeṣa ākhyam mahāpralaya saṅgamam
kumbhaka ādhāra cakram tu ākāśa bīja rūpiṇam
sarveṣām laya saṃsthānam nirmalam tattva siddhi dam
hākinī pañca pīṭham ca pañca prāṇān tad antare
prāṇa upānaḥ samānaḥ ca udāna vyānau ca vāyavaḥ
mūtīmantaḥ vibhānti atra lokānām mṛtyu nāśanāt
eteṣu vāyukuṇḍeṣu pūjayet pañcavāyavīm
prāṇa īśī gudaka apānā samāna īśī kula antarā
udāneśī vyāna mātā vāyavyaḥ pañca pūjitāḥ
pañca prāṇo pañca yogam yaḥ karoti kula īśvara
vāyavīṣu arpayet nityam pañcatattvam suyogavi
śuddha āsavam śuddha māṃsam śuddha mīnam tathā aparam
śuddha mudrām tathā śuddha kula candanam arpayet
hākinī paramāyāntu paramābhiḥ pratarpayet
vārāṇasī maṇḍalam ca trikoṇam ṣoḍaśa chadam
kesara dvayam evam tu patre patre pratiṣṭhitam
catuṣkoṇa trayam tasya ūrdhve catur dvāram eva ca
etat vārāṇasī cakram sarva kāma su siddhi dam
prapañca guṇa duḥkhāni haret ca pañcakoṇakam
trikoṇasya antare dhyātvā kim na siddhi ati bhū tale
etat prakāśitam cakram yaḥ dhyāyati nirantaram
manaḥ yoga siddhi bhāvam sa prāpnoti na saṃśayaḥ
manaḥ yoga siddhi kāle sadā avaśyam vicintayet
koṭi rūpa dharāḥ ete ca atra eva bhānti nityaśas
hākinī maṇḍalam madhye kāśyāḥ trikoṇa yantrake
pṛthivī jala rūpān ca tejaḥ rūpān ca vāyavīm
gaganām kramatas dhyāyet dakṣiṇa āvarta sat pathā
vibhāvya pañcamīm devīm hākinī maṇḍale yajet
sarvatra hi antar yajanam kṛtvā siddhim avāpnuyāt
iti vārāṇasī cakra madhya stham pañcakoṇakam
hākinī maṇḍalam deva nāyikā gaṇa maṇḍitam
sarva alaṅkāra śobhā āḍhyam hema mālā virājitam
aprakāśyam sarva tantre kāśitam rudrayāmale
ṣaṭkoṇa maṇḍalam vakṣye hākinyāḥ śiva śakti gam
vārāṇasī maṇḍala agre pratibhāti nirantaram
śiva śakti mayam śuddha cakra rājam vicintayet
tad ūrdhve ca unmanī deśam tad ūrdhve bodhanīpuram
maṇḍalam śṛṇu yatnena yena antar yajanam labhet
tad ūrdhve ṣoḍaśa dalam kesara dvaya saṃyutam

original: caturdvāraṃ tadūrdhve tu vyāpya tiṣṭhati sarvadā |
analyzed: catur dvāram tad ūrdhve tu vyāpya tiṣṭhati sarvadā

original: rākiṇī lākinī devī kākinī śākinī tathā |
analyzed: rākiṇī lākinī devī kākinī śākinī tathā
hākinī ca dakṣiṇatas dhyeyā śiva samīpa gā
brahmā viṣṇuḥ ca rudraḥ ca īśvaraḥ ca sadāśivaḥ

original: parā śaktiḥ prabhākārā caturdvāre tato likhet |

aṣṭavarga krameṇa api sarva siddhi vibhāvayet

anāyāsena yoga indra yoginī siddhim āpnuyāt
etat cakram vibhāvya āśu bhāva siddhim avāpnuyāt

padārtha navakam tatra bīja yuktam vibhāvayet
tad padārthān pravakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣva bhairava īśvara
pṛthivīm jala rekhām ca tejaḥ rūpān ca vāyavīm
ākāśa gāminīm devīm kāla rūpām digambarīm
ātma śaktim manaḥ śaktim dakṣiṇa āvarta yogataḥ
likhitvā sva sva bīja āḍhyām bhāvayet kulavartmanā
iti śrī rudrayāmale uttara tantre mahā tantra uddīpane siddha mantra prakaraṇe

original: ṣaṭcakraprakāśebhairavībhairavasaṃvāde vārāṇasīpañcapīṭha-- | prakāśo nāma navatitamaḥ paṭalaḥ ||
analyzed: ṣaṭcakra prakāśe bhairavī bhairava saṃvāde vārāṇasī pañcapīṭha prakāśaḥ nāma navatitamaḥ paṭalaḥ
